story:
"The first smartwatch with no compromises"

ZeTime: the world’s first hybrid smartwatch combining mechanical hands with a full round color touchscreen. Using groundbreaking technology to mount watch hands through the center of the high-resolution TFT color display, ZeTime blends the classic design of a traditional timepiece with the most advanced features of a smartwatch. 

With its classic mechanical watch hands, powered by patented* Smart Movement technology, ZeTime will automatically update the time according to your location and will work up to 30 days on a single charge. 

ZeTime innovation revolves around multi-layer technology combining a TFT color display, mechanical hands, a touch panel and ultra-resistant Gorilla glass.

“Won’t the hands get in the way of the screen?” – no, we’ve got that solved. With our Smart Movement technology, the mechanical hands are controlled by the watch CPU in order to move them if necessary to maximize visibility of the screen.

Hands won't disturb you reading your emails or instant messages. We can simply ask them to move away from the text area to elegantly separate the screen in two horizontally.

ZeTime Regular and Petite: shipping in April 2018

Two models to choose from: Regular (44mm) or Petite (39mm). ZeTime Regular timepiece boasts a sleek 44mm stainless steel watch case inspired by the finest Swiss design, and will look effortlessly elegant on all wrists. However, for those who prefer a smaller model, ZeTime Petite will offer the same features, compatibility and finishings as ZeTime Regular, but in a compact 39mm watch case.

No need to set the time when landing in a different time zone: ZeTime will do it automatically in synchronization with your smartphone. Keep an eye on your hometown time zone too, thanks to custom watch faces. 

Today, smart wearable devices have changed the way we organise our day and connect with the world. But until now, there have been limitations: compromises are made in design or quality of materials, in toughness and water resistance, or in battery life. A smartwatch may seem not so smart when its limited autonomy means it is no longer fulfilling its most basic function - that of a watch. We want to push the limits of what is possible: there should be no compromise on design, features, or autonomy. And this should be available at an accessible price point.

 

The intuitive navigation on a full color TFT touchscreen gives you easy access to all the ZeTime pre-installed apps, as well as your notifications, activity data and more.

 

A classic take on wearable technology, ZeTime’s high tech credentials do not mean compromising on style: the timepiece boasts a sleek 44mm stainless steel watchcase inspired by the finest Swiss design. 

 ZeTime features a set of chrome mechanical hands over the color screen to always keep an eye on the daily time even when the screen is turned off.

 Protected by ultra-resistant Sapphire glass, ZeTime will accompany you anywhere, anytime.

Navigate throughout the various menus and screens easily, simply rotate the Smart Crown. You can select an item or validate a menu by simply pressing the crown.

 

Monitor heart rate automatically or manually thanks to an ultra-accurate 3 LED optical sensor.

With waterproof resistance reaching up to 50 meters’ depth, you'll never be afraid of being around water (5 ATM certification).

 

Because we know your Monday will never be the same as your Friday, we have designed ZeTime to make it as quick and simple as possible to change your wristband to match your day’s outfit. With a large selection of wristbands provided by our style team, you should find one that allows you to truly express yourself. And if that’s not enough, you can also adapt any 18mm (ZeTime Petite) or 22mm (ZeTime Regular) wristband available on the market.

No need to turn on the screen: ZeTime shows you the time at a glance thanks to the physical mechanical hands.

Keep track of all your notifications straight from your wrist and answer your messages without taking your phone out of your pocket.

In addition to Caller ID and Calendar Events, ZeTime displays your favorite social networks and apps notifications from Facebook, Messenger, Twitter, Instagram, Snapchat, Linkedin, Gmail, Skype, WeChat, Hangouts, Uber, Viber and MORE!  That way, you can keep track of all information that really matter to you, at a glance!

Precisely monitor your cardiac frequency while exercising or at rest.

 ZeTime is set for action with its 3-axis accelerometer that tracks your daily steps, distance calories and active minutes

Be perfectly dressed for your next meeting. ZeTime will help you by both reminding you of upcoming calendar events and providing your local weather forecasts. Manage your day, right from your wrist!

No need to search for your phone in your pocket: with ZeTime you can control your favorite music app straight from your wrist. The ZeTime can also be used as a camera remote for perfectly framed group selfies, and can help you find your phone by making it ring at the touch of a button.

Express your style with ZeTime. Whether you prefer the sports attitude of a silicon band or the classiness of leather or metal, never miss an opportunity to be yourself. Pick the watch face and band that best fit your style!

Pictures from our first set of prototypes

A colorful and intuitive user interface designed in-house, delivering easy navigation, quick access to notifications and activity data, while offering a large selection of watch faces to match your style and your daily mood. A multitude of watches in one.

ZeTime comes pre-installed with all the essential apps. Activity and sleep tracking, weather forecasts, camera and music remote control... All straight from your wrist.

Compatible with both iOS and Android phones, offering the same set of features and user experience to both operating systems, ZeTime is your perfect companion regardless of your phone preference. It connects seamlessly by Bluetooth to sync activity and sleep data, and push all the notifications that matter to you.

 

 

 

 Download our press kit here

story:
A WATCH FOR WATCH LOVERS

In front of you is an entirely different watch from most mechanical timepieces. This is one of those watches we always enjoy seeing on collector’s wrist. With our own developed time-telling mechanism together with its beauty and precision, THE SPACESHIP is appealing to every watch lover.

HOW TO TELL THE TIME?

The main feature of THE SPACESHIP is the unique in-house time-telling mechanism, which tells the time in an entirely different way from most mechanical timepieces, that make use of the typical hour and minute hands.

The rotation and revolution of the two specially made sapphire crystal thin plates show the time. The minute plate rotates once per hour while the hour plate rotates 30 degrees in the section of 55-60 minutes every hour. Time is specially shown with the red pointer underneath. Each of our 22 unique parts, as well as every gear of our mechanism, is meticulously arranged and tested to avoid shock and ageing.

This complicated time-telling system requires accurate and precise calculation as well as enough testing. Thus, it is not easily found in normal watch brands and factories. The 22 unique parts combined with 15 months of development, uncountable modification and testing models, our mechanism is reliable and sturdy.

*Swiss Super-LumiNova® BGW9 is used for numerals which emits a Blue-Green glow in the dark and looks white in the daylight condition.

*More about Swiss Super-LumiNova® BGW9

https://luciusatelier.com/blogs/news/learn-abou...

A GROUP OF WATCH ENTHUSIASTS

BEHRENS ORIGINAL is a group of watch enthusiasts gather and create a brand that is based in Hong Kong. We specialized in watchmaking and watch modification, in which we take pride in what we do. Our founder, B.Q.Jack, has more than 15 years in watchmaking - which we genuinely called him the watch factory master. With a group of designers and engineers works perfectly, interesting ideas and developments come out every day!

We want our watches to be well-made and with a high-end quality, which has been acknowledged and proven by 400+ backers and customers all over the world. We are being discussed on many forums and groups organised by watch lovers. You may check out for more comments about our watches’ quality craftsmanship and design in the link below:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/behrenswat...

 

WE DEVELOP OUR OWN MECHANISM

After having two very successful Kickstarter projects (THE MOONPHASE and THE ALL-ROUND) both funded in only a few hours. We have decided to take a big step forward-- Developing our own mechanical system. is the dream of Behrens Original since the very beginning. We are not satisfied by making watches only with changing the material of dial, the form of hands and case; we want to create something really special and innovative. Thus, we are dedicated to creating this masterpiece - THE SPACESHIP.

 

UNIQUE TIME-TELLING MECHANISM (WE ARE NOT OUTSOURCING)

It is very complicated to develop a new system as a precisely developed system is a combination of accuracy, materials, gears, reliability, and appearance. All of the parts have to be perfect in order to create a great mechanism. That is why many so-called "unique watches" appeared to be very similar because they share the same mechanism sourced from one or two major manufacturers.

However, it is not the case for us. We have our own R&D centre which we are determined to create our own system and mechanism. With 15 months of development, uncountable modifying and testing models; our mechanism is reliable and sturdy, with an appealing and high-end appearance.

We know that real watch lovers may concern:

 

RELIABILITY AND ON-WRIST TESTING

This time-telling mechanism is completely developed by ourselves.
 

We can guarantee the best quality of the mechanism. We create it, we test it, and we know it.
 

  • 22 Unique parts. ZERO ready-made parts
     
  • 15 months of development
     
  • 9 months of on-wrist testing
     
  • More than 50 modifications
     
  • More than 20 testing models
     

We have encountered many difficulties for this unique mechanism. We fixed them one by one during the 15 months of development
 

MATERIAL AND APPEARANCE

  • We are not using aluminium like others do, as it is a soft metal, it will deform after some days; it is hardly be polished. We then developed our very special alloy as our mechanism main support. With the lightweightness and hardness, our mechanism is sturdy and nicely polished, which also results in providing a high-end appearance.
     
  • Platinum coating is applied to create great protection, as well as a shiny, well-polished appearance.
     
  • Sapphire crystal is used for the hour/minute plate. With its incredible transparency, the gear underneath can be seen clearly.

TURNING FORCE

  • Unique designed bearing is used. The whole weight of the mechanism is hung onto the bearing system developed by us, and thus, very little turning force is needed to turn the whole mechanism.
     
  • The turning force is very little and the accuracy of the watch will not be affected. It is as normal as pushing normal watch hands.
     
  • Gravitation will not affect the accuracy of the movement as our whole system is hung onto the bearing system, mounted directly onto the dial.
     

MULTI-POLISHING CASE 220% more cost

The excellent case design is one of the significant symbols of our watches. It is also widely loved by 400+ BEHRENS ORIGINAL customers. This time, we decided to invest more to bring out an even higher standard watch case.

The previous watch cases of THE MOONPHASE and THE ALL-ROUND are already well-made. The case design, as well as the finishing, is widely approved by our customers. However, we would like to go further. We increased the budget of the case by 220% in order to achieve a swiss-made standard. In order to make it more sharper and smoother, the watch case is manufactured independently into 3 parts- the two lugs; and the body itself, so as to polish them independently. It then gives out a new level of polishing and exquisite than the normal case. Such costly production method could only be found in luxury watches production.

The case is made of 316L stainless steel which is widely used in high-end watches. Multi-polishing methods are applied: including mirror polished on the bezel and the edges of the lugs, horizontal brushed on the sides, vertical brushed on the lugs and circular brush on the back. And for this time, we redesigned the dome-shaped sapphire crystal in order to have its smooth and clear curve.

Although these production methods are long and costly, and sometimes it is unnoticeable until you have a closer look, we aim to give you the best, attractive, durable, and elegant watch cases.

*Every watch is individually numbered.

SLIM WATCH - 8.5MM MULTIFUNCTIONAL MECHANICAL WATCH

Slim appearance is the iconic design element of Behrens Original. Our slim design is adored by 400+ Behrens Original backers and supporters.

In order to have a nice mechanical watch with a thin design, we provide the best we can: With the well-designed cutting of the case and the super-high quality redesigned dome-shaped sapphire, our watch provides an incredible slim appearance. The thickness of the watch is only 8.5mm, exclusively the dome shape sapphire. With the dome-shaped sapphire, the total height is only 12.15mm.

Every part of our design is uniquely made for reaching our goal: a thin mechanical watch. We have gone under many tests on making a thin, durable watch. Our design team remade the dial part more than five times to remove 10-30C each time. There are no words can fully describe the hardship we had in the process, but we have put our efforts wholeheartedly in making this unique yet slim mechanical watch.

SAPPHIRE CRYSTAL ONLY - 3.65MM THICK

For producing luxurious watches, we persist to use only sapphire crystal for both sides of the watches. Due to the remarkable hardness of sapphires - 9 on the Mohs scale, our watches can hardly be damaged by plain scratches. Thus, we believe that sapphire crystal is the most suitable material for daily wear.

Dome-shaped sapphire crystal is used to give an ultimately slim appearance to the watch. As sapphire is a hard material (A 5mm thick raw sapphire material is used to craft into a 3.65mm dome-shaped crystal), it is beyond difficult to make the dome-shaped sapphire. Since it is costly and time-consuming (our machine can only produce 3 pieces of dome-shaped sapphire crystal max. per day), the yield rate is low.

ACCURACY - 7 DAYS, T0, T24 TESTS

Watch modification and movement tuning are our central focus. As such, absolute accuracy is always on our important checklist. We ensure the quality of every part by using strict control testing standards before assembling the watches.

The testing procedure lasts 7 days

Day 1 Before assembling the watches, the movement is fully wound (also known as T0) mechanically. The movement is tested in five positions, crown left, crown up, crown down, dial-up and dial down. Then given a rest period of 24 hours(also known as T24) , the movement is tested again in the five positions.

Day 3 After assembling all the parts together, the watch is put into an auto-winding machine for 1 day. The watch would be fully wound and be tested with the same testing procedure in Day 1.

Day 5 The watch keeps putting into an auto-winding machine. The watch would be fully wound and be tested with the same testing procedure on Day 1.

Day 7 Before packing, the watch is fully wound(T0) and is tested in five positions again.

All our watches have to pass all of the above procedures before delivery. We make sure that the accuracy of our watches is highly maintained in -20~+20 seconds/day. We tested the watches in more positions than the normal quality checkups do - we tested the watches in 5 positions while the others tested in 3 positions only.

We need to ensure the watches are adequate in every situation. We then on-wrist tested the sample watches for more than 9 months before we started our Kickstarter campaign. The stableness of BEHRENS ORIGINAL watches is highly guaranteed.

OUR MOVEMENT - MIYOTA 9015

Movement is the soul of all watches and that is exactly what attracts all watch collectors. Our factory has more than 10 years of experience in the Swiss and Japan movement watchmaking and watch modification.

This time we selected the Miyota 9015 for our movement, which is well-known for its slimness, reliability and stability. This Japan movement functions with a frequency of 4Hz (28,800 A/h), 24 jewels, 42-hour power reserve, automatic winding, and a sweep second movement. With a movement of height 3.9mm and 26mm overall diameter, it is super slim. Combining both thin body and functionality, this movement is only used in high-class watches. Although the price of this movement is very high, we persist to provide the best we can.

ITALIAN CALF LEATHER STRAP -  INTERCHANGEABLE CATCH

We are all perfectionists, we see the pairing of the best leather strap and BEHRENS watches is an obligation. We provide a high quality fine crafted Italian calf leather strap as usual to give you the most comfortable and pleasant wearing experience. The strap with an interchangeable catch on the lugs side allows you to change your strap without any special tool.

You can also pick our Horween Leather strap; an American leather producer with high recognition in the watch strap industry, has more than 100 years heritage in hand-craft manufacturer technique. This Horween Leather Brown/Honey Brown achieve an aniline finish with a rich and oily texture, widely used in luxury leather goods.

DHL FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE

We care about watches, as much as you. We want our watches to be in the best condition when they are being shipped to your hands. Thus, we would like to provide FREE SHIPPING with DHL professional crew. It is one of the best courier services not only keeps your watch(es) being tracked, but also ensure the best protection throughout the shipping process.

TIMELINE

THE MODEL(ALL REAL PHOTOS)

 

STRAP OPTIONS

 

PRESS RELEASE

We provide a press release and a set of promotional materials for journals and ambassadors. If you want to feature us, please kindly download them at the link below:

 Promotion kit 

You are always welcome to contact us for more marketing support.

email: info@behrenswatches.com

facebook: https://www.facebook.com/behrenswatches

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/behrenswatches

We appreciate every each of your support!

 

 

DECLARATION

Please note that it is our company policy not to lower the declaration value of the goods or mark as gift/sample, as it is illegal in most of the countries, we may be blacklisted and charged by the customs. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.

Risks and challenges

As a new and independent watch brand, we would always like to give out the best materials, technology, and the price to value ratio (PVA) to all of you. However, for the SPACESHIP, the R&D is very time-consuming and costly. We spent 15 months on development and testing, which brought us to this stable yet aesthetic time-telling mechanism. As a result, the price of SPACESHIP is higher than before. If you agree with our direction, please do not hesitate to back us! If you do not mind, please tell your friends and let’s enjoy the magical moments of real watchmaking!

The watch would be fully wound and be tested with the same testing procedure in Day 1.Day 5 The watch keeps putting into an auto-winding machine. The watch would be fully wound and be tested with the same testing procedure on Day 1.Day 7 Before packing, the watch is fully wound(T0) and is tested in five positions again.All our watches have to pass all of the above procedures before delivery. We make sure that the accuracy of our watches is highly maintained in -20~+20 seconds/day. We tested the watches in more positions than the normal quality checkups do - we tested the watches in 5 positions while the others tested in 3 positions only.We need to ensure the watches are adequate in every situation. We then on-wrist tested the sample watches for more than 9 months before we started our Kickstarter campaign. The stableness of BEHRENS ORIGINAL watches is highly guaranteed.OUR MOVEMENT - MIYOTA 9015Movement is the soul of all watches and that is exactly what attracts all watch collectors. Our factory has more than 10 years of experience in the Swiss and Japan movement watchmaking and watch modification.This time we selected the Miyota 9015 for our movement, which is well-known for its slimness, reliability and stability. This Japan movement functions with a frequency of 4Hz (28,800 A/h), 24 jewels, 42-hour power reserve, automatic winding, and a sweep second movement. With a movement of height 3.9mm and 26mm overall diameter, it is super slim. Combining both thin body and functionality, this movement is only used in high-class watches. Although the price of this movement is very high, we persist to provide the best we can.ITALIAN CALF LEATHER STRAP -  INTERCHANGEABLE CATCHWe are all perfectionists, we see the pairing of the best leather strap and BEHRENS watches is an obligation. We provide a high quality fine crafted Italian calf leather strap as usual to give you the most comfortable and pleasant wearing experience. The strap with an interchangeable catch on the lugs side allows you to change your strap without any special tool.You can also pick our Horween Leather strap; an American leather producer with high recognition in the watch strap industry, has more than 100 years heritage in hand-craft manufacturer technique. This Horween Leather Brown/Honey Brown achieve an aniline finish with a rich and oily texture, widely used in luxury leather goods.DHL FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDEWe care about watches, as much as you. We want our watches to be in the best condition when they are being shipped to your hands. Thus, we would like to provide FREE SHIPPING with DHL professional crew. It is one of the best courier services not only keeps your watch(es) being tracked, but also ensure the best protection throughout the shipping process.TIMELINETHE MODEL(ALL REAL PHOTOS) STRAP OPTIONS PRESS RELEASEWe provide a press release and a set of promotional materials for journals and ambassadors. If you want to feature us, please kindly download them at the link below: Promotion kit You are always welcome to contact us for more marketing support.email: info@behrenswatches.comfacebook: https://www.facebook.com/behrenswatchesInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/behrenswatchesWe appreciate every each of your support!  DECLARATIONPlease note that it is our company policy not to lower the declaration value of the goods or mark as gift/sample, as it is illegal in most of the countries, we may be blacklisted and charged by the customs. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.Risks and challengesAs a new and independent watch brand, we would always like to give out the best materials, technology, and the price to value ratio (PVA) to all of you. However, for the SPACESHIP, the R&D is very time-consuming and costly. We spent 15 months on development and testing, which brought us to this stable yet aesthetic time-telling mechanism. As a result, the price of SPACESHIP is higher than before. If you agree with our direction, please do not hesitate to back us! If you do not mind, please tell your friends and let’s enjoy the magical moments of real watchmaking!

story:
BRAVOURE


                      /ˈbreɪv(ə)ri/

noun

courageous behaviour or character.
 

A NEW NAME FOR NEW CREATIONS!

After nearly two years of making watches under the name AXIOM and 3 successful Kickstarter campaigns, we have decided to introduce the BRAVOURE brand, which is more in keeping with the spirit of our watchmaking creations. This new name, synonymous with courage, is in perfect harmony with our current and future watch designs! 

Apart from the name and logo, nothing else is changing: neither the quality of our watches nor our team. Rest assured, we are just the same, only with a new string to our bow! 

VIVE BRAVOURE! 

 

THE SOUL OF FRANCE

The history of France is made up of great moments, discoveries, inventions, victories, defeats, revolutions, and great men. And among these great men, there is no doubt that the most emblematic of all was also one of the most famous in the history of mankind: Napoléon Bonaparte.

A great conqueror and strategist, known for his military genius and modernity. Because of his influence throughout Europe, no one has left such a mark on France's history. Studied, analysed, decried, admired, passionate about science, invincible, fallen, incomparable: who, with any interest in life, can remain indifferent to Napoléon Bonaparte? 

Born on 15th August 1769 on the island of Corsica, he was sent to military school at the age of nine, specialising in artillery thanks to his exceptional skills in calculation. Napoléon quickly rose through the ranks of the Republican Army, thanks to his unparalleled genius and daring, achieving numerous victories and proving his value to the whole Nation.

From battle to battle, from victory to victory, from the scorching deserts of Egypt to the frozen land of Russia, becoming at his peak the Emperor of the French, Napoleon Ier, reigning over part of Europe.

But before that, he was Général Bonaparte.

GENERAL BONAPARTE, BY BRAVOURE

Since the launch of AXIOM in 2017, watchmaking creations have often paid tribute to the men of military history.  

This time, it is a limited edition dedicated to the celebrated Général Bonaparte. What theme could be better suited to announcing the brand's new name than he who lived his life by audacity and bravery!

On a cream white enamel dial, the tricolour cockade, symbol of the French Nation, is represented on the 24 hour dial at 6 o'clock, with red on the outside, blue and white in the centre, in the manner of the Emperor.

The Roman numerals are in dark blue, to recall, once again, the French colours. The elegant hands are all polished and blued.

The Général Bonaparte is limited to 250 pieces, the number of years that separate us from Napoléon Bonaparte's birth, the August 15th of 1769.

 

"Quand on veut on peut, quand on peut on doit." 

On a slightly raised, brushed brass dial protected from oxydation, is engraved the quote "Quand on veut on peut, quand on peut on doit" , which translates as "When we want to we can, when we can we must", attributed to Napoléon Bonaparte.

This quote is represented here in the form of an injunction to use our will to achieve our dreams. It is with pride that it sits at the heart of this latest creation, which is also the first watch presented under the name BRAVOURE!

28,800 a/h, 26 JEWELS, MIYOTA 9100 AUTOMATIC MOVEMENT

With 28,800 vibrations per hour, 26 jewels, and about 40 hours of autonomy, the Japanese Miyota 9100 movement, known for its fabulous precision and flawless reliability, perfectly fulfils its role in the heart of the Général Bonaparte. 

Our watches are made to last. This is also why we use first class materials and components, such as this Miyota 9100 movement, or the domed sapphire glass that elegantly caps this commemorative timepiece.

Moreover, the Général Bonaparte is waterproof up to 200 metres, like all our watches so far, in order to cope with (almost!) all situations.

Made of high quality, dark blue selected calf leather, the two-part strap is a reminder of the Bleu Roi (Royal Blue) woollen uniform, the colour of the National Army and of Général Bonaparte.

A HISTORICAL BACK

Entirely sculpted of 316L stainless steel, the Général Bonaparte has a finely sandblasted finish, contrasting with the brilliance of the dial and hands. The crown, screwed for optimal sealing, is also engraved with our new logo.

Made in the style of a medal, the back commemorates, Général Bonaparte's most brilliant victories. 

This text translates as follows:

FROM YEAR IV TO YEAR VII GENERAL BONAPARTE WON THE BATTLES OF MONTENOTTE, DEGO, MONDOVI, LODI BRIDGE, BORGHETTO, CASTIGLIONE, ROVERETTO, BASSANO, ARCOLE BRIDGE, RIVOLI, LA FAVORITE, VALVASONE, THE PYRAMIDS, ABUKIR, FOR THE FRENCH  REPUBLIC DURING THE CAMPAIGNS IN ITALY AND EGYPT

"YEAR IV TO YEAR VII" (An IV and An VII in French) correspond respectively to the years 1796 and 1799. Following the Revolution of 14th July 1789, the Gregorian calendar was "officially" replaced by the Republican Calendar, beginning in 1792. 

Repealed in 1805, it was sometimes also used in conjunction with the traditional calendar, but it was thought interesting to incorporate it into this timepiece, also representing a tumultuous period and subject to all kinds of passions! 

A HISTORICAL SYMBOL ON THE WRIST

Finding inspiration here in France as usual, the Général Bonaparte is above all an extremely reliable and high quality automatic watch. 

Commemorating the most illustrious figure in our history, whose destiny was as brilliant as it was tragic, the Général Bonaparte is a resolutely unique piece, full of symbols, and with a daring personality, like its inspiration.  

Its success would be a great victory for us, and the beginning of a new adventure for BRAVOURE!

We design our watches from the bottom of our heart, with all our passion. It really means a lot for us. We hope you will enjoy what we create!

VIVE LA REPUBLIQUE, VIVE LA FRANCE!

 

 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

  •  CASE: BRAVOURE Général Bonaparte 
  •  DIAMETER: 42 mm  
  •  CASE THICKNESS: ~14.70 mm 
  •  MATERIAL: 316L stainless steel  
  •  CROWN: Screwed and engraved 
  •  FINISH: Finely sandblasted
  •  GLASS: Domed sapphire glass  
  •  BACK: Screwed back with Napoleon Bonaparte's victories engraved
  •  SEALING: Waterproof up to 200 metres  
  •  MOVEMENT: Automatic, Miyota 9100, 28,800 a/h, 26 jewels 
  •  FUNCTIONS: Hours, minutes and seconds in the center. 24 Hours "Military" dial at 6 o'clock
  •  POWER RESERVE: ~40 hours 
  •  DIAL: Enamel cream white dial with Roman numerals 
  •  HANDS: Polished and blued offset pear-shaped hands 
  •  STRAP MATERIAL: "Bleu Roi" selected calf leather stamped on the back
  •  STRAP DIMENSIONS: 14 mm by 260 mm without buckle / 26 mm by 135 mm
  •  BUCKLE: Stainless steel pin buckle

story:
Short Summary

Meet The Forever Hoodie! It's built to last, meaning this will be the first and last hoodie you buy of this caliber. It's also got all the functionality of a travel hoodie, but this one's guaranteed to hold up no matter how many adventures you go on. Check out all its features below!

We designed our new line of hoodies to be tough. At leif, we care about the environment. That's why all our products are built to have as little of an environmental impact as possible. This hoodie's no different, but we've added a bunch of new innovative features.

 

Features

Our Secured Kangaroo Pocket is a safe place to put your things. It's big enough to accommodate anything up to a small tablet, and you'll never have to worry about anything falling out.

 

Ever get stuck on a long road trip with nowhere to rest your head? With The Forever Hoodie, this is a problem of the past! Conveniently roll your hoodie up into its hood and enjoy a nice, long nap.

 

We've designed the seams on this hoodie to be as durable as possible while also being insanely comfy. Run, jump, and stretch without worrying about tearing a seam! 

 

All the stitching done on our hoodie is done by experts to ensure that everything lasts as long as possible. We paid special attention to stitch density to avoid those pesky stray threads. 

 

We meant it when we said that we built this hoodie to last. Our Ironlock Ribbing ensures that this hoodie will keep its shape. It'll look as good as new, whether it's 5 months or 5 years down the road.

 

We've developed this bamboo blend specifically for the Forever Hoodie. It's a high-density bamboo-cotton blend in French terry. We love this fabric because it's shrink resistant, highly durable, and probably one of the most comfortable things we've felt.

For more on the sustainability and features of this fabric, see our Environmental Commitments section!

 

Hoodie Measurements

The Forever Hoodie comes in many sizes. If you have any questions regarding what size may be right for you, don't hesitate to contact us! 

 

Available Colors

Yosemite Green 

We're huge fans of Yosemite here at leif. One of the most beautiful parts of the valley is the trees, and we've captured that perfect green in this hoodie. 

 

Midnight Black

Nothing beats stargazing under a clear black sky. We've taken inspiration from stargazing and developed this color. It's not quite pitch black, but it's dark enough so that if you squint your eyes, you might just see the specks of stars. 

 

Our Environmental Commitments

Foreword: Many so-called "sustainable brands" are in it purely for the profit. We're different. We're here to send a message to the H&Ms and Zaras of the world. Hopefully, you'll stick with us as we tell you why the issues we're addressing are so important. 

 

Ethical Production

We're partnered with a factory in China renowned for their garment quality. But why China? Doesn't that mean it's cheap quality? Actually, a lot of Chinese factories have been in the garment game for quite a while, meaning that they employ skilled workers who do outstanding work. We also made sure that we're working with a factory that treats their workers right. Our workers receive well above minimum wage and have working hours capped to prevent overworking.


Our "No Plastic" Commitment 

In 2019, our company made a commitment to eliminate all plastics from our supply chain, which includes our products, packaging, and promotional material. So far, we’ve found tremendous success in revising our production processes and developing plastic-free solutions. The majority of synthetics and plastics are used in two areas: fabrics and materials used for garments and polyester wrapping used to package our garments leaving our factories. Since our initial sampling phase, we’ve eliminated plastic completely, packaging and shipping our garments in recycled papers and cardboards. We’ve also eliminated all synthetics from our garments. Instead of using plastic-based prints, we use water-based ink for detailing. And everything from our wash tags to our fabric composition is plastic-free.


Building Stuff that Lasts

Fast fashion is amongst the world’s most wasteful and pollutive industries. With hundreds of millions of individual garments being produced and sold per year, it’s no surprise that companies like H&M and Zara continue to gain popularity. But the comforts of fast fashion come at a large environmental cost. The cheap nature of fast fashion garments results in a high turnover rate, contributing to the growing problem of textile waste. The methods used to mass manufacture cheap garments quickly are also extremely harmful to the environment. Worst of all, the throwaway culture that fast fashion promotes harms us as consumers, encouraging us to consume more and more without regard for our ecological footprint. To break the cycle of fast fashion, we’re building sustainable products that last.

 

Reducing Microplastic Pollution 

Microplastic pollution is a relatively novel form of pollution that presents a serious threat to ocean ecosystems. As an industry, fashion is responsible for contributing to this method of pollution through its extensive use of synthetic textiles, which shed microplastic upon wash. These microplastics flow straight into the ocean, bypassing our water filtration systems. Scientists have estimated that there are anywhere from 15 to 51 trillion individual pieces of microfibers in our oceans. Collectively, they make up 85% of the human-made plastic debris in the ocean, and 35% of that is from clothing.

As part of our "No Plastic" commitment, we've eliminated all possible sources of microplastic shedding from our clothing. Each part of this hoodie, from the clothes tags to the fabric itself, has been constructed without any synthetic material, leaving no room for microplastic shedding.

 

Bamboo

Our bamboo production uses a closed-loop process, meaning that all the water and solvents used are re-used, significantly minimizing the environmental effects of production. These bamboo fibers are then shipped to our yarn mill, where they're combined with our sustainably-grown cotton. The finished fabric is sent off to be dyed, where we apply our signature Yosemite Green, Midnight Black. At this point, the fabric is inspected for any flaws, and once it passes inspection, we send it off to our garment factory, where it is cut and sewn into your hoodie.

 

Our Lifetime Guarantee

We stand behind the products we build. That's why we're offering a lifetime guarantee on this hoodie! We'll gladly replace your garment should any defects or constructional issues arise within the lifespan of your garment. Please note that this only applies to traditional use cases; we will not cover intentional damages or irresponsible usage of our product. 

Please note: our lifetime guarantee protects the owner against manufacturing defects in materials and workmanship for the lifetime of the product. If your product covered by this warranty fails due to a manufacturing defect we will repair it without charge, or replace it, at our discretion. Only original, unaltered and unmodified items and workmanship are covered. This warranty does not cover damage caused by accident, improper care, negligence, normal wear and tear, or the natural breakdown of colors and materials over extended time and use.

 

Risks and Challenges

This isn't our first rodeo. We've already launched a successful project on Kickstarter, and we've taken the experience from that and applied it here. Since our first project, we've been working with our suppliers and manufacturers to improve everything about our product. You can rest assured that you're getting the best possible hoodie for your money.

Since our first project, we've been working with our suppliers and manufacturers to improve everything about our product. You can rest assured that you're getting the best possible hoodie for your money.

story:
Wearables Designed where Form meets Function and Fashion

By merging together jewelry and accessories with headphone functionality, EMMESPHERE's first product line - the Sound Necklaces, aims to bring to the market a whole new interpretation of style and elegance. We've created a product that allows customers to change their headphones-necklace just as they would their jewelry or accessories to mix and match for different occasions, without compromising sound quality. 


 

Listen to Music in Style

A year and a half in the making, from concept to design and development, we are pleased to introduce the EMMESPHERE Sound Necklace. It effortlessly combines seamless wireless connectivity and sound engineering in our fashionably curated necklace.

Emmesphere's Sound Necklaces are equipped with Bluetooth 4.0, which allows users to easily pair with various devices. Wearers could play music, switch songs and adjust volume with the built-in controls at the back of the pendant. The products are compatible with iPhone, iPad, Android phones and most Bluetooth devices.

"Emmesphere" and "Lovesphere" are the first two products to be launched by EMMESPHERE. Both are part our maiden lineup of necklaces embodied with wireless headphones feature, and interchangeable "Qliq!" jewelry pieces. This collection cleverly and beautifully disguise a set of Bluetooth enabled headphones as a piece of jeweled accessory; a useful electronics product embodied in a design which is suitable to pair with your extensive wardrobe, and jewelry pieces that could easily be swapped to change styles.

Ultimately, EMMESPHERE products aims to become part of your jewelry and accessories collection that could be worn to match your fashion needs whether casual or formal.
 

 

The Emmesphere Sound Necklace is available in Silver and Gold, with a choice of a jewelled piece from our Filigree and Crystaline "Qliq!" collections - currently available with Floral Enamel Pattern in Candytuft, Bat Orchid, Daffodil and Swarovski Crystal Rocks in Starry Night, Sandy Beach, Volcanic Ash.

 

The Lovesphere Sound Necklace is EMMESPHERE's flagship product, available only in Gold, and comes with a HANDCRAFTED 9-carat gold plated 925 Sterling Silver double heart jewelled piece mounted with cubic zirconia stone from our precious "Qliq!" collection.


 

"Qliq!" and Change Styles

Easy swap in and out feature allows you to transform the headphones into a beautiful smart jewelry to match your extensive wardrobe and create a stylish edge to any look. A functional jewelry that's sure to turn heads.

 

Designed with Comfort in Mind

EMMESPHERE carefully designed the in-ear ear piece for more ergonomic fit and comfort for listening all day long. With the adjustable necklace chain, the pendant can easily be placed exactly where you want it, so you’re ready to listen to your playlist whenever, wherever.

Uncompromising Sound Quality

True to its name, the Sound Necklace is a harmonized amalgam of aesthetics, ergonomics and good sound. EMMESPHERE while focused on design excellence, is also dedicated to achieving a high performance in both music playback and voice call quality. The meticulous choice of drive unit and tuning of the earphones ensures an immaculate sonic clarity and a balanced sound signature, catering to playback of a wide variety of music genres. The microphone is enhanced to accentuate human voice frequency range and insulate from background and surrounding noise.

Control at Fingertips

Built-in microphone and remote control allows you to take calls, talk to Siri or prompt voice commands, play/pause music, switch songs and adjust volume without touching your phone! Compatible with most phones and mobile devices.

Jewelry Carry Case Charger

Simply put your necklace back into the jewelry carry case and your headphones will be fully charged in under 60 minutes. It makes daily charging effortless and the handy box size makes it convenient for traveling.

Fashionable Tech Gifts

Whatever the occasion, EMMESPHERE headphones-embodied necklaces are the perfect gift for tech-loving and style-conscious fashionistas.

 

Product Details

  • Emmesphere headphones streams music over Bluetooth for up to 4 hours, and with talk time up to 4 hours and standby time of up to 260 hours.
  • Built-in Bluetooth 4.0, remote and enhanced microphone with ambiance noise reduction.
  • Battery size: 80mAh for Emmesphere/Lovesphere; 500mAh for Jewelry Carry Case Charger.
  • Full range 10mm PEK polymer nanocomposite drive unit; 20Hz-20kHz Frequency Range; 103dB±3dB kHz Sensitivity; 32Ω Impedance.
  • Compatible with iPhone, iPad, Android, Computer Notebook, and most Bluetooth devices.
  • Jewelry carry case charger dimension:13cm x 6cm x 3.5 (L x W x H) and weight at 210g.
  • 74cm adjustable headphones chain; 3.7cm pendant width.
  • Microfiber Cleaning Cloth, USB Charger Cable, Quick Start Guide and extra set of Silicone Earbuds (Small) are included in the box.

 
 

1-Year Limited Warranty

  • EMMESPHERE strives to build to perfection. However, sometimes there are inevitable defects in manufacture. Should you experience any issues due to defect with your product within one year (12 months) of purchase, contact us and our warranty ensures you a replacement should the product be found defective. Check out our Warranty Policy for details.
     

EMMESPHERE has all the smart characteristics to make it possibly the best headphones for women and girls. But the story doesn't end here.

 

EMMESPHERE for Elegance and Every Occasion

EMMESPHERE is also thrilled to present our first jewelry line - the Hemisphere Necklace - a magnet-embedded semi-spheric pendant which hangs elegantly from a 925 Sterling Silver snake chain necklace.

The necklace comes in 9-Carat Gold-Plated or Rhodium-Plated 925 Sterling Silver finishes, and the full length of the necklace is 26" with a 2" extender / 66cm with 5cm extender. The magnetic pendant comes in gold and silver finishes.

The pendant is specifically designed to elegantly fit with EMMESPHERE's "Qliq!" jewelry pieces. With the pendant necklace, the "Qliq!" collection is accentuated to another level of elegance and could be worn simply as an accessory for any occasion.
 

 

Timeline    

 

Concept to Production

Our founding members and our engineering team are highly aligned and committed to bring something different and attractive to the market, and has worked endlessly to improve on the performance of the product while maintaining the essence of the design. While concept and development is an integral part of the process, we do not underestimate the importance of manufacturing capability to successfully bring a product to market. As such, our our team has identified at an early stage, the manufacturing partners of both our electronics parts and our jewelry parts, and have since worked hand-in-hand with them to ensure the development is on track and in line with manufacturability at the utmost quality.

 

Production Stage

 

 

The Team

EMMESPHERE is a functional jewelry brand conceived by three ladies; a jewelry designer, a product and user experience specialist and a digital guru. We aim to be the breath of fresh air in the functional wearables category, offering products that breaks the convention of typical consumer electronics design aesthetics, which is characteristic of what we see in the market today. 

Having all worked in the Consumer Electronics sector, the founding team members strongly identify with the latent needs of consumers who look for products which looks good on them while giving them the good performance and a pleasant user experience.

At  EMMESPHERE, we believe that aesthetics should not be compromised as a result of pure conformity to the current norms in designs for consumer electronics. We strive for “form meets function and fashion”.

 

Have a Question? Please contact us at info@emmesphere.com.
For all media and press enquiries please email media@emmesphere.com.
We will be happy to get in touch!

story:
OUR PERSONAL MESSAGE FIRST

We truly hope that you and your loved ones are staying safe and healthy during this crazy time in our lives. Better days are coming. 

PROBLEM

We believe wearing face masks will become the new norm for many months ahead. We know there is a desperate, global shortage of N95 disposable face masks for members of the frontline, healthcare community.  So, what can we wear - you and me - to protect ourselves during our everyday routines that doesn't steal away from the medical supply chain?

SOLUTION

We challenged ourselves to build the best REUSABLE face mask.

 

Our team in Toronto designed reMASK with the following key features:

  • Inside pocket to hold optional N95 replacement filters.

So you can buy replacement filters of your choice, from any source

and save a $$ fortune compared to disposable masks.

For the typical person - your reMASK will pay for itself in 4 - 6 weeks!

  • Sustainable bamboo fabrics for maximum cooling properties and breathability

Super soft, moisture wicking, anti-bacterial, eco-friendly and machine washable

  • Premium sport bamboo binding 

Comfortable, snug and secure personal fit for your face

  •  Advanced ear loop closures

Adjustable fit to minimize pressure points for extended wear

  • Small batch quality - attention to detail

3 layer construction for superior performance

  • One size fits all adults 

Adjustable fit, unisex design and ear loop closures accommodate all adult face sizes

  • Designed in Toronto and made in Toronto

Supporting local small business communities during this worldwide pandemic

​DID YOU KNOW? 

More than 1.5 billion disposable face masks will end-up as landfill in the next 12 months alone?

That's a staggering number.

reMASK is the most environmentally friendly way for you to choose

a personal face mask instead of a disposable one.

Let's save the planet, one reusable face mask at a time!

Important CDC Notification

The CDC is recommending the daily use of cloth face coverings in public settings where other social distancing measures are difficult to maintain, like grocery stores or pharmacies and especially in areas of significant community-based transmission.

Our reMASK does NOT include any filters with purchase.

Our reMASK conforms to all CDC guidelines for a non-medical, face covering.

Our reMASK is NOT intended for use in surgical or clinical or healthcare settings.

Our reMASK is NOT a medical-grade surgical mask or N95 respirator. Surgical masks and N-95 respirators are critical supplies that must continue to be reserved for healthcare workers and other medical first responders.

FUNDING GOAL

We need $7800 to purchase fabrics and materials to begin this project.  Our cut/sew partners here in Toronto are excited to get started!

WHO ARE WE

team koldtec is a lean start-up focused on building beneficial products for you - made locally in small batches - with sustainable materials. And you might remember us from our successful Indiegogo campaign - Headache Halo - from last October. Thanks to your support, we were 100% funded in 2 days! So, you can count on us to push the reMASK project through to completion as soon as possible.

TIMELINE

STRETCH GOAL

We have so many amazing patterns to choose from - let's hit our stretch goal of $39,000 and unlock our Cheetah print in pink and camo.

story:
Greetings from Barcelona!

My name is Ricardo Bernal, I am the creator of AMA Project and Tiger Soul Sunglasses, I was born in Mexico and immigrated to Spain 6 years ago. As an immigrant I've faced a lot of obstacles and complicated situations, situations which have encouraged me to work really hard. When I arrived to this country I launched a small collection of sunglasses, I put them in a suitcase and I went out to the streets of Barcelona in an attempt to sell directly to small stores and boutiques. Eventually I managed to sell my products in street markets, fairs and large music festivals. Three years later I opened my own shop, and at the moment I have 2 boutiques in Barcelona and more than 50 distributors around the world.

Mi nombre es Ricardo Bernal, soy el creador de AMA Project y de Tiger Soul Sunglasses, una marca de gafas de sol, nací en México y emigre a España hace 6 años y como cualquier inmigrante me enfrente a miles de situaciones difíciles, lo cual me impulsó a trabajar mucho. Al llegar a este país lancé una pequeña colección de gafas de sol que puse en una maleta y salí por las calles de Barcelona a vender, de tienda en tienda, y con el tiempo comencé a vender en mercadillos, ferias y grandes festivales musicales. Tres años después abrí mi propia boutique, y en este momento tengo 2 boutiques en Barcelona y mas de 50 puntos de venta alrededor del mundo.



In recent years I've spent around 12 hours working everyday and at one point I began to notice that my eyes, after being over 2 hours in front of the computer, got tired, felt dry and sometimes hurt slightly. I talked to my uncle, who is an eye doctor, and explained my situation. He told me that this was happening due to the blue light emitted by screens of different electronic devices. I decided to do some research and I also found out that blue light alters sleep cycles at night, which worsens people's quality of life. So following my uncles advice, and through personal research I began to develop AMA Project.

Estos últimos años he pasado 12 horas trabajando al día y en un punto comencé a notar que mis ojos, al estar mas de 2 horas frente al ordenador, se cansaban, se sentían secos y a veces dolían ligeramente. Consulté a mi tío oftalmológo, le explique mi situación, y me dijo que esto sucedía debido a la luz azul emitida por las pantallas de diferentes dispositivos electrónicos. Después decidí hacer un poco de investigación y encontré que la luz azul altera también altera  los ciclos de sueño por la noche, lo cual empeora la calidad de vida de las personas. Entonces siguiendo los consejos de mi tío, y a través de investigación propia comencé a desarrollar AMA Project. 
 


 

The mission of AMA Project is to produce high quality anti blue light glasses, forget about fatigue, headaches, dry eyes and improve your health. We offer four different models of glasses: three of them are made of fully flexible Italian acetate, lightweight and stylish.  the fourth model is made of rigid metal. These glasses will protect the eyesight and improve the quality of sleep of any person who spends several hours in front of any blue light source (computers, mobile phones, tablets). 

La misión de AMA Project es producir gafas anti luz azul de alta calidad, Olvídate de la fatiga, dolores de cabeza y ojos secos, mejora tu salud. Ofrecemos cuatro modelos diferentes de gafas: tres de ellos son de acetato Italiano totalmente flexibles, y el cuarto modelo esta hecho de metal rígido. Estas gafas se encargaran de proteger la vista y mejorar la calidad de sueño de cualquier persona que pase varias horas frente a cualquier pantalla de luz azul (ordenadores, móviles, tablets)



In addition to solving a problem that many of us face, I want to contribute to a very important cause in a personal way. AMA Project has partnered with Medical and Social Assistance, a non-profit organization located in Mexico City, focused on helping low-income children and adults with vision problems. To know more about what MAS does to help these communities, click on this link. (Website in Spanish) We will donate 10% of each sale to this organization.

Ademas de resolver un problema que muchos de nosotros enfrentamos, quiero impactar al mundo de una forma muy personal. AMA Project se ha asociado con Medicina y Asistencia Social, una organización sin ánimo de lucro ubicada en Ciudad de México, enfocada en ayudar a niños y adultos de muy bajos recursos con problemas de visión. Para saber mas sobre lo que hace MAS para ayudar a estas comunidades da click en este enlace. Donaremos el 10% de cada venta a esta organización.
 

The anti-blue light glasses: AMA PROJECT

MODELO BORN:

  • Frame material / Material de la montura: Flexible Italian acetate
  • Lens specs / Características del lente: CR39, anti scratch, anti fog (anti empañamiento) 
  • Dimensions / Medidas: 13.8 cm width (ancho) | 4.5 cm height (alto) | 14.5 cm temple (pata)
  • Color : Clear tortoise / Carey claro.
  • Free shipping / Envío Gratis.
     

MODELO GÓTICO:

  • Frame material / Material de la montura: Flexible Italian acetate
  • Lens specs / Características del lente: CR39, anti scratch, anti fog (anti empañamiento) 
  • Dimensions / Medidas: 14 cm width (ancho) | 5.3 cm height (alto) | 14.8 cm temple (pata)
  • Color : Dark tortoise / Carey obscuro
  • Free shipping / Envío Gratis
     

MODELO GRACIA:

  • Frame material / Material de la montura: Flexible Italian acetate
  • Lens specs / Características del lente: CR39, anti scratch, anti fog (anti empañamiento) 
  • Dimensions / Medidas: 13.5 cm width (ancho) | 4.3 cm height (alto) | 14.5 cm temple (pata)
  • Color : Dark tortoise / Carey obscuro.
  • Free shipping / Envío Gratis.
     

MODELO BARCELONETA:

  • Frame material / Material de la montura: Rigid metal 
  • Lens specs / Características del lente: CR39, anti scratch, anti fog (anti empañamiento) 
  • Dimensions / Medidas: 13.8 cm width (ancho) | 4.9 cm height (alto) | 14.7 cm temple (pata)
  • Color : Golden / Dorado
  • Free shipping / Envío Gratis
     

The sunglasses: TIGER SOUL 

MODELO ANNA:

  • Frame material / Material de la montura: Polyethylene
  • Lens specs / Características del lente: Polarized, UV400, Cat 3
  • Dimensions / Medidas: 14.9 cm width (ancho) | 4 cm height (alto) | 14.5 cm temple (pata)
  • Color : Dark tortoise / Carey obscuro
  • Free shipping /  Envío Gratis
     

MODELO MARIA :

  • Frame material / Material de la montura: Polyethylene
  • Lens specs / Características del lente: Polarized, UV400, Cat 3
  • Medidas: 14.3 cm width (ancho) | 5 cm height (alto) | 14.5 cm temple (pata)
  • Color : Dark tortoise / Carey obscuro
  • Free shipping / Envío Gratis
     

MODELO ISABEL:

  • Frame material / Material de la montura: Polyethylene
  • Lens specs / Características del lente: Polarized, UV400, Cat 3
  • Medidas: 14 cm width (ancho) | 4 cm height (alto) | 14.5 cm temple (pata)
  • Color : Black / Negro
  • Free shipping / Envío Gratis
     

MODELO PAULA:

  • Frame material / Material de la montura: Polyethylene
  • Lens specs / Características del lente: Polarized, UV400, Cat 3
  • Medidas: 14.2 cm width (ancho) | 5 cm height (alto) | 15 cm temple (pata)
  • Color : Matte black / Negro mate
  • Free shipping / Envío Gratis
     

Your AMA Project Glasses + Accessories


 

A Message For Everyone


Further reading / Para saber más 

  • Blue light has a dark side (English) - https://www.health.harvard.edu/staying-healthy/blue-light-has-a-dark-side​
  • Luz azul y ritmos de sueño (Spanish) - https://www.iguzzini.com/es/lighthinking/luz-azul-y-ritmos-de-sueno-y-vigilia-una-relacion-una-relacion-dificil-pero-necesaria/
     

Links / Enlaces

  • Tiger Soul Sunglasses 
    Instagram - instagram.com/tiger.soul
    Facebook - facebook.com/tiger.soul.clothing
    tigersoulsunglasses.com
     
  • AMA Project.
    Instagram - instagram.com/a.m.a_project
    Facebook - facebook.com/AMA-project
     
  • MAS (Medicina y Asistencia Social) 
    Facebook - facebook.com/MasFundacion/
    mas.org.mx

As an immigrant I've faced a lot of obstacles and complicated situations, situations which have encouraged me to work really hard. When I arrived to this country I launched a small collection of sunglasses, I put them in a suitcase and I went out to the streets of Barcelona in an attempt to sell directly to small stores and boutiques. Eventually I managed to sell my products in street markets, fairs and large music festivals. Three years later I opened my own shop, and at the moment I have 2 boutiques in Barcelona and more than 50 distributors around the world.Mi nombre es Ricardo Bernal, soy el creador de AMA Project y de Tiger Soul Sunglasses, una marca de gafas de sol, nací en México y emigre a España hace 6 años y como cualquier inmigrante me enfrente a miles de situaciones difíciles, lo cual me impulsó a trabajar mucho. Al llegar a este país lancé una pequeña colección de gafas de sol que puse en una maleta y salí por las calles de Barcelona a vender, de tienda en tienda, y con el tiempo comencé a vender en mercadillos, ferias y grandes festivales musicales. Tres años después abrí mi propia boutique, y en este momento tengo 2 boutiques en Barcelona y mas de 50 puntos de venta alrededor del mundo.In recent years I've spent around 12 hours working everyday and at one point I began to notice that my eyes, after being over 2 hours in front of the computer, got tired, felt dry and sometimes hurt slightly. I talked to my uncle, who is an eye doctor, and explained my situation. He told me that this was happening due to the blue light emitted by screens of different electronic devices. I decided to do some research and I also found out that blue light alters sleep cycles at night, which worsens people's quality of life. So following my uncles advice, and through personal research I began to develop AMA Project.Estos últimos años he pasado 12 horas trabajando al día y en un punto comencé a notar que mis ojos, al estar mas de 2 horas frente al ordenador, se cansaban, se sentían secos y a veces dolían ligeramente. Consulté a mi tío oftalmológo, le explique mi situación, y me dijo que esto sucedía debido a la luz azul emitida por las pantallas de diferentes dispositivos electrónicos. Después decidí hacer un poco de investigación y encontré que la luz azul altera también altera  los ciclos de sueño por la noche, lo cual empeora la calidad de vida de las personas. Entonces siguiendo los consejos de mi tío, y a través de investigación propia comencé a desarrollar AMA Project.  
 
The mission of AMA Project is to produce high quality anti blue light glasses, forget about fatigue, headaches, dry eyes and improve your health. We offer four different models of glasses: three of them are made of fully flexible Italian acetate, lightweight and stylish.  the fourth model is made of rigid metal. These glasses will protect the eyesight and improve the quality of sleep of any person who spends several hours in front of any blue light source (computers, mobile phones, tablets). La misión de AMA Project es producir gafas anti luz azul de alta calidad, Olvídate de la fatiga, dolores de cabeza y ojos secos, mejora tu salud. Ofrecemos cuatro modelos diferentes de gafas: tres de ellos son de acetato Italiano totalmente flexibles, y el cuarto modelo esta hecho de metal rígido. Estas gafas se encargaran de proteger la vista y mejorar la calidad de sueño de cualquier persona que pase varias horas frente a cualquier pantalla de luz azul (ordenadores, móviles, tablets)In addition to solving a problem that many of us face, I want to contribute to a very important cause in a personal way. AMA Project has partnered with Medical and Social Assistance, a non-profit organization located in Mexico City, focused on helping low-income children and adults with vision problems. To know more about what MAS does to help these communities, click on this link. (Website in Spanish) We will donate 10% of each sale to this organization.
Ademas de resolver un problema que muchos de nosotros enfrentamos, quiero impactar al mundo de una forma muy personal. AMA Project se ha asociado con Medicina y Asistencia Social, una organización sin ánimo de lucro ubicada en Ciudad de México, enfocada en ayudar a niños y adultos de muy bajos recursos con problemas de visión. Para saber mas sobre lo que hace MAS para ayudar a estas comunidades da click en este enlace. Donaremos el 10% de cada venta a esta organización. 
The anti-blue light glasses: AMA PROJECT

story:
The Reunite The People clothing brand and movement

We have all experienced a moment which after it passed us by, we reflected and thought, we could have responded or acted in a different way... "a better way". It’s easy to look back in retrospect and think "we are better than that", but it’s far harder to challenge ourselves to be better in that moment

We live in a time where being better has to start with us. As Americans we can show each other how to be more kind, considerate, and consciously choose to understand each other. If we treat each other as equals, with the mutual respect people owe one another, we can amplify our humanity. Through communities, towns, states, and beyond we will grow and will never again need to look back to say "we can be better than that". If we can start this movement at home, we can work to being the global citizens we ought to be.

Reunite The People is more than just red, white, and blue. We celebrate and nurture all of our country’s interconnection and inclusivity, and we can spread that message everywhere. We stand for each other and as such a portion of our profits goes back to think tanks and charities promoting unity in our country and beyond.

Our differences are our strength, and combined we are a better whole.

Where we are today

Reunite The People isn't a concept. It is a fully functioning brand with a succinct purpose - promoting equality and unity. After months of research and preparation, we have begun manufacturing our products with handpicked vendors, and we're already distributing them through Amazon. Current sales channels are our website (https://reunitethepeople.us) and its connectors, Amazon, social media (Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, and @rtphq on Snapchat), and word of mouth. Our 2018/19 roadmap has expansion into: social media shoppable posts, digital marketing campaigns, and "brick and mortar" pop-ups at various cultural and music events throughout the United States.

Given we've combined strong branding, the highest quality in manufacturing, and the inclusion of the message of togetherness over all else, the initial reactions to our brand and product line have been exceptionally positive. Notably our Camouflage Jackets and All Black Trucker Hats have become mainstays in our selected "swag box" recipients' wardrobes. As a result some select products have even made their way into celebrity and influencer closets. We fully expect these same personalities to actively promote our brand and message to their followers now that we've launched our website and associated media support.

Our product line currently includes: the Camouflage Jacket with patches, the All Black Trucker Hat, the licensed Multicam Trucker Hat, unisex t-shirts, a women's scoop neck t-shirt and tank top, and an exclusive line of pins developed with ThePinCartel. Additional products such as a Reunite The People star-patterned shemagh scarf and handkerchiefs are currently under development with an anticipated early 2019 release.

Where we're going

Our primary driver will always remain the same - equality and interconnection between humans. The brand strives to bring people together. When recognized, it will spur conversations like "how did you hear about them?", “have you seen who they work with?”, “which pins do you have?” These interactions will hopefully lead to a broader conversation about our inherent messaging and how each individual associated is trying to make a difference. Similar to a "pay it forward" concept but with an already entrenched differentiator as the support has already been given, we inspire people to think, discuss, refine, and act. One person's positive actions compound when shared socially and communicated to others. This is truly a "micro to macro" effort fueled by good intentions, backed by great branding. Our expertise in use of social media strategy to help share and develop this ripple effect is key to our growth plans.

So, what's next? By backing us, you're not just supporting financially, you're becoming a part of the Reunite The People movement. You're joining the "how we can be better to each other" conversation. Of course we'll be leveraging our collective's talents in marketing, design, and business to expand our operations. But, the organic growth from our backers and customers just talking with each other about why they supported us is so important to our future.

Who we are

We are a team of people who collectively have strength across multiple business lines. Our various backgrounds not only live and breathe our brand values, but also mean we are motivated by making this brand a success not purely for our own financial gain. This is a brand that grew out of conversations and interactions between us as American’s reflecting on what we can do to support our country be the place in can be, both nationally and globally. We know we have high aspirations for our potential impacts, but if we help just one of our partners think differently and act in a "better way", we will be proud of that contribution.

Our team includes:

  • Blake Janover (CEO, Partner): Serial entrepreneur. The guy behind home.loans and some other great sites. Loves successes that come from shared, moral visions. A reader who's a leader. Great with numbers. Believer that dry humor always prevails.
  • Joel Bouckaert (Founder, COO, Partner): Veteran. Grower of companies from the ground, up. Recently accepted to UNC Kenan-Flagler Business School. Doesn't take life too seriously. Striving daily to be a human.
  • Harlen Shangold (Chief of Diversity, Partner): Bachelors in Psychology (minor in Education) from Colgate University. Masters in Education from Harvard University. Licensed counselor. Passionate about diversity and equality coupled with early childhood education.
  • Keysha Boddie (Chief of Community, Partner): Bachelors in Business Administration from Kennesaw State University. All about healthy living, yoga, and the great outdoors (while still finding time for wine). Deeply committed to social justice.
  • Haas Carter (Creative, Partner): Art Director for an awesome LA-based agency. Ole Miss and The Creative Circus Alumni. Enjoys conspiracy theories, cymatics, and Frank Sinatra.
  • Karl Baker (Creative, Partner): Founder of ThePinCartel. Sometimes called Rachel (given he's still using his girlfriend's Google Hangouts account). Expert-level drone crasher (really).

Special mentions definitely go out to our photographer, Natalia Aguilera (@natalyaphoto), and videographer, Camilo Zack (@camilozack). They have been key in helping us bring this amazing brand and movement to life.

How this works

We have figured out our design, manufacturing, and distribution processes. We have a current strategy and we're already generating revenue. So, instead of having to go through those motions once you back us, it's just a matter of us completing orders from an already established supply chain while expanding our offerings.

Why the longer delivery dates? Well, we're hoping that a good portion of the Indiegogo community see the benefits of backing us and becomes a part of our community. To be safe, we'd like to "under promise and over perform." While we say that some items might not ship until November or December, it's very possible that many backers' rewards will ship much faster. The overriding goal is of course to send you the highest quality products by the deadlines we've set.

The next steps for us are: continuing to develop our distribution channels, our go-to market channels, and our brand offerings. We would love for you to be a part of that with us, and we’re looking forward to working with you.

Risks and challenges

We are fully dedicated to making this brand and project a success. However, because we are not purely financially motivated to make it a success, we do have other avenues that help us individually make ends meet. We see this as a strength as we will never devolve from our message and take a shortcut in the pursuit of easy dollars.

We are passionate about the brand and message and it could be described as a niche in the landscape of clothing and culture. Again, we are working hard to develop our brand strategy to align to multi-channel, multi-sector networks. This approach will work to our advantage as we can proactively identify and partner with the right people to promote and grow our brand and identity.

We have a great team working behind us and are further along than a lot of companies who need funding. We are well equipped to make this venture a success and are looking to this market to help accelerate our efforts and messaging only by sharing our brand, message, and product.

story:
Features

Kisetsu's cut-away corners

We don't cut corners when it comes to the design, but the wallet literally has cut-away corners to improve structural rigidity.

Zipless Coin and Utility Compartment

The tuck-in-and-out flap mechanism, also a signature of the brand, is another crafty idea to reduce thickness that a conventional zip brings. Psst, this compartment also sports a SIM card slot and SD card slot.

You'll always have a pen

Each Kaizen wallet comes with its own aluminium travel pen (and refill!) to keep you covered in all situations.

Store your cards in the right compartments

Quick pull-out compartment for your less used cards and a quick access compartment for your most used card.

Utility cash compartment

And of course, the "must-have" cash compartment. It also features two additional card slots.

The wallet measures just 8.2cm x 10cm when closed, making it the perfect fit in your hand, and even your front pocket!

Features At A Glance 

Every wallet is RFID protected (with one card compartment on the left non-RFID for easy daily commuting). It fits 8-10 cards, US bills, has a unique zipless compartment for coins (with a designated SD + SIM card slot inside) and finally, an aluminium travel pen that comes with every wallet.

Materials 

The wallet is made from Crazy Horse Leather, a signature of Kisetsu and our top selling leather variant for the last couple of years. Despite what its name suggests, Crazy Horse Leather is actually full grain cowhide that has been specially treated with wax to create its unique aesthetic and quality. Buff out light scratches and watch the colour change as you bend the leather - Crazy Horse Leather is a super durable and popular alternative to mainstream leathers.

Crazy Horse Leather also develops a patina faster than other leathers, ageing beautifully through daily use. Check out the diagram below to see how it transforms from a matte uneven colouring to a glossy, smooth and even finish.

 Available in 4 colour ways, choose from Graphite Black, Wine, Vintage Brown, Steel Blue(left to right). Hunter Green is also offered as a new colour! 

RFID blocking fabric - Protect yourself from unauthorized scammers that could steal your credit card information. The wallet is double lined with RFID fabric, ensuring that you stay protected out and about. For easy daily commuting, make use of the non-RFID card slot behind the coin compartment to tap your transport cards.

Crowdfunding (InDemand) Exclusive

As a crowdfunding exclusive, get the chance to make your wallet unique with your initials (up to 3 characters) in gold or silver foil! Do refer to the reward tiers for more information regarding the additional amount to pledge if you would like your wallet personalised!

Rewards (in USD)

All backers will be entitled to free shipping worldwide! 

Note: All rewards will be shipped from our headquarters in Singapore and may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees levied by the destination country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient; Kisetsu has no control over these charges, nor can we predict what they may be.

For every wallet you back on Indiegogo, you will receive: 

• 1x Crazy Horse Leather Kaizen wallet in the colour of your choice 
• 1x Aluminium travel swivel pen with refill 
• 1x Plush velvety drawstring pouch 
• 1x Infographic regarding the Kaizen wallet 
• Housed in a custom Kisetsu Kapsule box

Timeline

All backers will receive their Kaizen wallets by May 2019 latest.

Featured On

Over the years, our wallets have been featured and well loved by many around the world. If you would like to feature our wallets, reach out to us for a press kit and physical prototypes of the new Kaizen!

Email us at hello@kisetsu.co

We The People Live Funding

Are you in Singapore? Check out our live funding pop up at We The People store at Millenia Walk (#02-57) to check out the wallet in person before you pledge!

Socials

Special Thanks

We would like to thank We The People, Ben & Izuan from FOURTHREE, our beta testers, Sam YH. 

About Kisetsu

We're Team Kisetsu, and we've been fiddling and tinkering with product design for 5 years now. We retail our products on our website. Till date, we've sold about 80,000 wallets worldwide. (Thank you all for the support!) 

You might also remember us from our previous campaigns on Kickstarter: 

We're committed to what we do and we love doing it. We can't wait to get the Kaizen Wallet into your hands. We promise you'll love it just as much as we do.

Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient; Kisetsu has no control over these charges, nor can we predict what they may be.For every wallet you back on Indiegogo, you will receive: • 1x Crazy Horse Leather Kaizen wallet in the colour of your choice • 1x Aluminium travel swivel pen with refill • 1x Plush velvety drawstring pouch • 1x Infographic regarding the Kaizen wallet • Housed in a custom Kisetsu Kapsule boxTimelineAll backers will receive their Kaizen wallets by May 2019 latest.Featured OnOver the years, our wallets have been featured and well loved by many around the world. If you would like to feature our wallets, reach out to us for a press kit and physical prototypes of the new Kaizen!Email us at hello@kisetsu.coWe The People Live FundingAre you in Singapore? Check out our live funding pop up at We The People store at Millenia Walk (#02-57) to check out the wallet in person before you pledge!SocialsSpecial ThanksWe would like to thank We The People, Ben & Izuan from FOURTHREE, our beta testers, Sam YH. About KisetsuWe're Team Kisetsu, and we've been fiddling and tinkering with product design for 5 years now. We retail our products on our website. Till date, we've sold about 80,000 wallets worldwide. (Thank you all for the support!) You might also remember us from our previous campaigns on Kickstarter: We're committed to what we do and we love doing it. We can't wait to get the Kaizen Wallet into your hands. We promise you'll love it just as much as we do.

story:
We are Erik and Arianne. Both of us are former business students at HEC Montreal. Arianne also studied visual arts. We are now ready to launch our own project. So here it is!

We have a dream! A dream where fashion meets our ecological views. We are so thrilled to share our project with you.

 

 

 

 

YOU ARE WHAT YOU WEAR!

We first wanted to make sure to meet our ecological and style standards. We worked with a team of designers and got much feedback from future customers and well established fashion players. We are very proud to present our new men and women eco jeans collection.

This campaign is about helping us pursue our dream by raising funds. Starting a business is a long and bumpy ride. We already invested ourselves and a good amount of money in this project but we are at a point that we really need you to help us make this happen. By donating you are not only investing in a project that cares for the betterment of the environment, you are also encouraging a new way to conceive jeans. Let's be a part of this movement so eventually more people can follow this eco conscious clothing path. 

 

 

 

 

WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET

Best case scenario we would raise 25 000$ for the following. In the eventuality we don’t reach our goal, here is a list of what we want from the most important and urgent to the least.

 

  • Jeans production
  • An event to lauch our brand new Nékolime collection
  • Web site programing
  • Setting mix marketing plan
  • Fabrics
  • Preparing for the next collection (design, patterns, samples, etc)

 

 

 

 

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Spread the word! Tell everyone you know how awesome this project is. Like us on Facebook, blow up the Twittersphere talking about Nékolime and add our Twitter handle, blog it, or promote it any way you can think of. 

 

We would be glad to hear from you! If you have any questions or comments email us at info@nekolime.com.
