story:
CAMPAIGN THANKS:

I'm immensely grateful for the support of my peeps. Whatever your contribution, knowing that you believed and got behind me means SO much. Ground-up production will begin on a small scale, and every dollar will help to buy materials and make samples to take pre-orders.

DERBY GURL will rise, in true grass roots style. 

BIG UPS!

Lux

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Thanks for visiting my campaign for DERBY GURL, a roller derby-inspired fashion line. I’m Lux Mayhem, and after many years in the fashion industry, roller derby has become my designing muse. DERBY GURL is for skaters, fans, and modern women—derby-powered fashion, whether or not you strut around a track!

DERBY GURL’s look is based on (1) the empowered femininity of roller derby (2) the aesthetics and culture of derby (3) the athleticism of derby. The high-quality fashion pieces are classic camp-punk-burlesque, with styles for females in their teens or 40's.

And DERBY GURL is more than just great fashions—10% of all net profits will be donated to roller derby leagues, so that young girls and women can gain the benefits of derby. What benefits, you ask? Self-esteem, hardcore athleticism, a sense of community, alter egos, and the possibility of becoming future Olympians! Playing roller derby enhances the lives of girls and women all over the world, including mine.

I believe in DERBY GURL and have invested my time and savings into getting it this far. Now in the grassroots spirit of roller derby, I am turning to you to help produce and launch this fashion line. You can be a DERBY GURL pioneer! In return, you will get rad fashions and the opportunity to be Rollerella’s derby wife, man crush, or even her blockers. And you can be the first to wear limited edition DERBY GURL clothes.

I'm proud to call myself a derby gurl, and am extremely excited to dedicate myself to sharing my derby-inspired fashions with the world. Your $5 or $500 will help shape my passion into roller derby DNA, and in return you will receive sweet perks….oh, and a hug, a whip, or even a Pegassist. ( ;

                                                                 ~

Important Points:

1. Why is this fashion line significant? Because it's greater than fashion or clothing. It's about taking part in the global phenomenon that is roller derby, and the culture and style it inspires. DERBY GURL sends a message to women everywhere that it's okay to celebrate your curves and athleticism and indie spirit.

2. Why does this fashion line need to exist? Because of the positive social impact of roller derby. And because DERBY GURL celebrates the empowered femininity of roller derby unlike any other fashion line.

3. Why should it happen now? Because roller derby is the world's fastest growing sport, and it’s time for a derby-inspired fashion line that reflects its culture and aesthetics. The global revival has spawned nearly 50,000 derby gurls, who are synonymous with hardcore, empowered athletes.

4. What makes DERBY GURL different than other fashions? There's no dedicated derby-inspired fashion line that embraces skaters, fans, and modern women (with a unisex bag for gents, too). DERBY GURL celebrates roller derby and female athleticism with skateworthy style!

                                                                     ~

Part 1 - REWARDS for being DERBY GURL pioneers, and LOOKBOOK:

*Please see sidebar Perks and the gallery page for descriptions and larger images. Some items are only Lookbook upcoming fashions.

ALL supporters will be etched onto Rollerella’s heart as one of the first beloved supporters of DERBY GURL!

                                                                      ~

Part 2 - Why should you help? Because...

  1. You are unbelievably kind, generous, and fun-loving.
  2. You want to support an “undiscovered” global phenomenon, contributing to the positive societal impact of roller derby.
  3. You are a derby gurl or fan or human being who wants to help a derby business donate 10% of its net profits to roller derby leagues.
  4. You dig being a part of a groundbreaking roller derby fashion line.
  5. You like good Karma.

*Other ways you can help: It’s easy! Please donate, forward and help spread our campaign. Just use the Indiegogo tools to share via Twitter, Facebook or embed it on your blog.

                                                                       ~

Part 3 - How will your contribution be used?

Estimated 65% of your contributions will go towards:

  • Fabrics and materials to be used in production.
  • Pattern making, samples, and actual production, which includes clothing labels, grading (sizing), cutting, sewing, and finishing. Screen printing, minimum manufacturer orders, and related production expenses.

Estimated 25% of pledged goal will go to:

  • Hire an assistant from the derby community, to lend a helping hand.
  • Purchase additional supplies, fabrics, and materials.

Estimated 10% of pledged goal will go towards:

  • Website maintenance.
  • Marketing, publicity and promotion.

*After Indiegogo fees, any funds donated exceeding operating, production, launching and marketing expenses will go to the DERBY GURL 2013 TOUR, in which Lux Mayhem will set up shop at roller derby bouts across the nation, and hopefully the world, to introduce DERBY GURL to fans and derby gurls!

                                                                    ~

DERBY GURL Promise

My sincere oath is that with grassroots determination and a roller derby ethic, I will deliver unique derby-inspired fashions and make you proud to say, “I supported DERBY GURL from the beginning!”

Your contribution will go directly to a great cause. Not only will you champion derby-empowerment, but you will enable DERBY GURL to donate 10% of net profits to derby leagues all over the world.

I thank you in advance for your pledge, from the bottom of my derby gurl heart.

                                                                  ~ ~ ~

story:
Our fashion brand Rin Designs was born in 2010, when the fashion designer Tatiana Donate was completing her last year at Kroom Dos Fashion School in Madrid. The idea was born out of a desire to express herself being completely respectful with the environment and the animals. After encountering the usual wall that eco clothes often have, the problem of being either very hippie or very sober in style, we decided to bring our idea a step further.

We are three entrepreneurs very compromised with the environment and the animal welfare. After many years trying to make this project a reality only with our own resources (unfortunately very limited), we finally decided to use this crowdfunding website to get the necessary funds we need to make everything right. To create a proper collection a lot of work and money is needed. It does not matter if we spend every single minute in the project or how much talent we have. A fashion collection needs a lot of resources, most of which can not even be appreciated at the end, and it needs workers because we can not do everything in our own even giving all of our time.

We are part of the same family (mother and two sisters) and our resources are limited. We even had to emigrate to other countries to find a job, and remain separated in different countries.

Despite what some people say, we think that now it is a good moment to start a business. Our society needs new companies that can provide new jobs, not only to us but also to other people we will need, such as a pattern designers, dressmakers, models, photographers and so many more.

We do know that the amount of money we aim is high, and probably you may ask, "why do you need that much money?"

Well, to be honest, if we did not care about the environment, where the fabrics are coming from, who or how the clothes are made, much less money would probably be needed, but…

That is not our case. We care about the planet and all the creatures living in it. That is why we can not accept cotton cultivated with pesticides or toxic products that damage the environment and the human beings. We can not accept having our clothes made in a factory where workers are being treated unfairly or where they employ children. The quality of the products is important to us too. We want our products to last as much as possible, and we want to make products that everyone can wear, regardless of the age or the kind of body.
Our idea is to donate a percentage of profits to humanitarian organizations and for the rights of animals.



How we create it???

  • We make our products with 100% ecologic and cruelty-free fabrics and materials, betting for sustailability, fair-trade and social responsability. 
    all products used in the manufacture will be certified ecofriendly and high quality with organic fabrics, mostly, Bamboo, Cotton, Tencel and recycled products like polyester from recycled bottles.
  • Manufacturing will take place 100% in Europe, especially in United Kingdom and Spain (designer's place of origin) in small workshops encouraging employment.
  • We produce the patterns and samples of the collection that will launch our project which willl consist of approximately 150 garments.

    - The final garments will  differ in colours and fabricks from the image shown in this project and as you can see, will be composed of many more variety of clothes that we can show here.
  • Our financial amounts goes up to 26.968 Pounds needed to invest in:
    -Textiles and accesoties.
    -Confection
    -R+D investment

  • -Fashion show set desing and catwalk, videos and photos.

  • • In case we could not get the total funds we aim, we would use the money to make the collection reach as far as possible.

What we offer to the fashion world?

  • An open vision, not limited by trends and sales by sales.
  • Fashion is a kind of Art and we want to treat it like that; As a part of our life we can not do this by sacrificing our planet or the lives of innocent animals.
  • We offer a personalized service in which our customers can choose the size (even specific sizes, such as extra large breast), special measurements of the models according to individual needs, with the option of choosing a different color within the range we offer. 
    Costume orders will cost the same price but can take longer time to be delievered depending of the fabric availability, between 2 weeks and 1 month.
  • Exclusiveness. Our clothes (the non personalized ones) will be limited to a certain number of identical items (never more than 100), which makes them unique and without costing a high price.
  • Price. Our clothes will have a medium cost, despite their eco and vegan characteristics and their exclusiveness. The price will be the lowest possible, making them affordable to as many people as possible.
  • Worldwide Sales. Sales will be done on-line and by multibranding stores that want to purchase our models (we already have severals offers), being able to bring our clothes to every country in the world.


Risks 

Invest in a new collection as a fashion brand that is just starting could be a big risk and we are aware that the money we ask for is a fairly high amount, but we offer a great challenge to fashion and our more than 10.000 followers on Facebook make it a very interesting risk to take.

Other ways to help


We know that not everyone can help with money but there are other ways to help. Share our project in Indiegogo, facebook, wherever you like, or mention it to anyone you think could be interested in it.

Rewards 

Rewards will be given after the donation period ends. Some rewards, like the ones that include items from the collection, will be delivered after we finish their production.

We expect to deliver all the rewards by June 2014.


*Why do we offer a discount instead of a garment????

Well, we offer a good discount for one whole year, so you can buy the garments you want at lower prices, making it possible to even recover the funds with which you contributed and respecting your taste preferences. We will not choose for you, nor offer a limited number of models to choose from, nor a particular less quality garment as a reward (something usual in this kind of campaigns). Nothing like that! You can choose anything from our store, or choose different items and pay a lot less for them.




If we reach our goal we will give an additional reward to everyone who has contributed with 20GBP or more, which will be a kerchief, a brand icon.

story:
Who are we?

We are Rainy Day Anime, a store in Colorado Springs, Colorado, devoted to Japanese Animation, Manga and Japanese pop culture. We’ve been in business for almost 4 years as a store front and 7 years as a vendor at local cons. At Rainy Day Anime we try to be more than just a store, we want to be a valued part of the Anime community. We do this by being knowledgeable and friendly, running cool events, like viewings and gaming parties, and just creating a positive atmosphere for people to geek out in. with We get really excited when people show their love for the store, whether its open enthusiasm upon their arrival, fan art of our mascot, or rave reviews online like this: (http://english121evaluations.wordpress.com/2012...).

Why Crowdfunding?

A lot of people have suggested we sell our own T-shirts, bags, and even umbrellas (We are Rainy Day Anime after all). Our 2 biggest hurdles with this is coming up with the money and deciding on a design, so it seemed like a good idea to us to set it up were you can preorder these items and you only get charged, when we have enough to do it. Hence:  Crowd funding!

We will be promoting this campaign in store, through our website, Facebook, and other social media. Spreading the word has been and will be the key to our success. While this mainly affects our local anime community, we hope this can be a launching point, to increased national and possibly international attention.

Where is the money going?

First and foremost this is to make Rainy Day Anime branded merchandise. We will need a base of $3000 to get it going. This will Fund store themed bumper stickers, reusable shopping bags, and T-Shirts. We would like to get about twice as many printed as are backed through this campaign so we can use them for future promotions and sales.  Additional money will go towards having more products made (See our stretch goals), ensuring the quality of these products and improving the store. Improvements we would like to have includes new displays, a bigger, better inventory more focused on what you want, a barcode scanner for speedy checkout, and more website support. We will consult you the backers on what improvement you most want to support.

What is the time line?

Starting July 1st and ending July 31st. This will coincide with an art contest we are currently running which will also end on July 31st. (http://rainydayanime.com/events/art-contest/)

We plan to spend August Finalizing the designs.

We plan to get everything ordered and printed in Sept.

We will do a release Party in Oct. to Coincide with our 4 year anniversary.

This should give us plenty of time to deal with any problems that might arise. Also, if everything gets done ahead of schedule, you can just get your stuff that much sooner.

How Can I help?

The first and foremost way you can help out is donating. Even If you can only donate $5 you will be involved in the decision making which includes helping choose colors and designs for the products and helping make decision on store improvement.  If you can’t donate, then we can use your help spreading the word and getting others to donate.  Also, if you’re an artist you can create submissions for our T-shirt Design contest and possibly see your work on our final products. (http://rainydayanime.com/events/art-contest/)

And finally, by just spreading the word about the store itself, by posting positive reviews, tagging us in online mentions and telling everyone you know about us.

The Rewards

(Price is for local pickup; add $5 to ship to U.S. mainland, and $10 for international, Hawaii and Alaska.)

$5 to be part of the decision making process and invited to the launch party

$15 bag, sticker, pin set

$25 t-shirt (or hat, or umbrella)*

$40 t-shirt (or hat, or umbrella)*, bag, sticker, pin set

$55 2 t-shirts (or hat, or umbrella)*, bag, sticker, pin set

$70 3 t-shirts (or hat, or umbrella)*, bag, sticker, pin set

$150 VIP membership for 1 year, t-shirt (or hat, or umbrella)*, bag, sticker, pin set

$500  VIP membership for 5 years, 3 t-shirts (or hat, or umbrella)*, bag, sticker, pin set

(T-shirt sizes will range from small to XXL)

*If stretch goals met you will get to chose a hat or umbrella instead of T-shirt

The Stretch Goals

$3000 Goal

$4000 option for hat

$5000 option for umbrella

$6000 postcard set/ free postcard set for donators $40 or over

$7000 more bumper sticker options / Sticker gets upgraded to sticker set

$8000 More T-shirt options/ free wristband to donators of $15 or more

$9000 Launch party upgrade/ Special Thank You Card for all donators $5 or more.

If we make over $9000 we will plan an EPIC launch party deserving of the number. Rumor has it the it will be comically Dragon Ball Z themed.
story_txt:
Who are we?
We are Rainy Day
Anime, a store in Colorado Springs, Colorado, devoted to Japanese Animation,
Manga and Japanese pop culture. We’ve been in business for almost 4 years as a
store front and 7 years as a vendor at local cons. At Rainy Day Anime we try to
be more than just a store, we want to be a valued part of the Anime community.
We do this by being knowledgeable and friendly, running cool events, like
viewings and gaming parties, and just creating a positive atmosphere for people
to geek out in. with We get really excited when people show their love for the
store, whether its open enthusiasm upon their arrival, fan art of our mascot,
or rave reviews online like this: (http://english121evaluations.wordpress.com/2012...).

Why Crowdfunding? 
A
lot of people have suggested we sell our own T-shirts, bags, and even umbrellas
(We are Rainy Day Anime after all). Our 2 biggest hurdles with this is coming
up with the money and deciding on a design, so it seemed like a good idea to us
to set it up were you can preorder these items and you only get charged, when
we have enough to do it. Hence:  Crowd
funding!
We will be promoting this campaign in store, through
our website, Facebook, and other social media. Spreading the word has been and
will be the key to our success. While this mainly affects our local anime community, we hope
this can be a launching point, to increased national and possibly international
attention.
Where is the money
going?
First
and foremost this is to make Rainy Day Anime branded merchandise. We will need
a base of $3000 to get it going. This will Fund store themed bumper stickers,
reusable shopping bags, and T-Shirts. We would like to get about twice as many
printed as are backed through this campaign so we can use them for future
promotions and sales.  Additional money
will go towards having more products made (See our stretch goals), ensuring the
quality of these products and improving the store. Improvements we would like
to have includes new displays, a bigger, better inventory more focused on what
you want, a barcode scanner for speedy checkout, and more website support. We
will consult you the backers on what improvement you most want to support.
What is the time line?
Starting July 1st
and ending July 31st. This will coincide with an art contest we are
currently running which will also end on July 31st. (http://rainydayanime.com/events/art-contest/)
We plan to spend
August Finalizing the designs. 
We plan to get
everything ordered and printed in Sept.
We will do a release Party
in Oct. to Coincide with our 4 year anniversary.
This should give us
plenty of time to deal with any problems that might arise. Also, if everything gets
done ahead of schedule, you can just get your stuff that much sooner.
How Can I help?
The first and foremost way you can help out is donating. Even
If you can only donate $5 you will be involved in the decision making which
includes helping choose colors and designs for the products and helping make
decision on store improvement.  If you
can’t donate, then we can use your help spreading the word and getting others
to donate.  Also, if you’re an artist you
can create submissions for our T-shirt Design contest and possibly see your
work on our final products. (http://rainydayanime.com/events/art-contest/)And finally, by just spreading the word about the
store itself, by posting positive reviews, tagging us in online mentions and
telling everyone you know about us.
The Rewards

and $10 for international, Hawaii and Alaska.)
$5 to be part of the decision making process and invited to
the launch party

umbrella)*, bag, sticker, pin set

story:
About Us

Fimi Fashion is a fashion firm founded in the spring of 2013 with its headquarters located in Boston.  Fimi Fashion was established for the purpose of promoting new fashion items that consider Caribbean fashion trends.  In fact, the word “fimi” is defined in Caribbean terms means “one of a kind”.  Fimi Fashion is a “one of a kind” company, which is dedicated to producing unparalleled Caribbean inspired fashion products and apparel.

Help Us Thrive

Sheralee George has invested time, money and energy into the development of the Fimi Fashion clothing sources and advanced hair packages.  She now just needs a little help in transforming her efforts into a full community-driven fashion enterprise.  Therefore, Fimi Fashion is seeking to raise $1,500 in this campaign and has provided special perk packages as a sign of appreciation. All the funds raised will be used for inventory purchases and the ability of Fimi Fashion to generate new designs based on "YOUR" valuable feedback.  Again, this is a new Caribbean inspired fashion experience.  We will not tell you what to wear, but will help you wear what you tell us.  See http://www.fimifashion.com

The Urban Impact

Your participation with Fimi Fashion will allow a Boston based firm to bring to the forefront the concept of community-driven, Caribbean inspired fashion products.  It is hard to establish brand excellence on a limited budget, but we have and will continue to be committed to making Fimi Fashion a benefit to the community.  Therefore, when you are helping Fimi Fashion, you are helping the communities that Fimi Fashion serves - which can be yours.  So please help us make history and positive change.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can also help Fimi Fashion by allowing us to create youth shirts for sports teams or clubs, purchase wholesale hair from us, or post our campaign (or website) on your social media pages. You may also order clothing and hair products at www.fimifashion.com

story:
Proceeds from each jewelry piece will go towards to the donation of 9 Meals for disadvantaged children of Cambodia a local NGO tuition-free school while employing local artisans at a fair-trade cooperative in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. Each piece is made from upcycled remains of weapons of conflict in Cambodia, one of the most bombed country in the history of mankind; turning an object of negativity into a vehicle of change.

 

 

 

 

 

 It all began out of a dorm room in Texas in 2011, when I was broke, depressed, and sedentary and I was struggling the very concept of being lost. I wanted to get out, and that is what I did. I took a chance on myself and went and travelled Asia for a year and discovered myself in the process.Following my travels, I developed the Purple Buddha Project from a Tumblr blog into a socially conscious brand that upcycles weapons of conflicts in Cambodia, one of the most bombed countries in the history of mankind, into jewelry; changing an object of negativity into a movement for change. Year by year the project developed, and year by year my friends and family saw the life changes that I was making.

Since then I've helped of thousands of struggling people change their lives through self-love with intent. I've learned what works, and what doesn't, and this is what I have come up with after traveling the world for three years.

About the Purple Buddha Project:

Depression

 

 

This book is meant to inspire as well as convince you that you are deserving of your love and will help develop the inspiration within yourself to love you. From my travels as well as developing the project in Cambodia over the years, I have learned that peace, happiness, and bliss begins with self-love and the awareness that you are deserving of happiness regardless of the circumstances and environment of life.

In reading this book, you will be convinced that you are imperfectly perfect, and that true beauty lies in accepting everything that you have begin despising about yourself.

I know what it's like to be completely broke just as well as anyone. When I started this project, I was actually heavily in debt, and I've been through my days when I've only had 5 dollars in my wallet. I don't want this to be the reason why you can't have an opportunity to read something that may help you. My goal is to not only get this book funded, but also want to spread the message of self-love to as many people possible. So for this campaign, this book will be published on a “name your price” model, where I am giving people the chance to pick their own price of what people believe this book is worth to them. Exclusively for this month only, this means no matter how much you donate, you will receive an ebook copy of the book.

In the top screen of this campaign, please note on the right-hand side there is an option to "Contribute Now". Input an amount in this figure and confirm on the following page, and after the end of this campaign we will be sending an message individually asking for everyone's email to where we can send the ebook to. 

How This Money Will Be Used:
Proceeds from this campaign will be used to publish the Purple Buddha Project book including cost of graphic designer, editor, and first print manufacturing costs.
 
https://www.purplebuddhaproject.com
http://www.purplebuddhaquotes.com

story:
Short Summary

"If you are reading this you are close friends and family I have invited to see my posts. I was recently diagnosed with Hodgkin's lymphoma. At this point I don't know much-just that they have discovered I have cancer (after removing LARGE lymph nodes from my neck). "

"And don't get me started on the hair. Sounds like I have a few weeks left with my lovely locks."

Soooooo - Let's get a wig! 

"I mean when Brian went bald I still totally loved him. (Still do) Now I'm so used to it it's hard to remember him with hair. He said to me "I never thought is see the day when we would both be bald." Oh he's still gonna be soooo in love with me!!!!"


What We Need & What You Get

Here's the break down:

  • It costs $770 for a wig to be made from Suzanne's own hair ( I rounded up to $800 so Brian could buy Suzanne a big 'ol bouquet of flowers too :) Check out the Caring & Comfort website for more info: http://www.caringandcomfort.com
  • SITE FEES: 4% of the total contributions are taken for this site
  • PROCESSING FEES FOR USING PAYPAL/ CREDIT CARDS:  3% of the total contributions
  • What happens if we raise more than the $856??! Then I think Brian can buy some flowers for their girls too :) In addition, donations beyond this amount will be used for medical expenses.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some folks just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Pray!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Sleek, fit for purpose designs, great materials and uncompromised quality look. Enjoying touch of modern luxury and thriving on a demanding, active lifestyle. This is how the idea of our carbon Pulo Luxury Wallet was born.

First we designed it for ourselves and we quickly came to love it. Our friends liked it too and started to ask about it. The look, the style, the functionality and finally an ability to carry all your cards and bills with your pockets flat. Saying goodbye to bulges. And saying hello to fit for purpose, carbon design look.

Pulo is only 0.16 inches (4mm) thin, which brings an end to the bulge in your pocket made by your old wallet.



Pulo is CNC milled from the high quality carbon fiber – a material 3 times lighter and 5 times stronger than steel – used for making supercars, modern yachts and road bikes.


Pulo is incredibly light and stylish as well as incredibly easy to use – which makes it a perfect companion for a demanding, active lifestyle.



Pulo has no metal or magnetic parts, so it let's you fly through security gates at the airport and is 100% safe for your cards.

Pulo holds from 1 to 15 credit cards inside, plus notes with the money clip on the back. Because of the carbon fiber properties, the money clip will always go back to its natural position.


To make our Pulo even a more versatile companion we built in two additional features of bottle opener and media stand.


  • Length: 3.38 inches (86mm)
  • Width: 2.13 inches (54mm)
  • Thickness: 0.16 inches (4mm) / 0.2 inches (5mm) with opener 
  • Weight: 1 ounce (28 grams) / 1.34 ounces (38 grams) with opener
  • Materials used: High quality carbon fiber and fabric/ elastic band  


  • Quick access to your cards
  • Capacity for 1 - 15 credit cards plus bills
  • RFID protection from wireless data skimming and identity theft 
  • Great resistance to bending
  • Length and width of a credit card
  • Additional features of media stand and bottle opener
  • Clean aesthetic look
  • Construction made of high quality carbon fiber manufactured in Europe by people with years of experience, specialized in making carbon fiber car parts.
  • Designed without any metal, aluminium or magnetic parts or mechanisms.

We have positively validated our design through a series of progressive prototypes, which allowed us to arrive at the one we are happy to finally share with you now - a perfect blend of modern, luxurious, compact look with a great versatility and ease of use.

We have successfully lined up a host of reliable CNC mills to secure seamless production with perfect consistency, quality and precision.

When it comes to carbon – the soul of our Pulo Luxury Wallet - we have applied special care to qualifying vendors we supply it from – selecting only those with a confirmed portfolio of satisfied customers across industries and with confirmed capacity to support our project up to its full scale.


  • 18 December : Campaign launch
  • 18 December - 19 January : The crowdfunding campaign 
  • 21 January: Shipping the Super Early Bird Batch
  • 19 - 31 January: Transfer of the funds  
  • 1 February - 15 February – Production 
  • 15 February – Shipping all Early Bird batches

Freshly graduated architects by background, design aficionados, and promoters of freedom biking we set out to design and manufacture a breakthrough, road-savvy electric motorbike. Clearly, such a venture requires some upfront investment which is a challenge for such freshgrads as ours. This is when it dawned on us that given the uniform popularity of our Pulo luxury wallet amongst our friends, we may use it as a financing vehicle, putting it to the market and offering it to more people who share same passion for design and lifestyle.
As a test we displayed it on the Instagram and 6000 people quickly applauded the idea, with many asking to buy one. This is why now we are bringing it here as an offer to you and asking your support for our projects.

Instagram
facebook

story:
Aristotle Muse


Our Story

In January of 2011, Carla lost her job at an energy billing provider in Alpharetta, GA. From that moment on she realized that she wasn't fully using the gifts and talents that she had nor was she putting to use an idea that she had come up with several years ago. Most women carry a handbag. Most women hate something about their handbag. So, she started asking questions about handbags. From that moment on Aristotle Muse was born. Aristotle does the thinking, the pondering and the detail work. The Muse is a childlike character who is always seeking an adventure at every single turn and needs something to carry Aristotle's ideas. Hence, the multi-bag, named after one of Carla's muses, Koko was born. Each bag is crafted with a minimalist aesthetic in mind but, fills a very feminine function. The place where a woman keeps her "secrets". Have you ever lost your lip gloss in the bottom of the bag right when you needed it to capture that hottie's eye? It's there at the flick of a wrist. Have you ever needed a pen but, it too was somewhere mixed with your makeup, perfume, notebooks and stuff? We got that covered!  


Do your keys get lost? Clipped. Does your strap fall off your shoulder? Not happening. What about that camera you carry around? Did you need a pocket for that? It's in the bag! What I don't have is the startup money that I need to get these bags into your hands where your life will be organized and you have two bags buy purchasing only one bag. Ladies, this is not a reversible bag. No, no we do this with style and grace! 


Gentlemen, you are included this venture. Yes, the Muse thought of you as well. Do you know what this handbag does for you life? It makes you into a happier man. How? Well, your friend, girlfriend, wife, companion, even your friend with benefits will no longer be complaining about how her handbag just doesn't work right. Ah, yes, serenity. 

The Impact

1) You give me a job. And not just a job but, a job that lets me give YOU the handbag that you've ALWAYS wanted but have never been able to purchase. Until October. :)

2) You stop handbag insanity in your town. You create sanity in your own world by being able to purchase these bags. Can you feel the Zen? Oh yeah, that's some handbag love right there. The Muse said so! 

3) A foundation will be established from the sale of these bags for microfunding businesses for women in the US and abroad.

4) You will employ people in New York. My manufacturer is a family owned business and the handbags will be manufactured right here in the United States. No imports.


What We Need & What You Get

We will need approximately $5,000 to get the business just off the ground. What does this mean?

-Sample Bag

-Preliminary Orders

-Incorporation

-Business Licenses

-A Website


Why are these things important?


You dream about fashion. You breathe style. You may be a hipster, a romantic, a preppy or just a you. You may be a muse. You are a sophisticate who expects more out of her life, her experiences and her handbag. Who has the handbag? Aristotle Muse. How do we get that handbag to you? Through your contributions. 


Why Aristotle Muse?

The company will be run on a sustainable business model. Not only a business model, but, the materials will be ethically sourced and sustainable.  This means as little plastics as possible. You might say, "How are cows sustainable?" Well, they still reproduce. The last time I checked, the dinosaurs died some billion odd years ago. Have you seen a T-Rex lately? 

Other Ways You Can Help

Twitter, Facebook and word of mouth. Let's give the Muse wings. This company is not about me but, what you need. You need Koko. Trust me, she's gorgeous. You get a main bag and a take away bag for the price of one bag. Who can beat that deal?  


Follow us on Facebook

Follow the Muse's Daily Musings 


Peace, Love, and Musing,

A. Muse

Have you ever needed a pen but, it too was somewhere mixed with your makeup, perfume, notebooks and stuff? We got that covered!  

Do your keys get lost? Clipped. Does your strap fall off your shoulder? Not happening. What about that camera you carry around? Did you need a pocket for that? It's in the bag! What I don't have is the startup money that I need to get these bags into your hands where your life will be organized and you have two bags buy purchasing only one bag. Ladies, this is not a reversible bag. No, no we do this with style and grace! 

Gentlemen, you are included this venture. Yes, the Muse thought of you as well. Do you know what this handbag does for you life? It makes you into a happier man. How? Well, your friend, girlfriend, wife, companion, even your friend with benefits will no longer be complaining about how her handbag just doesn't work right. Ah, yes, serenity. 

The Impact
1) You give me a job. And not just a job but, a job that lets me give YOU the handbag that you've ALWAYS wanted but have never been able to purchase. Until October. :)
2) You stop handbag insanity in your town. You create sanity in your own world by being able to purchase these bags. Can you feel the Zen? Oh yeah, that's some handbag love right there. The Muse said so! 
3) A foundation will be established from the sale of these bags for microfunding businesses for women in the US and abroad.
4) You will employ people in New York. My manufacturer is a family owned business and the handbags will be manufactured right here in the United States. No imports.


What We Need & What You Get
We will need approximately $5,000 to get the business just off the ground. What does this mean?
-Sample Bag
-Preliminary Orders
-Incorporation
-Business Licenses
-A Website

Why are these things important?

You dream about fashion. You breathe style. You may be a hipster, a romantic, a preppy or just a you. You may be a muse. You are a sophisticate who expects more out of her life, her experiences and her handbag. Who has the handbag? Aristotle Muse. How do we get that handbag to you? Through your contributions. 

Why Aristotle Muse?
The company will be run on a sustainable business model. Not only a business model, but, the materials will be ethically sourced and sustainable.  This means as little plastics as possible. You might say, "How are cows sustainable?" Well, they still reproduce. The last time I checked, the dinosaurs died some billion odd years ago. Have you seen a T-Rex lately? 

Other Ways You Can Help
Twitter, Facebook and word of mouth. Let's give the Muse wings. This company is not about me but, what you need. You need Koko. Trust me, she's gorgeous. You get a main bag and a take away bag for the price of one bag. Who can beat that deal?  

Follow us on Facebook
Follow the Muse's Daily Musings 

Peace, Love, and Musing,
A. Muse

story:
Send Baby To North Carolina:

             Well hello there, Its me Alec, or as most of Madera knows me as... Baby. I am a 16 year old Junior at Madera High School in California. Im a 3 sports athlete, Im a football player, a wrestler, and a baseball player. This past year as a sophomore I did incredible things for Madera High. On the football field, I rushed over 1,000 yards with multiple interceptions on defense, on the wrestling mat, I captured a 6th place medal at The California State Tournament and also attended a national tournament in Reno Nevada and thats where I recieved my very first national title. Now on the baseball field. Me and another amazing pitcher lead Madera High to its first Valley Title in over 17 years! I've recieved multiple letters for wrestling from colleges, such as Old Domion, Columbia, and The Great Cal Poly, my dream college. So as a fan, you have 1 question that seems to be brought up more often than not...

What sport are you trying to be successful in?

               Trust me, it is harder than it looks to just pick one sport and forget the other 2. so basically we look at the sport that leads you with a better future..

 

Wrestling:

     Ive been wrestling since I was 6 years old. I grew up with wrestling all around me. My dad was a wrestler and my 3 older brother were wrestlers, so its pretty obvious what I was doing as soon as I came out of the womb. So my very 1st tournament ever at 6 years, I took 3rd place. pretty good right? so I went on to my next tournament the following weekend, I ended up taking the 1st place trophy after defeating 5 kids. Now thats awesome! okay now heres the cool part...

             My dad loves to take my brothers and his wrestling team to Reno,NV to wrestle at the Cliff Keen World of Wrestling National Tournament. well since I was barely getting into wrestling my dad said, "well hell, might as well throw baby in there!" so as a kid barely coming off of 2 little tournaments and now going to one of the hardest tournaments in the world! it was kind of.. scary. So as the tournament goes on.. my brothers are wrestling.. winning some and losing some.. and at one point they were put out of the tournament.. so they ask, "hows baby doing?" ......... Baby is now 4-0 wrestling for a national title! everyone was shocked. now at this point, we were planning on going home because my brothers were put out of the tournament and its baby's 3rd tournament ever, how could he possibly place.. So now the worry isnt about staying another night.. the worry is money... we had a few bucks left from the whole weekend.. we didnt know what to do. so my dad asked a friend to wire him money so it took awhile. in the meantime, Me, My dad, and my 2 brothers were sitting in the parking lot of the 99 cent store eating ham sandwiches. Wait huh? yeah thats right. while my opponent was probably eating a 5-course meal, in a fancy hotel, with a king size bed. I was sitting in the parking lot of the 99 cent store eating sandwiches..WOW.. so we ended up getting a little motel and staying the night and wrestling the next day. I wont tell you how the match went, but lets just say I recieved a beating Lol. so as a very talented wrestler growing up winning multiple tournaments how could I not want to go to college for wrestling right?

 

Football:

     Football has always been the sport to recieve multiple attention.. I started when I was in the 3rd grade. growing up, I wasnt the all star football player like how I was the all star wrestler, I was the kid who got in on a few tackles and nevered played offense.. so when my 7th grade year is when I started playing offense. running the ball and becoming a terrific running back that the whole town was talking about me. so at the end of my 8th grade year everyone was asking what high school I was going to since there are 2 located in my town. I ended up going to the REAL Madera High and playing football for them. Im on my way to be a 4-year varsity player and as a freshman I threw a touchdown in a varsity game. 1st ever to do that for Madera High. so my sophomore year I came in as a starter on the offense running the ball to averaging about a little over a 100 yards a game. so as a star football player why not go to college for it?

 

Baseball:

     I have been playing baseball my whole life. it is the sport I enjoy the most. growing up playing baseball with friends seem to be better than anything in the world. practices werent in a small compact room for hours with sweat everywhere, or at a field where concussions happen almost everyday, it was the field where you could rob a homerun during batting practice and everyone at practice going crazy and then after practice go over to a friends house for the night and do it again the next day. baseball has always had that impact on me. so as I was growing up, it started to becoming serious. Im left-handed pitcher that can put velocity on that ball! so in high school is where I started going to, showcases, big tournaments, college game days, etc. I have been getting told from multiple people that I have a huge chance of making it to the next level. So as a lefty pitcher, almost hitting 90mph as a sophomore, how could I now want to go to college?

 

The Big Picture:

       So me and my parents are thinking... wrestling? how far does wrestling get you? it only gets you an education and then your done. football? yeah football goes on after college, but what are the chances of you getting seriously injured? baseball...baseball.. well... that was when we came to the point on how could I go wrong with baseball? so for the past several months Ive been focusing my time on baseball and attending multiple events. so just recently I got invited to go to North Carolina to attend this national tournament and possibly play on the USA baseball team. my parents have been doing so much for me lately and I am so grateful for it. but this trip coming up is more money than we expected.. for me and my family to go to North Carolina and have a good time and not worry about anything, I will have to raise about $5,000. I have dreams that yet to be fulfilled and if you help me with this campaign, you can possibly help me achieved those dreams. and to all my donators I have something that I will do for them to let them be recognized for helping me through this tough time. If we dont achieve my goal, with all the money left over I plan on using it for future baseball events and equipment such as a bat, a glove, cleats, a bag and etc. So what this whole thing about was to show you what type of person I am so I can get you to realize that you are helping out a great cause. Im sure you know what its like to do something youve really wanted to do but couldnt afford it because you didnt have the money at the time.. so all im asking is for you to take consideration in the campaign and help me achieve my dream. I thankyou in advance for helping me out greatly. Thankyou so much!

if you have any questions please feel free to email me at

alec.gamboa@yahoo.com

 

LETS GET BABY TO NORTH CAROLINA!!!!

story:
Our Story

What is Vory Clothing? Vory® Clothing is a sophisticated Urban t-shirt company that focuses on women whose personal styles are boho, edgy, casual chic, street and vintage! 

The goal of the boutique is to host our parent brand as well as other independent brands. Vory® is working towards becoming the #1 Boutique Franchise for the best Independent Brands located within the states our boutique resides! 
Mission Statement

At Vory® Clothing we provide all of our supporters and customers with an experience. From community service to fashion fundraiser events, we provide both professional and quality garments of clothing. Our specialty is designing t-shirts for those who love fresh soles, while our focus is geared toward community change! "We do MORE than dress you...we compliment your SOLES" Oh. We do other things just as well. 

Goals

Exclusivity
Community Service
Quality
Education of our customers to keep them stylish and up to date (finance, fashion, trends, etc.)



HELLO!! 

My name is Kiarah Moore and I attend the University of Missouri Columbia majoring in Textile and Apparel Management while minoring in Entrepreneurship. Vory® Clothing is an urban t-shirt company that was founded in 2008 and since then has been an e-commerce store. Just this year Vory® Clothing wrote a proposal to the Student Unions and entered the Business Competition that allows ONE student to acquire FREE store space in Columbia MO! Guess what??? Vory®'s business proposal was selected and now ALL of the supporters will have a PLACE to shop, ENJOY artwork and RECEIVE information on new trends, styles and finances! Our goal is to make the store come to life with ART!


Location: The store will be located on the University of Missouri's Campus inside of the newly built Student Center. This gives access tof thousands of students on a regular basis! 

Grand Opening: The Grand opening will be August 2011. (Date of opening will depend on days all students return to class for a big crowd) 



The Impact

Community Impact
Vory® Clothing aims to get the Columbia community involved in NUMEROUS ways! Community Service is one of our goals and we plan on implementing specific campaigns that can raise money and educate through service and volunteer. The impact that the store can and will have on the Columbia Community is one that is positive and will bring all fashion and art lovers together. In addition, I am planning a Sustainable Runway Show in October 2011 in Columbia MO to bring businesses and consumers together  for a night of GREEN fun! 

University Impact
My opportunity will impact the University of Missouri due to the Vory® Boutique being the FIRST student ran business on campus! This opportunity will bring together the connections of the faculty and staff as well as the students in order to bridge the gab between the young professionals!

 


What We Need & What You Get

Accounts Edge Accounting Software-$299.00
Cash Register with credit processing-$290.00
Picture Frames-$80.00
Mannequins (3)-$400.00
Light Fixture (Free standing)-$120
Inventory for 3 months-$1200
Shopping Bags-$350.00
Garment Tags-$50.00
Free Standing Bulletin-$55.00
Tag Ties-$14.00
Shirt Folding Board(2)-$20.00
Display Case-$259.00
Upright Tower Showcase-$700.00


Total: $3,837 ~ Roughly $4,200 with shipping on most items that weigh over 40lbs

I will have a $1500 budget in which I will use retained earnings and my own personal capital to purchase marketing materials and general advertising (which was included) to make this a HUGE success! 


Boutique Ideas and Concepts for a feel of how I want it to look! (Except for the lights and maybe a similar chandelier that I can make!)






Other Ways You Can Help

Cant Give Money? That's OK!!!!!

If by ANY chance ANY of these items can be "donated" it would HELP REDUCE costs and expenses.
I am always open to refurbish or renovate items that I can make look brand new! 

Items you can donate: 

Please contact Kiarah Moore for colors at contact@voryclothing.com

Paint

Mannequins

Glass Shelves

In Columbia MO?? Donate TIME and help out with the construction of the store! I would LOVE help, feedback and inspiration! (If time is donated you will have access to all monthly deals and a personalized photo will be hung on the wall!) 

Picture Frames-preferably wood (DONATED BY @ThebenchMARC =)

You'll NEVER know how MUCH impact donating items can be! I am BIG fan of renovating so if any item you can think of that you have....TRUST ME...IT WILL BE USED SOMEWAY SOMEHOW! 

 YOU can help promote!

There are tools in which YOU can promote this campaign and help to get it seen by others! Sharing on your facebook or twitter account can lead to donations either of us hope for!!! 


Brands we are incorporating so far:

The Code 
The CODE founded by Charles Thomas @MrCreatistic is a clothing company inspired by ninjas and honor. Like the CODE fanpage at http://www.facebook.com/obeythecode and the website at http://www.obeythecode.com 


What if I DON'T Raise the money?!

If all of the money is NOT raised, I will have to take out a loan!!!!! :( NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO 
As a college student, I have SO MANY LOANS ALREADY and I would love to get a fresh start on this business by being free of loans and debt. If the funds does NOT total the cost of the items I am wanting to buy, THE SHOW GOES ON! =) The money will be budgeted and anything that I can purchase I WILL and provide pictures and updates of the store! The money that will be needed  to finish the store, will be my own personal cash and a loan. 

THANK YOU IN ADVANCE FOR TAKING THE TIME TO READ THIS CAMPAIGN FOR VORY® CLOTHING! 

Visit: Keep up with us!!!
our site : www.voryclothing.com
Twitter: @VoryBrand
Blog: www.vorybrand.tumblr.com
Facebook: www.facebook.com/vorybrand

You'll NEVER know how MUCH impact donating items can be! I am BIG fan of renovating so if any item you can think of that you have....TRUST ME...IT WILL BE USED SOMEWAY SOMEHOW!

campaign_city: Columbia MO x Chicago IL, United States

story:
The Product

HANDLING YOUR EYEWEAR CAN BE A NUISANCE

When I started to use reading glasses, I quickly discovered how interruptive they were to my lifestyle. I struggled to find my glasses when I needed them the most. They got easily dirty or damaged through the constant process of taking them on and off throughout the day. And when I tried attaching them to an eyewear strap around my neck, the glasses got tangled up and in the way.

A large percentage of the world's population depends on wearing reading glasses or sunglasses throughout the day. But the constant process of handling eyewear can be frustrating. Wouldn't it be nice to have access to your lenses when you need them, but not have to think about where they are when you don't? And what about switching them in and out within the blink of an eye and with only one hand? With FlipSee, your glasses are always just a flip away.

THE ULTIMATE SOLUTION TO HANDLING YOUR GLASSES

FlipSee enables you to flip your glasses up into a fixed position above your eyes when you aren't using them, and back in front of your eyes when you are. The flipping process is fast and easy; you can do it with one hand, and you know at any time where your glasses are.

FlipSee consists of an elastic cord that hangs from behind your neck, and modified and patent-pending nose pads. The elastic cord has an easy-to-use pull-stop mechanism to keep your glasses resting comfortably on your forehead. The cord is equipped with elastic grips, which easily attach to the temples of the glasses. The modified nose pads make the glasses rest comfortably on your forehead without causing pain, while the friction between the pad and the skin prevents the glasses from sliding down on your nose and reduces the pain and pressure from original nose pads. The nose pads come with peel-off tabs so you can easily stick them onto the nose pads of your glasses.

FlipSee can be attached to your own glasses. The elastic cord combined with the cord-stop helps to secure your glasses at all times, even when you are active with labor work or other exercise, like running, jumping, biking or swimming in the ocean. Also, the cord-stop allows you to loosen the cord and let the glasses rest on your chest when you do not need them for a while.

FlipSee works for any type of glasses, whether it is reading glasses, sunglasses or fit-overs, safety glasses, anti-reflection glasses, or internet glasses. It has a discrete appearance, and is almost totally hidden, especially behind longer hair. Try them for yourself, or give it as a gift to your spouse, parent, grandparent or friend.

Testimonials by Prototype Users

I only need glasses for seeing up close. As a professional speaker and success coach, I spend 5+ hours a day working on my computer and reading. Ever since I started using my FlipSee I have saved valuable time from looking to see where I put my glasses down last. I know exactly where they are, and they don't fall off my head and break anymore!

Dr Ron Eccles, Lakewood Range, FL

Thank you, FlipSee, for a simple solution to an annoying problem. I have to remove my glasses so often to look at something up close, whether reading a fine print label or applying eyeliner. I always wanted to rest my glasses on my forehead, but they would slide down. I couldn’t put them on my top of my head because they would tangle in my hair. I was constantly fumbling with where to set my glasses and worried I would remember where they were! Now all I have to do is a quick Flip!

Michelle Schwenneker, Hixton, WI

As an avid year-round fly fisherman with declining eyesight, reading glasses have become part of my necessary gear. I have found it to be a burden struggling with where to store my reading glasses and fumbling around with them while on the stream fearing I would drop and lose them in the stream…until I discovered FlipSee. Now I can conveniently and comfortably flip them down off my brow when I need them and then flip them back up while fishing. Plus…less handling means less smudging and better chance to thread my line through the small eyes of my flies.

Keith Torok, Newtown, PA

I tried these and they work great. Cool stuff.

Jim Martin, Lumberton, NJ

I spend most of my days in front of a computer, reading or writing. I've gone through many pairs of reading glasses, too numerous to count - and costly. I found that FlipSee offers a natural feeling, is easy to use and I always know where my glasses are. I'm tall and live in an older house with low ceilings. I've also bent a number of glasses previously due to low ceiling since I would wear them on top of my head. FlipSee alleviates that problem too.

Steve Price, NJ

I LOVE my FlipSee glasses. When I'm working in my garage or outside, it is great to have these so handy to quickly put in place when I need to do close work or read and instruction manual. They are always at my fingertips and one quick movement with one hand or just nodding quickly puts them in place when I need them. Great product!

Bill Jacobsen, Wirtz, VA

When I first saw the video and the intended application of the product, I thought to myself: "Well, how is this any different from just flipping my glasses up and resting them on my forehead without the fancy elastic strap and softer than normal nose pads”? I must admit, my perception completely changed when I actually received the kit in the mail and tried it on for the first time.

I was very satisfied with the product, because the soft, gel-like nose pads felt very comfortable while resting on the forehead and did not leave indentations in the skin as is the case when resting glasses equipped with regular, factory nose pads. The elastic strap held the glasses securely in place just right, without exerting unnecessary tension. The product definitely offers added convenience and a peace of mind, ensuring the glasses will not fall off. Having recently lost a pair of my favorite glasses while zip-lining I can truly appreciate the invention. Great product!

Leonard Girsh, Southampton, PA

Help us Kick Start the Production of FlipSee!

The product has undergone several design and prototype iterations over a period of 3 years, and has been tested by several persons over several months. It is now ready for final production. Your contribution will be used in full to manufacture the first 5,000 units of FlipSee. The funding goal is based on manufacturing, assembly, and packaging quotes received from US companies. Some of these will be sent out to the supporters. The remaining units will be sold online, and the entire profit from this sale will go back into design adjustment and a second production run.

What Your Support Will be Used for

We ask for $13,500 to manufacture the first 5,000 units of FlipSee and set up the production process. Manufacturing involves injection molding of rubber and silicone parts, extrusion of rubber cord, assembly and packaging. All manufacturing will be done in the US.

If we surpass the funding goal we will use the additional funding to improve the design, in particular on the nose pads to eliminate any possible indentation on the forehead after prolonged use. We will also automate part of the assembly and packaging process to lower production cost. A longterm goal is to build the modified nose pads onto glasses, making them FlipSee ready.

If we do not reach the funding goal, the funds will still be used for manufacturing FlipSee, although we will be able to make fewer units than targeted and at a higher unit price. You are free to donate any amount you are comfortable with.

Our Thank-You Gift

For a contribution of $15 or more you will receive a FlipSee in the mail, and be among the pioneering group of people wearing the product, making handling of your glasses a whole new experience.

The Impact

As an engineer with 35 years of experience and more than two dozen U.S. patents, I wanted to solve a problem encountered daily by myself and a large part of the world's population. I have designed FlipSee in a way that will transform people's experience with their eyewear, and with functionality, simplicity and discrete appearance in mind. I wear them daily and all throughout the day - not because I developed them, but because they solved my problem and met my need.

FlipSee allows you to: 

  • Focus on what really matters. Enjoy that trip to the beach, get your yard work done, pick up your children or grandkids, enjoy your exercise or play time - and have your glasses or sunglasses on constant standby for the moment you need them.
  • Save money. You won't lose another pair of glasses, and you won't need multiple pairs around the house.
  • Have your favorite pair of glasses just a flip away. Indulge in the instant convenience of seeing through your lenses as soon as you need them - in the office, at the restaurant, in the store, when reading a newspaper, book, smart phone.

Other Ways You Can Help

Interested, but not ready to contribute? That's okay. We would greatly appreciate your support in the following ways:

  • Get the word out! Please share this page with your social networks, using one of the Share options at the top of this page.
  • Share your feedback. Leave us a note in the comments tab.
  • Visit our website: www.flipseeglasses.com.
  • Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/flip_see
  • Have a question? Email info@flipseeglasses.com.
story_txt:
The ProductHANDLING YOUR EYEWEAR CAN BE A NUISANCEWhen I started to use reading glasses, I quickly discovered how interruptive they were to my lifestyle. I struggled to find my glasses when I needed them the most. They got easily dirty or damaged through the constant process of taking them on and off throughout the day. And when I tried attaching them to an eyewear strap around my neck, the glasses got tangled up and in the way.A large percentage of the world's population depends on wearing reading glasses or sunglasses throughout the day. But the constant process of handling eyewear can be frustrating. Wouldn't it be nice to have access to your lenses when you need them, but not have to think about where they are when you don't? And what about switching them in and out within the blink of an eye and with only one hand? With FlipSee, your glasses are always just a flip away.THE ULTIMATE SOLUTION TO HANDLING YOUR GLASSESFlipSee enables you to flip your glasses up into a fixed position above your eyes when you aren't using them, and back in front of your eyes when you are. The flipping process is fast and easy; you can do it with one hand, and you know at any time where your glasses are.FlipSee consists of an elastic cord that hangs from behind your neck, and modified and patent-pending nose pads. The elastic cord has an easy-to-use pull-stop mechanism to keep your glasses resting comfortably on your forehead. The cord is equipped with elastic grips, which easily attach to the temples of the glasses. The modified nose pads make the glasses rest comfortably on your forehead without causing pain, while the friction between the pad and the skin prevents the glasses from sliding down on your nose and reduces the pain and pressure from original nose pads. The nose pads come with peel-off tabs so you can easily stick them onto the nose pads of your glasses.FlipSee can be attached to your own glasses. The elastic cord combined with the cord-stop helps to secure your glasses at all times, even when you are active with labor work or other exercise, like running, jumping, biking or swimming in the ocean. Also, the cord-stop allows you to loosen the cord and let the glasses rest on your chest when you do not need them for a while.FlipSee works for any type of glasses, whether it is reading glasses, sunglasses or fit-overs, safety glasses, anti-reflection glasses, or internet glasses. It has a discrete appearance, and is almost totally hidden, especially behind longer hair. Try them for yourself, or give it as a gift to your spouse, parent, grandparent or friend. Ever since I started using my FlipSee I have saved valuable time from looking to see where I put my glasses down last. story:
Bawdy Love Clothing

At Bawdy Love we have a vision of empowering individuals to find their personal beauty, and believe wearing pieces designed with uniqueness in mind encourages people to do just that.  Reaching all the intersections of size, ability, race, gender and beyond is tremendously important to us.  If you’ve ever felt like you couldn’t love your body because it wasn’t thin enough, tall enough, curvy enough, toned enough, short enough, anything enough, our pieces are for you.  

Our Story

Bawdy Love is the creation of Gwynedh Van Allan and Candace Frank, two queer femme plus size feminists bent on sharing radical self-love and enthusiastic personal sensuality with the world. Throughout our lives we’ve seen a lack of inspiring fashion for unique bodies. People of all shapes, sizes, ethnicities, ages, and genders have felt left behind by fashion, especially in the world of lingerie, intimates, and swimwear.

As teenagers we each learned to make the clothes we couldn't find on the rack. Candace translated her early love of fashion and creating into a successful career designing costumes for theatre, opera, circus, and burlesque. She eventually earned a Master's Degree in Theatrical Costume Design working with Seattle Opera, Cirque Du Soleil, and Ringling Brothers.

Gwynedh explored the complex realm of corsetry, delving deep into the history of body modification and enhancement via foundation garments. Her passion for the engineering and history of clothing exploded along with her enthusiasm for dramatic performance.

For over a decade we used our knowledge of clothing to create custom designs for performers and individuals, but for many years we still allowed exclusion from the mainstream fashion world to define our relationships to ourselves and our bodies. Then the rapid growth of the body positive and sex positive movements brought us new examples of the beauty and sensuality of unique bodies both like and unlike ours.  We saw bodies with full tummies, gender fluidity, thick thighs, flat chests, straight waists, all shapes of people who had been told they couldn’t be beautiful because of their bodies, being accepted and powerfully sensual.  These bodies were not beautiful in spite of their uniqueness, but BECAUSE of it.  

Our self-love grew along with our knowledge and experience. We wanted lingerie that allowed us to express our passion, our sexuality, and our power. When we couldn't find it in stores we designed and made it ourselves. Through this process we learned that the true secret to sensuality was being at home in our own skin, and our purpose became fundamentally linked to helping others do the same.  

We needed to share this with the world.

Now We Need Your Support

We started Bawdy Love and were met with a tidal wave of enthusiasm and support, from our community and friends to body positive models and bloggers. We were surrounded by people excited about our creations.

But as the enthusiasm and demand rose it quickly became clear that while we had plenty of vision and ideas, and the skills to execute those, we lacked the capital means to keep up. With this campaign we hope to raise the funds necessary to enhance the efficiency of our production process, expand the business beyond the two of us, and refine our unique universal sizing technique.  

We passionately believe it is time for us to expand into masculine, gender fluid, and petite products. We have the designs, we lack enough skilled hands.  Your contributions will directly allow us to produce, market, and expand our lines to better serve a wider community.

Our Growth Plans

  • A new larger sewing studio where we have the space to train stitchers, test new products on real bodies, and hold events. 
  • Development of an incredibly precise universal sizing system allowing every piece to fit like custom.

  • Expanding designs to include new masculine and androgynous styles.

  • Vending and showing our pieces on the runways of more fashion events.

  • Hire more body positive fashion photographers and models to promote our products while increasing visibility of fashion on the underrepresented. 

What We Need & What You Get

Our designs are ready. The pattern making has happened. Now we need you! 

With every piece we make we gather more measurements which help us refine our unique universal sizing technique allowing every piece to feel custom and special.  Every donation will go towards tangible advancement of Bawdy Love. 

Our lowest goal of 15k will fund marketing and growth, allowing us to afford professional photography and to attend fashion events. We can find a sewing studio that accommodates our needs. And with each new measurement gained, more data for our universal sizing.

Our second goal of 25k will allow us more space for additional stitchers. We will be able to produce a whole new line of pieces and to take them to events and continue filling orders quickly to our exacting standards.

We have a whole host of wonderful perks for all budgets. You can choose what works best for you. The perks benefit you and us! With each perk of a lingerie item, we will ask for your measurements and make the pieces to your specifications. This will help us expand and refine our universal sizing method! See them in more detail to the right in the Perks section.

If we don’t reach our full goal the money will go first towards fulfilling the perks and then we are prioritizing marketing. Our goal is growth so that the business can become self sustaining. Photo and video shoots are not cheap, even with all the amazing people willing to donate their time.

The Impact

With the expansion of Bawdy Love we will be able to create intersectional lingerie for everyone, of every size, shape, gender, ethnicity. We want to bring out the sexiness and beauty in every body.

When you contribute, you are also supporting a small, women-owned business with values that are rooted in supporting and uplifting women, people of color, and the LGBTQ+ community.

Risks & Challenges

Universal sizing isn’t simple. The variety of human shapes and sizes is vast.  We are dedicated to gathering as much information as possible and continuously analyzing it for patterns in fit, comfort and practicality. We have been making clothing, in many forms and styles, for decades and have amassed a huge amount of knowledge on how to create pieces for a variety of people.

We design our pieces from this lifetime of knowledge and believe the more information we gather about peoples measurements and shapes, the more we will be able to identify trends in how to fit and flatter all shapes.

We envision an extremely precise sizing method that accommodates every unique body, regardless of size, height, and shape to create pieces that are practically custom.  Through this method anyone who’s felt underserved by the existing fashion industry now has the keys to their own sensuality.

Our other large risk is simply not being able to keep up with demand. At the moment Bawdy Love consists of Candace, Gwynedh, and a select few and invaluable volunteers. We want very much to expand and hire so that we can fill orders more quickly but also so we can create all the new designs that are constantly pouring out of us. Labor is expensive, training is expensive, and we require high quality sewing. If we can reach our stretch goal we will be able to hire to keep up with demand and grow.

Other Ways You Can Help

We appreciate all help, not just donations! So if you find you cannot make a donation please use the power of social media to share share share. Every additional person that sees our campaign is another person that can be touched by our vision and help us grow. Word of mouth, emails, and the ever present power of social media are a wonderful help. We appreciate every share and mention.

 

Indiegogo has many tools to help with sharing right here in this page! So share share share!
