story:
GUFO Eco-friendly Sunglasses - High quality and fashionable unique design

WE ARE EXCITED TO ANNOUNCE THE GUFO REFERRAL COMPETITION!

-> The competition starts on August 3rd and will end on the closing day of the Indiegogo campaign.

  • To start referring, share the campaign link, just use the links located just below the video of our Indiegogo page (make sure you are logged into your indiegogo account, if you do not have create it, it costs nothing)
  • The top referrers will be ranked based on people that they have referred to our campaing and the total level of thei contribution.
  • The winner will receive the entire collection of GUFO sunglasses (5 models for a total amount of 505 euro).
  • The runner-up and those until the fifth place, will receive a pair of GUFO sunglasses to choose from.
  • The sixth-ranked until the tenth, will receive a wooden keychain signed by GUFO

 

SPECIAL PRICE ONLY FOR 30 DAYS 59€ (THEN IT COSTS 99€)

Per COMPRARE gli occhiali, clicca su uno dei modelli di fianco -->

To PURCHASE sunglasses, click one of the perks to the right -->

 

5 Unique design sunglasses models, 100% handmade, eco-friendly, made with great care to details and durability. Backed with a WARRANTY. Just 59€

Note; 59€ is the indiegogo campaign launch price. After we will sell them at 89€.

ABOUT GUFO

GUFO is an Italian creation by Claudio Calvagna, (Designer and Artist) and Giuseppe Marino (Fashion industry entrepreneur).  We are going to launch an inimitible fashionable product with beautiful quality which has no impact on the environment.  

Combining a unique design with quality, as well as being eco-friendly, has not always been easy but this has been mastered with the:

GUFO – Original fashion sunglasses

We started by drawing shapes that we liked, moved it on the wood and then began to knead it by hand.

We have paid attention to 3 crucial points:

  1. A new unique design that is fashionable and which stands out from its competitors;
  2. 100% handmade with recycled biodegradable materials which are eco-friendly;
  3. Having great care and attention to detail and its overall superior quality.

 

OUR SPECIAL FIRST COLLECTION OF WOODEN SUNGLASSES

For this first collection we have 5 models with an amazing singular design. For every model you can choose 3 different types of lenses: Coloured mirrored lenses, Mirrored lenses and Standard ones.

 

GUFO IS ALSO BACKED WITH A WARRANTY

We're so confident with the quality that we guarantee them so if something happens to them within the first two years, then please return them to us, we would be happy to replace them.

Warranty includes the wooden sunglasses frame.

Warranty does not cover:  

  • The break or scratch of the lenses

  • Wear and tear and aging (e.g. scratched wood; alteration of the color and/or material of wooden frame)

  • Any damage on any part of the sunglasses resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (knocks dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.)

     

 

MORE ABOUT THE GUFO QUALITY

All of the unisex sunglasses are equipped with high-quality lenses, 100% UVA / UVB protection, and are polarized so preventing the polarized light - hence reflected – from reaching the eyes, thus reducing dramatically the reflections generated from shiny surfaces such as chrome, mirrors and water.

• Multilayer coating of the inner surface with mirror effect of outward and inward antireflection effect. Also the outer surface is antireflection treated to ensure the best results in terms of optical quality.

• Available on colored lenses. With this type the mirror makes the bright color and mirrored, if the lens is white, creates a luminous effect multilayer color-changing reflections. Guaranteed quality optical absorption unchanged and a light and restful.

The material used is wood, specifically maple, as it is known for its resistance. The wood has been coated with a resin to make sure it is totally waterproof which also gives it the advantage of being stable over a long period.

 

Who is the GUFO team?

GUFO is an italian project Started by young entrepreneurs. Claudio Calvagna, designer, fashion enthusiast, Since he was a child he wanted to become an artist. After attending the Art Institute, he decided to jump right into work. The first job was to own a restorer who taught me most of the techniques of woodworking of which I am aware.

All of his works are created by reusing objects or recycled materials. His slogan is: II belive that everything is born to become something, but it isn't said that it can not become something else.  

Giuseppe Marino, digital guru and fashion industry entrepreneur, law student but always in touch with the fashion world, she began working for a movie production and is currently manager of one of the most important Italian fashion contest.

Our last idea was born when, emptying the garage of a friend, claudio founds a cardboard box with three hundred in wooden tiles for flooring. Immediately he realized that He had better take them home! We knew that We would have done something. And indeed it was!

Those tiles became sunglasses!

After two weeks, the glasses were ready! When We worn them for the first time, the success they had was incredible!

The requests kept coming. Materials research became more intense: what wood to use to make them elastic and resilient, how to protect them from the weather, which lenses to use, where to find them and have them cut to size, where to find the strenght hinges for auctions , etc ...

 



WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

In order to turn this dream of ours into a reality, we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging for one of our awesome sunglasses, but just spread the word, share the story with a friend.

Do something as simple as tweeting about our page, or just liking our Facebook page, it can really go a long way. Simply share our project clicking the Facebook and Twitter tabs at the top of the page.



Where GUFO DESIGN Wants go?

We want to realize our dream, launch a fashionable product, beautiful, quality but also zero impact on the environment. The idea is to build models tailored for men and women, of different colours, different coloured lenses and in inimitable styles. Each buyer will have a unique piece. The goal is to get a big production, always creating original models, in step with fashion and quality, suitable for every age group, from the student to the man in his career, always respecting the environment. So join with us on this journey and be part of it every step of the way.  We will send out several updates throughout the entire process making sure our backers are up-to-date on any important information.  We want to create a bond, a synergy with our backers, because ultimately you are the ones turning our dream into a reality.  We are excited to grow and anxious to see what the future has in store for us.

Actually we are broadcasting our story to blogs, social networks, journals, media, and we hope our message will go out.

If funded, how will you fulfill the orders?

We've tweaked the initial prototype, finalized our design, purchased the molds and selected a manufacturer that has a great reputation in the industry.  Once Indiegogo releases the funds, we can pay the initial deposit to begin production.  Production time takes roughly 30 days depending on the quantity of the order.  Our team will then ship the orders to our awesome backers! We have experience with shipping software and thermal printers which should make for a very smooth process.

 

CREDITS:

Video / foto shooting:
-Alessandro Kasta (Photographer)
-Gianfry  Nepitelli (Photographer Assistant)
-Evghenia Berlinschi (Model)
-Desire Fasana (Model)
-Giovanni Costanzo (Model)
-Valentina Silario (Model)
-Alessandra Costanzo

Locations:
Thanks to Hotel Rivalago, Sulzano (BS)


Also thanks to:
-Virginia Ottolina (speaker)
-Daniele Ziliani
-Francesco D'Accorso
-Kurt Snyder
story_txt:
GUFO Eco-friendly Sunglasses - High quality and fashionable unique design
WE ARE EXCITED TO ANNOUNCE THE GUFO REFERRAL COMPETITION!

-> The competition starts on August 3rd and will end on the closing day of the Indiegogo campaign.

To start referring, share the campaign link, just use the links located just below the video of our Indiegogo page (make sure you are logged into your indiegogo account, if you do not have create it, it costs nothing)
The top referrers will be ranked based on people that they have referred to our campaing and the total level of thei contribution.
The winner will receive the entire collection of GUFO sunglasses (5 models for a total amount of 505 euro).
The runner-up and those until the fifth place, will receive a pair of GUFO sunglasses to choose from.
The sixth-ranked until the tenth, will receive a wooden keychain signed by GUFO
 
SPECIAL PRICE ONLY FOR 30 DAYS 59€ (THEN IT COSTS 99€)
Per COMPRARE gli occhiali, clicca su uno dei modelli di fianco -->
To PURCHASE sunglasses, click one of the perks to the right -->


 
5 Unique design sunglasses models, 100% handmade, eco-friendly, made with great care to details and durability. Backed with a WARRANTY. Just 59€
Note; 59€ is the indiegogo campaign launch price. After we will sell them at 89€.

ABOUT GUFO
GUFO is an Italian creation by Claudio Calvagna, (Designer and Artist) and Giuseppe Marino (Fashion industry entrepreneur).  We are going to launch an inimitible fashionable product with beautiful quality which has no impact on the environment.  
Combining a unique design with quality, as well as being eco-friendly, has not always been easy but this has been mastered with the:
GUFO – Original fashion sunglasses
We started by drawing shapes that we liked, moved it on the wood and then began to knead it by hand.
We have paid attention to 3 crucial points:

A new unique design that is fashionable and which stands out from its competitors;
100% handmade with recycled biodegradable materials which are eco-friendly;
Having great care and attention to detail and its overall superior quality.



 
OUR SPECIAL FIRST COLLECTION OF WOODEN SUNGLASSES
For this first collection we have 5 models with an amazing singular design. For every model you can choose 3 different types of lenses: Coloured mirrored lenses, Mirrored lenses and Standard ones.





 
GUFO IS ALSO BACKED WITH A WARRANTY
We're so confident with the quality that we guarantee them so if something happens to them within the first two years, then please return them to us, we would be happy to replace them.
Warranty includes the wooden sunglasses frame.
Warranty does not cover:  


The break or scratch of the lenses


Wear and tear and aging (e.g. scratched wood; alteration of the color and/or material of wooden frame)


Any damage on any part of the sunglasses resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (knocks dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.)
 

 
MORE ABOUT THE GUFO QUALITY
All of the unisex sunglasses are equipped with high-quality lenses, 100% UVA / UVB protection, and are polarized so preventing the polarized light - hence reflected – from reaching the eyes, thus reducing dramatically the reflections generated from shiny surfaces such as chrome, mirrors and water.
• Multilayer coating of the inner surface with mirror effect of outward and inward antireflection effect. Also the outer surface is antireflection treated to ensure the best results in terms of optical quality.
• Available on colored lenses. With this type the mirror makes the bright color and mirrored, if the lens is white, creates a luminous effect multilayer color-changing reflections. Guaranteed quality optical absorption unchanged and a light and restful.

The material used is wood, specifically maple, as it is known for its resistance. The wood has been coated with a resin to make sure it is totally waterproof which also gives it the advantage of being stable over a long period.

story:
2018 is the 70th anniversary of the Porsche 356.

We're very proud of this new collection and we hope you'll like what you see. Let's make this happen. We're celebrating the anniversary and you get the reward. 

This collection was professionally evaluated and the Certified Recommended Retail Price Evaluation (CRRPE) estimates came in at US $585-685 and it was based on industry benchmarks, the quality, size, craftsmanship, parts, features, design and aesthetics. 

It is all about the watch, the craftsmanship, the quality, the detail, the originality and beauty. Nothing has been overlooked and no corners been cut. This is a trend and brand setter.

SAVE OVER $300 BEFORE THIS BRAND GETS FAMOUS!

Enjoy the beauty of the details of this watch. Top and bottom parts are polished and the middle part is horizontally brushed.

Looking at the case

What Others Said

Close and Personal... Almost!

Race Car enthusiast and renowned designer Alessandro Salvatore from Melbourne, Australia decided to pay homage to the Porsche 356 and the genius behind it, Ferdinand Porsche by creating two watches that share the same dynamism, agility, craftsmanship and creative restlessness. Each watch is available in 4 different case and accent colours.

Dive in to all the elements

Class, Exclusivity and Affordability. Could one balance these things perfectly when creating a watch? Please read on...Oh, one thing first, which is good and bad: the pictures in this campaign do not do these watches justice! They Look so much better in the flesh...

A Short Tour

Quick Release, Really Quick

One more and why not

The case on Ferdi and 3Five6 is a masterpiece. Top and bottom parts of the case are nicely polished and the middle part is horizontally brushed and going all the way around, about 1mm thick. It's hard to photograph but is another thing that makes this great watch stand out when wearing it.

3Five6 in surgical grade 316L stainless steel Graphite Grey & PVD Black with Crimson Red

 4 nicely aligned screws secure the case back, and the inscription, logo and serial number are deeply engraved.

The chronograph pushers and crown are very nicely machined. The pushers give a real nice 'clunk' when you push them in. The crown is also a fine piece of machining, with a textured grip and each watch logo on the end.

The movement is a Ronda 5021.D for Ferdi and 5030.D (10/13 Jewel Swiss quartz movement) respectively. These movements are used in watch brands such as Luminox, Shinola, Christopher Ward, Swiss Army, a.b.art, and a host of other brands that retail from $700-$2000.

Ferdi & 3Five6 are hand-assembled and feature a museum grade sapphire crystal with glare reduction. The watches are available in Silver and Black. The case is 43mm in diameter and water-resistant to 100 meters. It also has a soft iron inner case that protects the movement against magnetic fields.

Full dimensions, colours and other specifications and features can be seen below in the campaign.

Enjoy the beauty of the details of this watch. Top and bottom parts are polished and the middle part is horizontally brushed.The dials on both models are multi-layered in applied elements and the dial on Ferdi is a basket weave Carbon Fibre in matt black. The main hands are also matt with a cleaver black on the base, giving them the appearance that the tips are floating.

The museum grade sapphire is truly stunning and this crystal simply knocks all of the others out of the water. It is so clear it's unbelievable! The anti reflection coating works perfectly and makes this watch seem more expensive than it actually is.

The dials on both models are multi-layered in applied elements and the dial on Ferdi is a basket weave Carbon Fiber in matt black. The main hands are also matt with a cleaver black on the base, giving them the appearance that the tips are floating. 

Discover these beautiful watches and reserve yours today!

3FiveSix Silver, Ferdi Black, 3FiveSix Black and Ferdi Silver

The straps are lovely with so many options to choose from. Black or mocha Italian vegetable tanned leather and durable silicone to match accent colours. All straps are incredibly soft and very nice to wear. Straps taper from 22mm at the lugs to 20mm at the buckle. This is done by a very subtle step-in about an inch into the strap. It has the quick release tags, so no accidental scratching of the lugs trying to remove the strap! Silicone rubber straps are also an option. You can see the strap options below.

The buckle, like the case, also has a polished top corner edge and the engraving is very deep too! All of these small things make this watch extra special.

You will choose the model, colour & strap of choice in BackerKit after the campaign ends

The Swiss have that image of producing quality at the highest level, as Germans have the image of producing the best cars in the world, and you cannot just copy either.

Watches made in Switzerland are the best in the world. They have a long tradition of being incredibly precise, resistant and compact. Up until now, their quality is unequalled.

Strict Swiss regulations: Movement manufactured in Switzerland, assembled and inspected in Switzerland, 60% or more components must be sourced from Switzerland.

The hands and hour indices are luminous and glow nice and bright in the dark and semi-dark environments

The Porsche 356 is a luxury sports car first produced by Austrian company Porsche Konstruktionen GesmbH (1948–1949), and then by German company Dr. Ing. h. c. F. Porsche GmbH (1950–1965). It was Porsche's first production automobile.

In 1950 the factory relocated to Zuffenhausen, Germany, and general production of the 356 continued until April 1965, well after the replacement model 911 made its autumn 1963 debut. Of the 76,000 originally produced, approximately half still exist. 

Although the first 356-type Porsche was manufactured in 1948, the line didn't really come into its own until the late 1950s. Called the 356A, these cars came in coupe, convertible and speedster body types. All were available with the 1300cc or 1600cc engines, each size available in two states of tune. All engines were flat four cylinders, air-cooled. The suffix "S" denotes a specially tuned engine. The Carrera-type coupe was fitted with a GS competition engine with 4 overhead camshafts. It produced 100hp at 6200 rpm and gave a top speed of around 125 mph.

The standard 356 cars were equipped with pushrod-operated overhead valves and produced 75 hp at 5000 rpm. This doesn't sound like much today, but bear in mind that the cars themselves only weighed 2000 pounds. They were small, with a wheelbase of 85 inches and overall length of around 11 feet.

Every watch has its own identity that is unique and personal

Watches are shipped from Europe and not subject to duty or taxes in EU countries

Passion                            Honesty                                     Integrity                            Excellence     

Passion for what we do and Honesty, Integrity and Excellence in how we do it. This is how I've operated my whole professional career and will not deviate from this as it remains the foundation and my four pillars to success. Period

There are few times when you open a watch box and simply go wow and immediately fall in love with the watch. I love it when it happens, but has only happened to me a couple of times. With Ferdi and 3Five6, we guarantee it and we guarantee that we will also ship on time. Period.

While the watches will be manufactured in the strict tradition of Swiss watchmaking, we realise that it might not be the perfect fit for everyone. If you feel that the watch did not meet your expectations and you have not worn or used it, simply contact us within 30 days for a full refund.

We have worked very hard over the past year to reach this stage. We will continue to do our best until you have received your selected Watch and are fully satisfied! And to do that, we sincerely need your support!

Together, let's make Ferdi & 3Five6 by Alessandro Salvatore a success story!

 

Risks and challenges

This is my second Kickstarter. My first was for a complicated world timer watch that we’d do soon as I work out how to make it even more affordable. I have learnt a lot from the first campaign so here I am trying again with different designs and price point strategy but remain focused on what makes a great high quality Swiss watch and hope to gain your support. And like Ferdinand Porsche said “If one does not fail at times, then one has not challenged himself.”

I am a seasoned award-winning designer and the manufacturing Swiss partners have years of experience in the industry! We are aware our project is complex and that there are always unforeseen issues, but we have anticipated and planned for potential risks and have built a rock-solid production and delivery plan. We see the risk small and what remains is the challenge and we are quite ready.

Firstly, our production is quite advanced and our manufacturer produces high-end famous Swiss watch brands so you can be very confident about our capacity to provide high-quality products on time. We spent nearly 1-year designing, developing, and receiving finalized production samples. Secondly, we have very skilful and professional suppliers and do not anticipate delays to our timeline. However, if by chance anything unexpected happens, we promise to remain open, transparent and keep you updated throughout the journey.

Thanks for the support! We are excited to take this next step with you, the Indiegogo community!

story:
As an inventor, I'm known for my stove designs, specifically the Original and the Nano Firebox Camping Stoves but I'm always exploring ideas. So when the minimalist wallet revolution started I perked up and became very intrigued! I tried several designs, some I bought and some I made. While I liked keeping everything in my front pocket I didn't like removing my cash to make payment always setting my wallet on the counter or holding it under my arm.  I really wanted to be able to work directly from my wallet and with some privacy all while maintaining the compact thin design of the most popular front pocket wallets. That became the challenge, A thin working wallet! 

The wallets I tried generally had some sort of tension holding the bills and cards, but when I would try to remove just one bill others would come with it and putting my change back didn't work at all. I found myself removing all of my cards or cash way too often. I finally realized that I needed to let go of the conventional standard of everything being held with some kind of resistance. By giving both my cards and my bills some wiggle room, I can shuffle through my cards in place and I can remove or replace a single bill without affecting the rest. Voila! It really works! My daughter recommended that I tuck in the tongue, I found that doing so tightened everything up so in the end everything is still held very securely! Remove the tongue and everything loosens up and becomes very easy to work with.

 It's so beautifully simple!  (Patent Pending)

It was designed for the US Dollar and standard credit card sizes.  Many international banknotes also fit. See size references below.

The wallet tongue is 70mm wide and will hold bills up to 178mm.

story:
Hello!

 

My name is Kaity Rathman and I design and make womens clothing for Kaity Rathman Designs.

This campaign is very exciting for me because I've been invited to showcase my work in New York for PLITZS New York Fashion Week.  This is very important to me as a person, designer, and artist to further my career goals as a fashion designer.  Overall, this opportunity will help me get my name out there as a designer and kick start my career.

By contributing to this project, you will be helping me fly to NY, represent the midwest, help me meet and network with professionals in the industry, and this opportunity even has the possibility of finding investors to launch my brand!

What I Need & What You Get

This entire process is expensive and any amount donated will be greatly appreciated. I am working to get to at least $2,000. This money will go toward the following: 
• Venue, staging, and Lighting
• Up to 50 looks
• Up to 50 professional models assigned from the PLITZS Model Pool
• Invitation to the Media and Press Release
• Inclusion on Event Website with Brand Profile and link to Designer’s web page
• Photos, Hair, and Makeup
• Attendance to one scheduled model fitting prior to the show
• Dressers to assist the designer backstage and during the show
• Travel expenses, shipping of garments, and hotel.

By donating specific amounts I will be providing perks such as hand made accessories, discounts on my etsy shop, and credit for being a fantastic supporter on my social media sites.

If funds are not met, the money will still continue to go toward this trip to NY.  I am very determined and passionate about making this happen.  Again, any amount will go a very long way and I can't tell you how much it means to me.

Why Should You Send Me To New York?

I have seven years of retail experience, two years of management experience, six years of visual merchandising experience, and I have participated in nine fashion shows within the Midwest, including Kansas City Fashion Week.  I interned with Nicole Miller during the summer of 2012 in New York City within the production department ... And I have a hunger for more!  I have a passion for my craft and a drive for success.  With a strong work ethic, I am excited to represent the Midwest in a positive and fashionable light!

Other Ways You Can Help

 

If you are unable to contribute, please share this campaign with friends and family.  Lets make some noise for the Midwest!  

More About Me

I absolutely love colors, trends, textures, and art.  My looks are trendy and glamorous for the modern day woman.  The garments I create are ideal for parties, cocktails, and trendy venues or for the fashion forward woman who likes to push the envelope.  Some of my looks range from couture evening wear to edgy street wear.

My studio is a creative atmosphere in my two bedroom apartment.  My inspiration comes from architecture, organics, and textures.  My sketch books are loaded with magazine clippings of interesting silhouettes, imagery, artwork, and fabric swatches.  I love to scout fabric swatches in store, but ultimately I can’t get enough Mood Fabric swatches in the mail!  I love to touch and feel the fabric as inspiration for my draping or pattern work.

Most of my designs start as sketches and others come from draping on a dress form.  Often times a sketch will turn out differently once I’ve started the pattern work process as I make decisions and find creative solutions for ideas.  I do all of my own draping, pattern work, cutting, and sewing on my own.  One day I hope to have my own company to help me with this long process!

As of right now my works are shown on runways in Lincoln, Omaha, Kansas City, and soon New York!  I am currently selling my work on Etsy but hope to find the opportunity to sell in boutiques or larger on-line retailers.  I hope to one day see my work sold all around the world with my own brand in stores.

I love my craft because it lets me express myself creatively and I love to see my works come to life on the real human body.  I’m addicted to it and I am always looking forward to putting together my next collection. 

 

More photography

story:
PRE-SALE OF THE OMEGA PANTS CONTINUE ON OUR ONLINE STORE. GO AND GRAB YOURS BEFORE THE LAST UNITS WITH PRE-SALE PRICE REMAIN!

 

 

 

 

this is an animated image - please allow time to load

 

Now, the problem is that when fabrics stretch, you normally lose the waterproofness.  Nevertheless, this was something we couldn’t sacrifice as being totally waterproof (not only water repellent but fully waterproof) was of paramount importance for us. A revolutionary membrane with the ability to stretch while keeping this property was engineered to empower the OMEGA pants.

 

this is an animated image - please allow time to load

this is an animated image - please allow time to load

We ran the Martindale abrasion and pilling test (this test basically “rubs” the fabrics over and over to see when it gets damaged). Normally the maximum amount of rubs you measure are 50.000 - but we are all about experimenting and going the extra mile, so we requested a 150.000 rubs test.

 

this is an animated image - please allow time to load

this is an animated image - please allow time to load

 

 

this is an animated image - please allow time to load

 

 

 

this is an animated image - please allow time to load

We live active lives and Bear Grill’s quote “Improvise. Adapt. Overcome.” makes more sense than ever. But... what if, we wouldn’t need to improvise that much, and our clothing would adapt to the situation rather than us having to change our gear every time we face a different scenario? Well, the OMEGA pants are engineered for this. 

this is an animated image - please allow time to load

 

 

 

 

At Graphene-X we create all-round performance apparel from the strongest material on earth to empower you to live a boundless life. We believe in quality, not in quantity. We believe that gear should last you a lifetime.

this is an animated image - please allow time to load

story:
Watch Our Story 

Upcoming Events

[Aug 30]    Last Hurrah! Lingerie Party @ Times Ten Cellars

[Aug 25]   A Live-Stream Look at the Making of Cherie Amie's 2013 Wall Calendar

In the News

 

 

Our Story

What if your panties could change the world? Now they can.

Starting this year, we want to launch Cherie Amie, a not-so-ordinary lingerie company that empowers women to fight poverty - just by looking sexy in their knickers.
 
Why intimate apparel? We want to take something that represents so many things to so many people - beauty, elegance, self-indulgence, to name a few - and transform it into a poverty-eradicating, woman-empowering transaction that never stops giving. Ever.
 
Watch our CW-33 news segment to hear the story from us!

How We Fight Poverty

We plan to use our lingerie to lift women out of poverty in three sustainable ways. Read more below and visit www.besexybuyfair.com to learn more about how we plan to change the world - in style.

1. We Help Women Start Businesses

As a Good Returns company, we'll contribute 100% of our end-of-year profits to qualifying nonprofits that make interest-free micro-loans (average size: $100 to $150) to women in poverty around the world. These borrowers typically start businesses, invest in livestock for their farms, or pay for continuing education. Under the Good Returns model, virtually all of our profits will return to us after one year in service.

2. We Treat Our Artisans Well

All of our lingerie is uniquely produced by artisans in Cameroon, West Africa. As a fair-trade company, we'll accordingly provide fair wages to our artisans under fair conditions. That means every woman under our roof gets a say in management, receives access to a just confliction resolution process, and benefits from above-market pay. Hence our tagline: Be Sexy. Buy Fair.

3. We Invest in Peace

In addition to microfinance and fair trade, we plan to contribute 10% of our net income to Peace Tree Africa, our 501(c)3 tax-exempt nonprofit arm, which finances sustainable development projects across sub-Saharan Africa. Peace Tree Africa subsidizes 75% of the costs for projects and requires 25% in contributions from participating communities. Click here to learn more.

Your Contribution

With your help, we'll be able to test-drive intimate apparel from sub-Saharan Africa for a Western audience. Our co-founder, Tara, will use less than one-seventh of the funds to travel to Cameroon to start production with our artisans in October. We expect to roll out the lingerie and sell it online in time for the Christmas holiday season.

Your Perk

We want to reward you in a memorable way for taking a chance on fair-trade lingerie. To that end, we will woo you with memorable dedication videos, postcards and calendars that feature Our Fair Ladies (below), and sexy lingerie you can slip into with purpose.

Garments from left to right: Ready Teddy, Bonsoir Baby Doll with Untie Me panties, and Humanitarian Hottie panties

While some rewards are instantaneous, others will take time, and vary by contribution. We will send our lingerie to recipients who contribute $10, $25, $50, $75, $200, $300, or $500 by November. If your name is featured in a PRNewswire press release, note that we'll send it after we reach our goal in August. Please contact us directly if you want to contribute at any level more than $2,000.

Goal Breakdown

Here's what $15,000 looks like for our small business.

Artisan Production ($762.00)    

  • Sewing patterns & designs ($100.00)
  • Quality control & training ($462.00)
  • Updated sewing equipment ($200.00)

Product Order ($6,200.00)

  • 300 Benevolent Boxers
  • 300 Bonsoir Baby Dolls
  • 300 Humanitarian Hottie boy short panties
  • 300 Ready Teddies
  • 300 Untie Me side-tie panties
  • 1,500 Goodwill Garters

Product Details ($3,500)

  • Travel expenses/product freight ($2,000.00)
  • Product packaging ($900.00)
  • Product clothing labels ($600.00)

Indiegogo Cut @ 9% ($1,050.00)

Taxes @ 25% ($3,488.00)*

Total ($15,000.00)

Why We Design in Africa

We believe in big, game-changing ideas. Ours is simple when it comes to Africa: Turn heads in a novel way for a change.

Too often, Africa gets a bad rap it doesn't deserve. We want to change the way Westerners see and think of 54 independent countries, their culture, and people, starting with African-made lingerie.

As a company that subscribes to fair-trade principles, we also want to advance a system of exchange that promotes fair and equal treatment for artisans, producers, and factory workers in developing communities.

Below is a picture of Madame Jacobine, one of the artisans with whom we'll collaborate to produce fair-trade lingerie.

Who We Are

We're not your typical lingerie addicts. So far, our company includes Tara (below left), a Returned Peace Corps Volunteer who served in Cameroon for two years, and Ryan (below right, delivering wheelchairs), a Rotary Ambassadorial Scholar who lived and worked in Uganda for a year.
 
 

Together, we want to use our knowledge of Africa and sustainable development to jumpstart a lingerie line made by - and made to benefit - people on the edge of extreme poverty.

(P.S.: Ryan proposed to Tara live on NBC on Valentine's Day this year.)

Share Our Story

Don't have a dollar to your name? That's okay! You can help us by sharing our story with your friends.

  • Tweet us @Cherie_Amie
  • Facebook us at Cherie Amie
  • Subscribe to our blog at www.besexybuyfair.com

*Disclaimer: We were advised to set aside at least 25% for taxes, as the money we raise will be considered income.

Updates

[Aug 14] 3 Reasons Why You Should Back Do-Good Lingerie by co-founder Ryan Schuette

[Aug 9]   Video Update #6 with co-founder Tara Smith

[Aug 7]   Video Update #5    "         "         "         "

              Why Do-Good Lingerie? by co-founder Ryan Schuette

[July 25] Video Update #4 with co-founder Tara Smith

[July 21] Video Update #3 with one of Our Fair Ladies!

[July 20] Video Update #2  with co-founder Tara Smith

[July 19] Video Update #1    "         "         "         "

story:
Who are we?

We are a group of computer engineering students with an idea for something new.

Why is this important?

  • Reduce clothing waste.
  • Reduce sweat shops.
  • Bring affordable, custom-fitted clothing creation right into the comfort of your own home.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need money to build a prototype.
  • We have a patent pending, and a design. We just need to build our proof of concept.
  • Most likely all funds will go straight towards materials. If we happen to make more than we need the extra will go towards improving the next version.

 

Risks & Challenges

There is a possibility that we will not be able to create this device. However, every failure is a step forward in the field of engineering and science if everything is documented. We plan to keep working at this project even if it takes a while to complete because we believe in the importance of our mission. Also, although we are students, we are mostly done with our degrees and are being supervised/aided by an experienced engineer at our program.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute financially:

  • Please get the word out and share our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thanks everyone!

story:
The Italian craftsmen at Ace Marks are the same men and women who work for some of the most renowned luxury brands in the world. Their craftsmanship is deeply rooted in tradition and they have been thriving for four generations. Together, we created an attainable, handcrafted, ultra-luxury dress shoe that comes packed with features and is designed for comfort. 

Whether you’re heading a startup or running a Fortune 500 company, Ace Marks shoes make a bold, powerful statement.

Ace Marks is the first and only luxury brand that will buy back its shoes. Indiegogo supporters will be able to send back their old Ace Marks for a $60 credit towards a new full priced pair purchased from our website. We partnered with Career Gear, a leading national organization helping men in need, to donate your old shoes and help men get back on their feet and re-enter the work force. Last year, we donated over $15,000 in luxury dress shoes to Career Gear! 

 

The Luke is a versatile dress shoe that can be worn for your Monday morning meeting, a casual night out and anything in-between. Decorative perforation and broguing details preserve tradition, and novel design curves bring this classic into today. These wingtips strike the perfect balance between traditional and modern.

 

The Kendrik can carry you through your daily office grind or accentuate your look at the local speakeasy. Whether you choose an understated color block or beautiful mono color look, these full brogue cap toes scream confidence with every step.

 

The Aron's contrasting materials and vibrant leather tones make a statement no matter how you pair them. Dressed up or dress down, it won't matter what you wear because all eyes will be on the monks.

 

The Greg is your best friend. Whether you're grabbing some drinks at a Hamptons soiree or getting better acquainted with your top producers, there's almost no look Greg can't enhance. The leather color combinations are just eccentric enough to be interesting, but not overpowering, and the suedes can make a pair of chinos look fancy.  

 

The Amit goes great with khakis, jeans, and with the right attitude, even a casual suit. Rendered in richly oiled leathers and furnished with a traditional tassel, the Amit fuses a classic preppy style with modern colors and materials.

On the Lorenzo, the beautiful hand antiquing and burnishing of the calf skin leathers truly stand out. The Lorenzo can smoothly transition from a day shoe paired with a suit to a powerful accent shoe worn with jeans.

 

 

ADD A MATCHING BELT TO YOUR PLEDGE +$80. Belts are all one length and can be cut to size. This can be done at home, or at a local shoe repair shop for a nominal fee. 

 

Each pair of Ace Marks dress shoes is made with full grain calf skin leather and is crafted, dyed, and burnished by hand. The manual process gives each pair its unique characteristics. Each pair goes through a rigorous inspection to ensure that every shoe is of the highest quality.

Our manufacturing process is done completely in-house. Each shoe takes great precision and skill to ensure the outcome is impeccable. 

 

 

No middlemen. No crazy markup. Just magnificent shoes at a magnificent price that we will buy back when you're ready for a new pair.

Our disruptive business model goes beyond cutting out the middle man to give our supporters direct to consumer pricing.

We created the Leave Your Marks program to activate the Ace Marks family and incentivize giving back. By sending back your worn Ace Marks Italian Luxury Statement shoes every time you buy a new full priced Italian luxury Statement shoe from www.acemarks.com, you, our Indiegogo supporters, not only get a $60 credit and a great reason to keep your shoe game fresh, you also participate in changing someone's life. 

To make sure that our shoe donations are put to good use, we partnered with Career Gear to donate them to help men in need enter the workforce, stay employed and become role models and mentors to their families and communities.

Ace Marks is the first and only luxury shoe company to do this!

Since our first campaign, we have donated over $15,000 in luxury shoes to CareerGear and we're excited to see how many more men we can help get back on their feet! 

 

When it comes to luxury, no matter how good your shoe looks, comfort is just as important. Ace Marks shoes are bold, flexible, and light. 

We spent 3 years in development to make sure that we get it right, and we spared no expense. Each pair is superbly handcrafted, hand burnished, and packed with features.   

That's why Ace Marks shoes:

  • Are made from hand-selected full-grain calf skin leather.  
  • Use a lightweight Blake Flex construction and leather outsole that allows for easy, effortless movement. 
  • Reduce common pressure points around the heel and mid-foot with our carefully constructed Ace last (a.k.a. forma). 
  • Relieve stress as you walk with a cushioned leather insole, which molds to your foot over time for added comfort. 
  • Are lined with supple calfskin leather to keep your feet dry and cool. 

 

Ace Marks was designed for the modern gentleman looking to step up his style and add a bit of swagger. The Ace Marks man is not afraid to be bold in his success. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Becoming one of our backers means much more than just buying a world class shoe at an amazing price. Each backer at any pledge level: 

  • Will be Added to our Ace Marks Elite to get exclusive access to limited run shoes and colors.
  • Will be able to sell their old Ace Marks Italian Luxury Statement shoes back to us for $60.

 

Our shoes go well beyond comfort and style. By cutting out the middlemen, we’re able to deliver the highest quality product at a market disruptive price. Luxury doesn't have to cost a small fortune.

Ace Marks shoes are statement shoes. They are well-made, attractive and eye-catching shoes that reflect your personality

Our designs are modern classics in unique color and material combinations and packed with features

Ace Marks is for the modern gentleman that appreciates craftsmanship and style.

Ace Marks Shoes are available from US size 5 to 14, including half sizes. They are available in 2 width options:

1) "D", medium/standard width cut generously around the midfoot and heel to prevent unnecessary pressure on the foot.

2) "E", wider than a "D" width, cut generously around the midfoot and heel to prevent unnecessary pressure on the foot.

Our shoes fit true to US Brannock sizing. Still, it will be VERY important that you follow our fitting & sizing instructions that we will send at the end of the campaign to get the best fit. 

If the size you order happens to not be the best fit, we will exchange it for you (please see DELIVERY section below for shipping charges on exchanges). 

 

 

Once the campaign is funded, we expect that it will take 2-3 weeks for us to send the survey and receive back the style, color, and size surveys from all backers. The faster we get them back the less likely any delays!

Production typically takes 8-10 weeks, and shipping approximately 3 weeks.

By December 2017, or sooner, we expect to be shipping to you from our facilities in the US and EU. 

We are very experienced in delivering shoes on time! We will do everything in our power to make sure we meet the timeline. 

If you order it, you will receive it! Every backer will receive his reward. 

Shipping is included for all shipments in the continental United States. 

However, if the need for an exchange arises, we will need to charge for the exchange shipping both ways as we are a startup and work with very small margins on Indiegogo. This is true for domestic & international orders. 

All exchange requests must be submitted within 30 days of receiving your reward. 

The cost of international shipping & VAT (if applicable) will be charged at the time of the survey once the campaign is over and will vary based on the destination country. You can see international shipping rates here. If applicable, duties and local taxes will be charged by the appropriate authority at the destination country. Please determine these charges locally.

Continental US & Canadian orders will ship from our facility in Miami, FL. 

All other orders will ship from our fulfillment center in the EU. Orders shipped within the EU will not incur customs duty charges but will be subject to VAT. 

Ace Marks wasn't created on a whim. It is the product of a lifetime of research and experience in the luxury footwear business.

Our founder, Paul, grew up traveling with his parents to Italy & Spain's shoe factories. Formally educated in International Finance & Marketing at the University of Miami, he and his brother Daniel, as their parents before them, have dedicated their lives to designing and producing luxury footwear of the highest quality. Their footwear experience ranges from designing & manufacturing to marketing, warehousing and logistics. They have done it all.

To assure that our supporters receive top notch service, we put together a team with extensive experience in footwear logistics and distribution. 

This is our second Crowdfunding campaign, and we are more prepared than ever to continue surpassing our backer's expectations. We are excited to share our new products and vision with the world!

 

 

Quality. We spent a lot of time finding the best artisans in Italy that have the materials, the facilities, the pedigree and, most importantly, the experience to create a world-class luxury shoe. We spared no expense to make sure that you will get only the best.

Affordability. By implementing a disruptive business model that delivers your shoes straight from the artisan's hands to your doorsteps, we eliminate the need for retailers, wholesalers, and other middlemen. The workmanship and luxury you will experience with our shoes is incomparable, at a price that is unparalleled. Less than $250 for a $600-$1,000+ shoe. We did it for YOU.

Communication. Your commitment to us is the start of a long, beautiful relationship. We are committed to you. We will keep our relationship strong by delivering amazing products and communicate with you every step of the way. You will get regular updates as we fund, produce, and ship out your one-of-a-kind shoes. If you have an itch to talk to us, just get in touch any time!  

Consistency. Every Ace Marks shoe is hand crafted and hand dyed, meaning that no two pairs are identical. However, each pair goes through a thorough inspection process to assure the quality you expect from a world-class luxury brand.

Experience & Reliability. Ace Marks was founded by a team with a lifetime of experience in the luxury footwear industry. We don't make commitments that we can't honor. We have the infrastructure to assure a smooth process from taking your order thru delivery. We want to be your go-to brand for all things men's luxury, and we will earn your confidence. 

We are building more than a shoe, we are building a family. The Ace Marks Family!

Dear Supporters, 

We spent 3 years, pouring our heart and soul into bringing Ace Marks to life. Last year, we launched our first Kickstarter campaign and the love we felt from the Kickstarter community was overwhelming. We are super excited to share our latest shoes with you first!

Making our second collection was no easy task, and we spent many weeks at our factory designing and developing shoes that will make you look good and feel powerful every time you put them on. When you receive your first pair of Ace Marks shoes, it will be clear to you that we accomplished our goal. Now we just need you to help us bring our second collection to life.

From the start, it was also very important to us that Ace Marks makes a strong impact on our community. With so many men and women struggling to support their families, we want to do our part to help them overcome at least one of the obstacles that they are facing, which is to find meaningful employment. That is why we partnered with Career Gear and implemented our buy back program. This past year, we were proud to donate over $15,000 in shoes to help men make an impact on their communities. We hope that our shoe donations will help thousands of men take their first steps into a brighter future.

With your help, we will continue to grow Ace Marks into a luxury lifestyle brand driven by a commitment to fine craftsmanship, beautiful aesthetics, and your happiness. It is for you, that we will continue to innovate and create.

Through our journey, we have learned that Ace Marks is ultimately about empowerment. We are empowering you with confidence and direct access to luxury statement shoes, and we are empowering men across the country to get back on their feet.

Thank you for allowing us to do what we love and for spreading the word. Share our campaign with the world.

 

 

YOU are key to the success of our campaign, and ultimately our company. Without you, we don't have a reason to exist!

We need your support to get our second collection off the ground and to assure that modern gentleman everywhere have access to luxury Italian statement shoes! 

As you become part of our inner circle, help us by sharing our campaign with YOUR inner circle. Thank you!
story_txt:
The Italian craftsmen at Ace Marks are the same men and women who work for some of the most renowned luxury brands in the world. Their craftsmanship is deeply rooted in tradition and they have been thriving for four generations. Together, we created an attainable, handcrafted, ultra-luxury dress shoe that comes packed with features and is designed for comfort. Our factory's traditional construction is combined with our innovative design and bold attitude. Ace Marks shoes are built for the modern gentleman. Help us make our SECOND production!
 Whether you’re heading a startup or running a Fortune 500 company, Ace Marks shoes make a bold, powerful statement.

Ace Marks is the first and only luxury brand that will buy back its shoes. Indiegogo supporters will be able to send back their old Ace Marks for a $60 credit towards a new full priced pair purchased from our website. We partnered with Career Gear, a leading national organization helping men in need, to donate your old shoes and help men get back on their feet and re-enter the work force. Last year, we donated over $15,000 in luxury dress shoes to Career Gear! 

 


The Luke is a versatile dress shoe that can be worn for your Monday morning meeting, a casual night out and anything in-between. Decorative perforation and broguing details preserve tradition, and novel design curves bring this classic into today. These wingtips strike the perfect balance between traditional and modern.

 

The Kendrik can carry you through your daily office grind or accentuate your look at the local speakeasy. Whether you choose an understated color block or beautiful mono color look, these full brogue cap toes scream confidence with every step.

 
The Aron's contrasting materials and vibrant leather tones make a statement no matter how you pair them. Dressed up or dress down, it won't matter what you wear because all eyes will be on the monks.

 

The Greg is your best friend. Whether you're grabbing some drinks at a Hamptons soiree or getting better acquainted with your top producers, there's almost no look Greg can't enhance. The leather color combinations are just eccentric enough to be interesting, but not overpowering, and the suedes can make a pair of chinos look fancy.  

 

The Amit goes great with khakis, jeans, and with the right attitude, even a casual suit. Rendered in richly oiled leathers and furnished with a traditional tassel, the Amit fuses a classic preppy style with modern colors and materials.

On the Lorenzo, the beautiful hand antiquing and burnishing of the calf skin leathers truly stand out. The Lorenzo can smoothly transition from a day shoe paired with a suit to a powerful accent shoe worn with jeans.
 
 
 

 
 


 
ADD A MATCHING BELT TO YOUR PLEDGE +$80. Belts are all one length and can be cut to size. This can be done at home, or at a local shoe repair shop for a nominal fee. 

 

Each pair of Ace Marks dress shoes is made with full grain calf skin leather and is crafted, dyed, and burnished by hand. The manual process gives each pair its unique characteristics. Each pair goes through a rigorous inspection to ensure that every shoe is of the highest quality.

Our manufacturing process is done completely in-house. Each shoe takes great precision and skill to ensure the outcome is impeccable. 
 

 

No middlemen. No crazy markup. Just magnificent shoes at a magnificent price that we will buy back when you're ready for a new pair.

Our disruptive business model goes beyond cutting out the middle man to give our supporters direct to consumer pricing.

We created the Leave Your Marks program to activate the Ace Marks family and incentivize giving back. By sending back your worn Ace Marks Italian Luxury Statement shoes every time you buy a new full priced Italian luxury Statement shoe from www.acemarks.com, you, our Indiegogo supporters, not only get a $60 credit and a great reason to keep your shoe game fresh, you also participate in changing someone's life. 
To make sure that our shoe donations are put to good use, we partnered with Career Gear to donate them to help men in need enter the workforce, stay employed and become role models and mentors to their families and communities.
Ace Marks is the first and only luxury shoe company to do this!
Since our first campaign, we have donated over $15,000 in luxury shoes to CareerGear and we're excited to see how many more men we can help get back on their feet! 

 

When it comes to luxury, no matter how good your shoe looks, comfort is just as important. Ace Marks shoes are bold, flexible, and light. 

We spent 3 years in development to make sure that we get it right, and we spared no expense. Each pair is superbly handcrafted, hand burnished, and packed with features.   

That's why Ace Marks shoes:

Are made from hand-selected full-grain calf skin leather.  
Use a lightweight Blake Flex construction and leather outsole that allows for easy, effortless movement. 

Reduce common pressure points around the heel and mid-foot with our carefully constructed Ace last (a.k.a. forma). 

Relieve stress as you walk with a cushioned leather insole, which molds to your foot over time for added comfort. 
Are lined with supple calfskin leather to keep your feet dry and cool. 


 

Ace Marks was designed for the modern gentleman looking to step up his style and add a bit of swagger. The Ace Marks man is not afraid to be bold in his success. 
Cap Toe Kendrick in Brown Antique & Blue Suede
 
Penny Loafer Greg in Chocolate Suede
 
Limited Edition Diablo Antique Tassel Loafers
 
Cap Toe Blucher Stuart in Dk. Brown Antique & Brown Antique
 
Penny Loafer Greg in Diablo Antique & Dk. Grey Leather
 
Wingtip Oxford Luke in Cuoio Antique
 
Tassel Loafer Amit in Black Antique & Diablo Tassel
 
Limited Edition Slip on Loafer in Brown Antique
 
Cap Toe Kendrick in Dk. Grey Antique & Dk. Blue Antique
 
Chukka Boot Lorenzo in Cuoio Antique
 
Single Monk Aron in Navy Antique & Navy Suede

story:
We've created the perfect shoe for summer, the Winkers Resort Shoe....relaxed enough for the beach, cool enough for the bar, and comfortable enough to wear all day. 

Now we are offering you the chance to enjoy three great early bird perks.

HOW CAN YOU GET INVOLVED?

Make a pledge choosing from our three great perks:

  • Pledge £175 or more for one pair (30 pairs available) - in the size and colour of your choice
  • Pledge £300 or more for two pairs - in the size and colour of your choice
  • Pledge £1000 or more for nine pairs - in the size and colour of your choice

WHY ARE WINKERS RESORT SHOES SO GREAT?

  • They are Limited Edition - maximum of 500 pairs
  • They are inspired by the classic espadrille
  • They are designed in London and made in England
  • They will retail at £199 (Sterling) when they launch April/May 2016
  • They are made on a well-fitting, comfortable last that we have developed specifically for this project, with plenty of room for the toes
  • They are available in both full and half sizes from UK 3 - 12 (see size chart)
  • They are leather lined with a leather sole and heel
  • They are made in a choice of nine, beautifully tactile but robust Designers Guild fabrics. (Designers Guild is renowned for its high quality, creative and innovative designs).

THE FABRICS

THE COLOURS

Each one is named after a British seaside town to reflect the hazy, rain-washed tones of our scenic coastline. 

How did the Winkers Project begin? 

THE BESPOKE SHOE STORY

As traditionally trained, bespoke (custom made) shoemakers we are really passionate about shoes. 


We make each pair entirely from scratch. We start by taking a client's measurements.

Then their lasts are made - the wooden blocks we make the shoes on.

The shoes are designed on the lasts, patterns are made, leather is cut and the uppers stitched.

After a couple of fittings the shoes are hand sewn.

And delivered to the client with bespoke shoe trees.

So when we say we know how to make a fantastic pair of shoes, we really do!

The Winkers Project

Over the years customers have asked us to make ready to wear shoes - something stylish, affordable and English-made - so that's how the Winkers project began.

Now we have finally put everything we know into making the Winkers Resort Shoe the perfect summer shoe.

Our keen eye for detail.

Our expertise on a comfortable fit.

And our design skills.

We have road tested various styles.

Adjusted the design.

And improved the fit.

PRODUCTION

And it is not just the fit and beautiful materials that make Winkers Resort Shoes so special.

England has a great shoemaking heritage and we wanted to harness some of that shoemaking talent. So we are working with a small, family-run factory in the North of England to make this collection. They have been making shoes for generations and together we have created a shoe that is comfortable and stylish.

KEY FEATURES

  •  Calf leather lining to help your feet breathe
  •  Top edge bound in super soft kid leather for comfort
  •  Lightweight leather sole and heel for durability
  •  Kid leather back tab for strength
  •  Reverse counter lining for heel grip
  •  Padded calf leather full sock on the insole for comfort

 TIMELINE

 SIZE CHART

The chart below is intended as a general guide and is based on Men's sizing from 5 upwards and Women's below size 5. We're sorry if it's confusing, but unfortunately there is no one uniform sizing system for shoes. They do vary from country to country and from last to last. 

Goal

Now is your  chance to be part of this exciting launch.

Winkers Resort Shoes: Designed in London, Made in England, Travelling the World

Thank you

"Thank you to everyone who has supported our campaign, to everyone who travelled the world in their Winkers and to everyone who has helped to get our project this far." 

Deborah & James

Risks and challenges

We've worked in this industry for over 20 years, so we are confident that we know what the pitfalls are and how to overcome them.

Our main challenge is working with a small factory. We have been sampling for a few months now to ensure the best quality and to understand the team there better, so that we can work together to get the shoes delivered on time. We've booked ourselves into the production schedule and left a little wriggle room for our delivery deadline.

Delivery can also be a potential obstacle, but we are working with a tried and tested fulfilment company which ships shoes worldwide on a daily basis, so you will be in safe hands.

Fit is also a challenge with shoes. We have worked hard to develop a last (the blocks the shoes are made on) that gives the optimum fit and makes for comfy shoes. But just in case your first choice doesn't work out, we will order enough shoes in a variety of sizes to allow for returns so that you have a great pair of well fitting, stylish shoes to wear.

Based in Bloomsbury, London, we've been hand stitching bespoke shoes for over 20 years for scores of discerning, stylish gentlemen from around the world.

We make each pair entirely from scratch. We start by taking a client's measurements.

Risks and challengesWe've worked in this industry for over 20 years, so we are confident that we know what the pitfalls are and how to overcome them.Our main challenge is working with a small factory. We have been sampling for a few months now to ensure the best quality and to understand the team there better, so that we can work together to get the shoes delivered on time. We've booked ourselves into the production schedule and left a little wriggle room for our delivery deadline.Delivery can also be a potential obstacle, but we are working with a tried and tested fulfilment company which ships shoes worldwide on a daily basis, so you will be in safe hands.Fit is also a challenge with shoes. We have worked hard to develop a last (the blocks the shoes are made on) that gives the optimum fit and makes for comfy shoes. But just in case your first choice doesn't work out, we will order enough shoes in a variety of sizes to allow for returns so that you have a great pair of well fitting, stylish shoes to wear.

story:
A skirt and pumps? Not so much!

Hi everyone,

The picture before you is of me...

it gives you a visual to sort of relate to how I frequently feel when I'm looking for clothing that will express who I am on the inside. I am not alone.

My name is Karen Roberts and I am co- owner of a business in Northern California. During the day, I work as a Realtor. I spend my evenings and weekends sketching and designing clothes that myself and my peers would love to be able to wear.

 

I am a professional woman that meets with the daily challenge of deciding what clothing I will wear to work each day to meetings or trainings that outwardly express who I am internally.I want my clothes to be better designed, self expressive and work for my lifestyle.

Finally...!

Butch by Design offers a much needed service to women that choose their clothing based on how they feel inside. These women don't relate to dresses, feminine jumpsuits and skirts. They aren't even fond of blouses! Our revolutionary line of clothing is designed to be proportioned to fit a range of body shapes that empower women.
 
Can you imagine Ellen in anything other than the way you see her dressed everyday? Fortunatley for her, she has the resources to have clothes made for her and stylists to locate clothes for her all over the world! I want to manifest the reality of making our brand of clothing affordable, identifiable and accessible to any woman at any time.
 
 
 
         
 
I am asking for you to partner with us in launching the brand that will outfit, encourage and inspire a lifestyle of androgynous clothing for women that are lost without it.
 
My dream is to design and produce a creative fashion line for these women to identify with... a sort of middle-sex styled collection of well made business and casual attire that offer great fit and promote confidence.With your help, we will be in the position to create more samples and start production for our Summer/Fall 2012 collection.
 
 
 

 

 The Concept

 
With your help, I would like to offer a unique line of quality clothing to our niche market via online shopping-led by promotional, incentive and organic online and offline marketing channels.
 
The goal is to create 3-6 prototype pieces at a time,have them manufactured and immediately send promotional attire to women like Ellen DeGeneres, Wanda Sykes, Rosie, k.d.Lang and countless other fabulous females. We want to establish Butch by Design as a fashion resource for women such as these.
 
We would offer the following services:
 
Online Shopping
Onsite pop-up stores at large annual women's  functions
Event specific retail sales on Olivia Cruises


Who is the Butch by Design Client?


The woman I design for loves who she is, she's proud and strong but maybe her oversized, drab colored, menswear doesn't show it. Or maybe she loves clothes, but she wants to live more consciously. Maybe she's always complaining about not having anything to wear even though she has a closet full of stuff, or maybe she's feeling her sense of confidence is drowning in the only fashion that she can ALMOST relate to. Butch by Design was designed to bridge the gap for these women, between their selves, styles, lifestyles, and values. To be honest, Butch by Design was designed with me in mind. I am that woman. And I know she might be you too or someone that  you know. Let's empower these women!

       

The Impact



There is an absence in the marketplace right now for women that are in search of stylish, great fitting fashions. Women are reduced to buying over sized, boxy, men's clothing that lack the fit and accentuation of a woman's body. The result is a lack of the outward confidence that these women identify with inside themselves. They are proud, capable women that are in need of their own unique fashion expression.

Currently, there are women begging for their own butch clothing stores where they can purchase the type of clothing that make them look and feel great!

The creation of Butch by Design can strengthen and empower butch women in their communities and in the workplace By providing forward thinking fashion and style. After all, if we look confident and successful- we behave in that manner.



The Funding

 

A portion of the money raised from this campaign will be used to complete the infrastructure of the company that has been funded through boot- strap methods to this point. It will fund more prototypes and most importantly the manufacturing of those pieces. Some of the funds raised will go towards the leasing of a small space for operations and storage of the product line. A small portion of the funds will go toward a fashion shoot in which to feature the collection to buyers.

Materials- fabric, trim, buttons,etc
Photographer
Model
Hair/Makeup
Look book development
Marketing

 



Phase II: Launch Stage

 

Once the Butch by Design Fashions have been manufactured, the collection will launch phase will be staggered. Beginning with online sales and fullfillment for revenue, the focus will be expanded to include the creation of the pop up onsite stores. The ultimate dream is to create a brand of fashions that are visible on the Logo Network,at the annual Dinah Shore, Women's Weekend's, Pride Festivals, Film Festivals and Cruises throughout North America.

 

                        Rewards

 

     

 




Let's Stand Together

We want to thank you for all of the support we have received during this campaign. This dream would not become a reality without the support of each and everyone of you. If Butch by Design inspires you, please tell a friend about this project.  We are looking for help of all kinds, whether it by a donation of money, time, or possibly a future employ within the company. Don’t you love the idea of being a huge part of providing a clothing line for women that's designed to fit, build confidence and empower them?

story:
As Featured In

                  (Click below to read the article)

                                              


How much time do you waste looking for your specs? If you’re someone who needs glasses, you know that not having them is like being temporarily blind.



Think about how many different places you may visit in one day. From the home, the car, the office, the park…everywhere you go, you risk misplacing your most important possessions.

Your complex schedule makes keeping track of our things a complex task.  

LOOK is a small wearable device which attaches easily to your glasses. It helps you locate your glasses using Bluetooth technology which sends a signal directly to a LOOK mobile app on your smartphone!





How many times have you purchased an expensive pair of sunglasses, only to misplace them soon after?

Nearly 75% of the population wears some sort of vision corrective lenses. Whether you use glasses throughout the day, for reading, or just your favorite pair of sunglasses -  you've invested a lot into being able to see properly.





1. Support us by clicking the “contribute now” button and getting your new  LOOK device!

2.  Don't forget to add international shipping (if it applies) :) 

3. Attach the LOOK device to either side of the frames!

4. Download the app to your smartphone

5. Find your glasses!

6. Transfer LOOK from one pair to another, as many times as you like.


Simply attach the device to any set of frames and then download the application to your iPhone or Android device. Using the app, you can easily track your glasses and find them in seconds.




*LOOK is patent pending with a registered design

LOOK is available in 4 different designs, so you can choose the one which best fits your glasses. Each of these designs will be available in the different colors mentioned below. Once the campaign is finished we will be sending you an email asking you to indicate your chosen design.


LOOK comes in a variety of different colors. Once the campaign is finished we will be sending you an email asking you to indicate your chosen color.




LOOK is the first practical tracking device made specifically for eye-glasses. It is small, light, and fits easily onto your glasses with reusable sticking tape, enabling easy removal.


  • Smaller than any other tracking device

  • Advanced technology receiver

  • Replaceable battery tray 

  • Smartphone locator application

  • Alarm indicator

  • Easy to use

  • Can be worn on either side of the temple.

  • Lightweight

  • Interchangeable


  • Simply attach LOOK to your glasses!

  • Can be worn on the inside or outside of the frames

  • No wiring required.





At LOOK, we strongly believe that searching for your misplaced items will one day be a thing of the past. So far, we have created our prototype device and we’re very close to doing our first production run. Achieving our goal of $50,000 will allow us to refine and develop LOOK for mass production. We believe that your funds will enable us to create a community which shares our values and give us the push we need to reach mass production.


1. How big is LOOK?

LOOK is extremely small and lightweight. It does not affect the actual weight of the glasses.


2. How does LOOK attach to my glasses?

LOOK fits on to your frames simply and easily with sticking tape, enabling easy removal.


3. What is the range of LOOK?

The product works up to approximately 15 meter (50 ft) range


4. What differentiates LOOK from other finder devices?

While other tracking devices do currently exist, LOOK is the only one which is

specially designed to fit onto any pair of glasses and be discreet. 

5. How do I choose the color  / design that I like?
After the campaign finishes, we will be sending out an email to all of our backers asking you to indicate your design and color choice!


6. What kind of connection does it have? 

LOOK uses Bluetooth low-energy for best tracking results.


7. Are the stickers reusable? 
Yes you can! LOOK stickers are removable and reusable, but you can order extra packs of stickers when needed.


8. Can I connect a few devices to one smartphone?
Yes, you can connect multiple LOOK devices to one smartphone.


9. Is it waterproof? 
LOOK is water resistant but not waterproof, so best not to jump in the pool while wearing the device.


10, Can it be affected by long sun exposure?
No, it cannot! LOOK will work perfectly in the sun or the shade.


11. Which smartphones versions will support the app?
LOOK supports Android BLE, iphone 4s and anything above


12. Can i move it between glasses? After removal does the sticker leave traces? 
Look is easily removable + reusable, but the best part is that the sticker does not leave any traces.


13. Can I use it for other products? 
You can! But it fits best with glasses.
