story:
About this project

 

 

 

 

What Makes Our Coats So Special!

Traditional performance jackets are sporty, touristy, labeled with large logos and can be really expensive. We have designed modern outerwear. Our coats are lighter and warmer and we are able to make natural fibers water and windproof such as cotton and wool. They are also comfortable windproof and come with a cozy, warm micro fleece lining, or soft mesh lining inside. We have a world class fashion designer insuring we are providing fashion forward, timeless designs so you can wear your favorite coat for many years to come. We also use high quality factories that provide good quality. And to top things off, we have made our coats affordable.

We have a 100% customer satisfaction and roughly 1 in 200 backers/customers return their coats. We are proud of our product!

Outer Street Fabric  -  It starts with the fabric we design. We design all our own fabrics from scratch. We offer a NEW softer wool blend, new cotton herringbone colors and weights, denim, jersey and of course cotton.

 

 

Inner Micro-fleece - The inside is a cozy and comfortable micro-fleece interior. It doesn't scratch and is very warm and comfortable.

 

 

Special Thermal Membrane - Bonded in-between the micro-fleece and wool is the secret to the coats performance. We insert a waterproof and windproof thermal membrane that deflects your body heat back towards your body. This allows for less material to accomplish the same amount of warmth performance. The membrane is also a wind barrier, keeping the wind chill out. This high-tech waterproof & windproof membrane will always keep you warm and dry in the wind, snow, rain, or any of the other elements.

 

DWR Coating - DWR stands for durable water resistance and we apply this treatment to the outside of the coat. What this does, is help water bead off the coat instead of soaking through. Of course we have installed the state of the art high-tech membrane, but the DWR coating is the first line of defense to mother nature.

Water response from DWR Treatment

 

Sueded cotton - ***NEW FOR FALL 2019*** "The Performance Plus series" is made with our latest and newest custom fabric using a super soft sanded cotton, a 10000/5000 membrane in the middle layer and a cozy micro-fleece lining.

                                          Sueded Cotton with  additional zip venting

Fashion Design - Our products are designed in Portland, Oregon where our head designer Nina Bucci also owns a boutique. From here we can test new designs and use customer insights to create better product. She takes the latest trends and gently softens our look to create timeless pieces that will stay fashion forward for years to come.

Light and Compact  Travel a lot or only need one coat because you live in a warmer place, then this is the coat for you. This is a very small carry on suit case and the coat barely takes up any space. As illustrated is our heaviest wool coat and it barely takes up any space. Travelling in other countries and you don't want to look like a tourist? Then get one of these and blend right in.

 

 

Fall 2019

 

The New Excursion Jackets - with NEW Purse Pocket

We bring you the Excursion jackets. As we get feedback and images from our travel club, we know there is a need for us to make a supped up Mia Melon and OMO jacket. We have developed a new fabric that is really soft to touch, doesn't wrinkle easy when packed, has taped seams and a 10K/5K membrane with a DWR treatment. On the outside of the sueded cotton fabric is a special heat treatment known as a DWR (Durable Water Resistance) which is our first defense against mother nature. This treatment allows the water to bead off. 

                                                         Taped Seams with 10k/5k membrane

We have been told that when you go on an excursion, you could use another pocket, so you don't need to bring your purse or bag along with you when on your favorite trail or out traveling the world. We are introducing the revolutionary "purse pocket" This miniature purse is large enough to hold your essentials such as cash, credit cards, passport, lipstick and make up. It snaps conveniently into the inside of your jacket and remains hidden and secure. Leave your purse or bag in the trunk of your car, hotel room or house and only bring  what you need on your excursion.

                                                    The purse-pocket holds all your essentials


 

47% cotton, 45% polyester, 8% nylon outer fabric with soft sueded finish

10K/5K WATERPROOF, WINDPROOF and THERMAL membrane

strategic taped seams

Zipper venting with mesh lining

Purse pocket- keep your essentials with you and leave your purse or bag behind

Adjustable hood

180 GSM cozy micro fleece interior

Additional DWR treatment to bead off rain and snow

Small is 33” long in front and 35” back

Sizing XXS - 3X

47% cotton, 45% polyester, 8% nylon outer fabric with soft sueded finish

10K/5K WATERPROOF, WINDPROOF and THERMAL membrane

strategic taped seams

zip venting

180 GSM cozy micro fleece interior

Additional DWR treatment to bead off rain and snow

longer, on trend back hem

Model is 6'2" with a 40" chest and 34" waist and wears a size medium in the photo.

Sizing XS - 2XL

The Comfy 2

We brought you the Comfy through a previous Kickstarter campaign. This is a new extra-soft version with a teddy faux-fur lining instead of the mesh lining from the previous design.It has our standard membrane that is wind and waterproof and also has a DWR treatment. Compared to the Excursion jackets, it is more of a casual, laid back performance jacket that doesn't have the travel features but it incredibly cozy and is very fashionable. It's so comfy that you might even want to wear it inside while watching TV! :)

                                                             Comfy 2- Taylor in Taupe

                                                             Comfy 2- Ella in black

                                                 Extra-Soft and cozy Teddy Faux-Fur Lining

 

100% Mid Weight Cotton/Poly Sweater Knit allowing breathability

5K/3K WATERPROOF & WINDPROOF and THERMAL membrane

Extra soft Teddy Fur lining

Additional DWR treatment to bead off rain and snow.

100% Mid Weight Cotton/Poly Sweater Knit allowing breathability

5K/3K WATERPROOF & WINDPROOF and THERMAL membrane

Extra soft Teddy Fur lining

Additional DWR treatment to bead off rain and snow.

 

 

True to the test!

Any of you backers on our travel club? Our jackets have been tested and have been taken all over the world. We know our NEW excursion jackets will add to one's travel experience by  offering the additional protection and features.

 

 

Risks and challenges

Thanks to your support we have done 10 successful campaigns all helping with our production. Most rewards have been delivered on time or sometimes early. As we grow, our production gets bigger, we have more quality concerns to deal with, and more can go wrong to cause late shipping. Especially when it is a really difficult fabric to develop. In the end, we always come through.

We are offering a number of styles and colors and some styles and colors may not be popular enough to produce. This does happen but not very much. If you do pick an unpopular style, we can substitute for a more popular style or even return your reward if necessary.

This new fabric in this project shouldn't have many challenges but there are a lot more details coming with the female jackets such as the purse pocket and the layering pieces. There isn't anything we are concerned about, just that there is more to mange and to arrive on time. We are planning to ship in October but we are scheduling the goods to arrive in September to give us a little cushion.

Once again, without your support we would not be here. We are hoping our new product group will be a home run.

Thanks again,

Mia Melon & OMO
story_txt:
About this project
 
 

Sweet Clothing is a small company that designs and produces the brand names Mia Melon and One Man Outerwear. We are starting to emerge and become a modern day outerwear company thanks to the help of our crowdfunding platforms Indiegogo and Kickstarter, our backers and retailers. Our niche is multi-use weatherproof fashion outerwear. We are in a very capital intensive industry with a niche group of products that serves our customers very well. To keep the costs down for affordability reasons, we need to make hundreds at at time. We hope that one day, one of these campaigns will not only support the project we are trying to finance, but maybe help finance the company so it can function more smoothly. This will help us emerge. Thank you in advance for taking a look at our latest campaign. I hope you are compelled to support it. For those that have backed previous campaigns, we thank you from the  bottom of our hearts, because you are the reason why we are in business and are starting to thrive. We are excited to ship our NEW FALL 19 STYLES starting at the end of August. Please see images at the bottom of the page. 

 
What Makes Our Coats So Special!
Traditional performance jackets are sporty, touristy, labeled with large logos and can be really expensive. We have designed modern outerwear. Cozy Micro Fleece

The membrane is also a wind barrier, keeping the wind chill out. This high-tech waterproof & windproof membrane will always keep you warm and dry in the wind, snow, rain, or any of the other elements.

 
DWR Coating - DWR stands for durable water resistance and we apply this treatment to the outside of the coat. What this does, is help water bead off the coat instead of soaking through. Of course we have installed the state of the art high-tech membrane, but the DWR coating is the first line of defense to mother nature.

Water response from DWR Treatment
 
Sueded cotton - ***NEW FOR FALL 2019*** "The Performance Plus series" is made with our latest and newest custom fabric using a super soft sanded cotton, a 10000/5000 membrane in the middle layer and a cozy micro-fleece lining.

                                          Sueded Cotton with  additional zip venting
Fashion Design - Our products are designed in Portland, Oregon where our head designer Nina Bucci also owns a boutique. From here we can test new designs and use customer insights to create better product. She takes the latest trends and gently softens our look to create timeless pieces that will stay fashion forward for years to come.
Light and Compact  Travel a lot or only need one coat because you live in a warmer place, then this is the coat for you. This is a very small carry on suit case and the coat barely takes up any space. As illustrated is our heaviest wool coat and it barely takes up any space. Travelling in other countries and you don't want to look like a tourist? Then get one of these and blend right in.
 
Olivia Coat ready for travel 
Fall 2019
 
The New Excursion Jackets - with NEW Purse Pocket
We bring you the Excursion jackets. As we get feedback and images from our travel club, we know there is a need for us to make a supped up Mia Melon and OMO jacket. We have developed a new fabric that is really soft to touch, doesn't wrinkle easy when packed, has taped seams and a 10K/5K membrane with a DWR treatment. On the outside of the sueded cotton fabric is a special heat treatment known as a DWR (Durable Water Resistance) which is our first defense against mother nature. This treatment allows the water to bead off. 

                                                         Taped Seams with 10k/5k membrane
We have been told that when you go on an excursion, you could use another pocket, so you don't need to bring your purse or bag along with you when on your favorite trail or out traveling the world. We are introducing the revolutionary "purse pocket" This miniature purse is large enough to hold your essentials such as cash, credit cards, passport, lipstick and make up. It snaps conveniently into the inside of your jacket and remains hidden and secure. Leave your purse or bag in the trunk of your car, hotel room or house and only bring  what you need on your excursion.



                                                    The purse-pocket holds all your essentials




 
47% cotton, 45% polyester, 8% nylon outer fabric with soft sueded finish
10K/5K WATERPROOF, WINDPROOF and THERMAL membrane
strategic taped seams
Zipper venting with mesh lining
Purse pocket- keep your essentials with you and leave your purse or bag behind
Adjustable hood
180 GSM cozy micro fleece interior
Additional DWR treatment to bead off rain and snow
Small is 33” long in front and 35” back
Sizing XXS - 3X










47% cotton, 45% polyester, 8% nylon outer fabric with soft sueded finish
10K/5K WATERPROOF, WINDPROOF and THERMAL membrane
strategic taped seams
zip venting
180 GSM cozy micro fleece interior
Additional DWR treatment to bead off rain and snow
longer, on trend back hem
Model is 6'2" with a 40" chest and 34" waist and wears a size medium in the photo.
Sizing XS - 2XL

The Comfy 2
We brought you the Comfy through a previous Kickstarter campaign. This is a new extra-soft version with a teddy faux-fur lining instead of the mesh lining from the previous design.It has our standard membrane that is wind and waterproof and also has a DWR treatment. Compared to the Excursion jackets, it is more of a casual, laid back performance jacket that doesn't have the travel features but it incredibly cozy and is very fashionable. It's so comfy that you might even want to wear it inside while watching TV! :)

                                                             Comfy 2- Taylor in Taupe

                                                             Comfy 2- Ella in black

                                                 Extra-Soft and cozy Teddy Faux-Fur Lining

 


100% Mid Weight Cotton/Poly Sweater Knit allowing breathability
5K/3K WATERPROOF & WINDPROOF and THERMAL membrane
Extra soft Teddy Fur lining
Additional DWR treatment to bead off rain and snow.




100% Mid Weight Cotton/Poly Sweater Knit allowing breathability
5K/3K WATERPROOF & WINDPROOF and THERMAL membrane
Extra soft Teddy Fur lining
Additional DWR treatment to bead off rain and snow.


 


 
True to the test!
Any of you backers on our travel club? Our jackets have been tested and have been taken all over the world. We know our NEW excursion jackets will add to one's travel experience by  offering the additional protection and features.






 
 
Risks and challenges
Thanks to your support we have done 10 successful campaigns all helping with our production. Most rewards have been delivered on time or sometimes early. As we grow, our production gets bigger, we have more quality concerns to deal with, and more can go wrong to cause late shipping. Especially when it is a really difficult fabric to develop. In the end, we always come through.
We are offering a number of styles and colors and some styles and colors may not be popular enough to produce. This does happen but not very much. If you do pick an unpopular style, we can substitute for a more popular style or even return your reward if necessary.
This new fabric in this project shouldn't have many challenges but there are a lot more details coming with the female jackets such as the purse pocket and the layering pieces. There isn't anything we are concerned about, just that there is more to mange and to arrive on time. We are planning to ship in October but we are scheduling the goods to arrive in September to give us a little cushion.
Once again, without your support we would not be here. We are hoping our new product group will be a home run.
Thanks again,
Mia Melon & OMO

story:
BNdot takes everyday carry pens to the next level.

We lose pens or throw them away constantly. It's quite scary to think about the amount of money we've thrown away or lost in the form of half-used plastic pens. Because of their disposable nature, we are careless with them. If we lose one, most likely we will get a whole new pack of them.

That's why we wanted to create an ideal pen that fits perfectly into your everyday carry and is worth taking care of, especially for those who need their writing tools wherever they are. If you are like us looking for a pen that is more durable and lasting for everyday carry, BNdot is the perfect fit!





Featured On








About BNdot

This pen is designed to improve on the common flaws one will find in everyday carry pens such as crappy plastic, garbage clip, and lack of durability. It has a 304 stainless steel body and a patent-pending clip-push retractable mechanism which prevents the clip from loosening and the tip from deploying in your bag or pocket. More importantly, it brings your imagination to life on paper with a simple CLICK of the clip.







Key Features

We spent the last 8 months prototyping, developing, testing and refining the design. Simplicity, durability and quality have been our top priorities. Right from the start, we aimed to make the best everyday carry pen at the best price.


  • Clickable clip: a simple click of the clip to deploy or retract.
  • Pocket keeper: a patent-pending mechanism that prevents the clip from loosening and the pen refill from deploying in your bag or pocket.
  • Durable S.S. body: built with durable and strong high quality stainless steel body.
  • Interchangeable refill: take out the empty refill and replace it with a fresh one when ink runs out (take any other Parker Style refill).
  • Fitting o-ring: made in silicon rubber that helps to stabilize the tip when the tip is screwed on.
  • Screw-on tip: a metal nose cone that holds the pen refill. 


Color Options

BNdot comes in 3 colors: Steel Silver, Champagne Gold PVD, Black PVD.


























Custom Engraving

We understand the need to make a gift as unique and special as the person receiving it. Sometimes expressing your feelings may be difficult. Let BNdot be your perfect gift and personalize it with a special message just from you!

Get your BNdot and add a custom machine-engraved message to it for free now (30 characters including space).










Perks / Rewards (Free Shipping Worldwide)

*Expected retail price may vary from country to country.







Stretch Goals

We created a few attractive stretch goals for our campaign to round off the BNdot experience and offer more choice of engraving styles and an additional color version of BNdot to you.




Timeline

We plan to ship the BNdot pen in December, so that it reaches your home in time for the Holiday Season. This is the perfect gift for your beloved and special ones.




Why We Need Support

Products take a lot of time and money to develop and launch. Here are some areas where your contributions help to make the product a reality.


  • Tooling & Preproduction:
    Our tooling and preproduction will be approximately $15,000 based on the current design.
  • Minimum Order Quanities (MOQ):
    Factories often require MOQ - thousands of units per design. This is a huge risk for a startup. Indiegogo can validate whether you should produce the product or not.
  • Patent:
    The patent we have filed protect this simple idea from being knocked off by every pen manufacturer on the planet.
  • Development:
    Ideas are worthless without execution. Over the next few months we will need to manage and oversee development, tooling and production to make sure the products live up to your expectations.

With your support we are targeting to have this pen in your hands by December. We hope that you are inspired and excited by the idea and choose to support the project. We understand some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. Either way please get the word out and share with your friends!


Specifications


  • Length: 134 mm (5 1/4 inches)
  • Width: 10 mm (3/8 inches)
  • Weight: 25 g (0.88 oz)
  • Materials: Barrel - Stainless Steel / Accents - Brass
  • Finish: Steel Silver / Champagne Gold PVD / Black PVD
  • Refill: Parker Style Ballpoint Refill (Black Ink)
  • Country of Origin: Designed & Made in Taiwan


About Us




BN WORKS is a Taipei-based stationery brand founded in 2015, which is operated by Tony Kuo, a second-generation pen maker. It creates writing tools as well as diverse stationery products. He and his team have always believed there is value in writing with a pen and ink. A fine pen can be a partner in the transference of thoughts to paper, the silent witness to the joys and tears of written words. It can start conversations, open doors, and take you places. They simply start with themselves, write their story with their own writing tools, and aim to inspire many to pick up a pen and let it flow again.

Thank you for your support!



Spread the Love

It would help us a lot and make us very happy, if you could share our campaign with your friends to spread the word. We created a few attractive stretch goals for our campaign to round off the BNdot experience and offer more choice of engraving styles and an additional color version of BNdot to you.









Press

Interested in featuring our story? Click Here for Our Press Kit, including a press release and High Res. images. Missing something? Just mail us at info@bnworks.com



Risks & Challenges

We are working with extremely experienced machining and finishing suppliers that are used to handling quantities well over the amount that are typical for crowdfunding campaigns. Even with all of our preparation and due diligence, there may still be surprises in the production run of BNdot that may cause delays which can happen as raw materials have to be replaced or arrive late etc. and create unanticipated setbacks. Though it is highly unlikely, if this kind of scenarios takes place, frequent communication and transparency with our contributors is our top priority.

Our main challenge is to achieve our funding goal and be able to place our first production order. Your help is essential and we will ensure our promise of superior quality.

If we will get highly overfunded, all products will be packaged and sent by a professional logistics warehouse so we will be able to pack shipments quickly and without mistakes.



RAQs

1. Can the engraving be different for each pen?
Yes, the engraving can certainly be different for each pen. That's our intention so that BNdot can be your ideal gift for the Holiday Season!

2. For the Full Colletion, can the three colors be changed to two, or even one?
After the campaign ends, we will send out a survey from to make sure all the information is up-to-date. By the time, if you want your collection perk split in two colors or even all in the same color instead of a full collection, you can let us know.

3. States that you’ll take my money even if the goal isn’t reached. Will I still get the pens?
It is a flexible-funded campaign. However, you will still get you pens even though the goal isn't reached.

4. Do I need to send you the message/name that I'd like to be engraved on the pen?
We figure it'd be better if we wait until the end of our campaign to collect all message/name that will later be engraved on your pens. Again, we will send out a survey form for your custom engraving during the making of the BNdot.

5. How to replace the Parker Style refill?

story:
The Perks we’re offering will include both High Water shirts as well as some other incredible products:


  • Hidden Dry Pocket - Waterproof fabric and hydrophobic zipper keeps your phone dry and protected (Note: should not be submerged).
  • Golden State Bottle Opener - Credit card sized with specially designed interior storage pocket.
  • Reinforced Bottle Pocket - Keep your hands free and your can sand-free and handy.

  • Style & Color Specific Buttons - We labored over our button choice to pick distinct styles appropriate to each color.  Button up some sexy.
  • Custom Designed Terry Cloth Lining - Softer than a baby llama listening to Hall and Oates. Inspired by vintage "Cabana Suits," you can actually towel off with the High Water after your cannon ball. Our custom developed terry cloth is 25% more water absorbent than standard cotton and more breathable. Time to get hugged by a unicorn.
  • Conversation Stopper Cards - Premium Card Stock, Luxury Irony.
  • California Cowboy Beer Koozie - Neoprene Koozie collapses before you do, and fits into our double needle reinforced pocket. Always be Koozie-ing.


A similarly retro-inspired women's version of the High Water, Kimonos are trending wildly this summer! Currently in development, our Women's swim cover up uses the same soft, drapey, cotton-modal fabrics as our men's. Included are side pockets, a spot for Conversation Stoppers, and of course a hidden dry pocket. We worked with our design team to increase the size of our hand painted vintage floral print, making it more dramatic.  This statement piece is glamorous and subtly functional.


Your contribution to our campaign will help launch a brand and line of products that promises to continue to deliver great product that will keep you smiling and engaged with people around you all year long.  We will keep churning out new ideas to help you spark conversations and create a Halo of interest around you. 

We have spent our careers designing, developing, and manufacturing fantastic products at some of the most well known apparel companies around - Gap Inc, Levi’s, Trumaker, Ralph Lauren to name just a few.  In short, we know what we’re doing, but we’re taking on the risk and making the entrepreneurial plunge to do this on our own now.  GULP!!! 


Californian through and through, our vintage inspired graphics are all original designs created by our own 7th generation Californian. Gold waters run deep. All tees are garment dyed and discharge printed, then washed to give them their vintage vibe. Light weight, soft, and authentic, it doesn’t get more comfortable. Our signature detail - a pocket on the wearers right side seam at the hem houses our secret social weapons: Conversation Stoppers. Use your words.

  • Fit - Based on a favorite vintage track tee from the early 80’s - slim, slightly shorter sleeves, hem pocket.
  • Fabric - 100% cotton. 125g 30’s singles yarn in loose knit construction.

Sexy, beachy, and a sprinkle of Sunset Strip Rock n’ Roll. All original designs in a lightweight, super soft loose knit construction. Both the crop and the full length tee sport Conversation Stopper pockets. Don’t call me, I’ll call you.

  • Fit - A statement piece and perfect bikini cover up.  Left chest pocket packed with the raw materials required to manufacture serendipity. 
  • Fabric - 100% cotton. 125g 30’s singles yarn in loose knit construction.

We have some VERY unique perks that allow our backers to get involved in our design process AND participate in our road trips and tailgates!

  • All backers regardless of level will receive our Conversation Stopper Cards, designed to deliver wit on platter and help you break the ice, just like your next round of boat drinks.
  • Premium card stock, Luxury Irony.

  • The D90 "Radwood" is perfect for tailgates and beach parties. 
  • It sports a reclaimed pine and redwood bar designed by our favorite metal and wood worker in Oakland CA.  The wood and steel add-ons create an awesome horseshoe shaped bar that’s perfect for ball games and other events where a rugged and social rig is needed!  We will be taking this to events up and down the coast all summer!
  • We will also be offering an expense paid summer road trip with the California Cowboy team!  This will hit locations on the coast and inland, with adventurous stops at unique California spots.  The itineraries for these trips will be catered to the desires of the guest and a friend, and may include music festivals, camping, classic hotels, surfing, and more.
  • All of these packages come with a cache of California Cowboy product! 
  • Trips will depart from LA or San Francisco.


Design Contribution Backers

For those interested in participating in our creative process, we’re offering exclusive backer packages that get people involved in graphic and print design, like helping choose our next graphic, print and pattern color.


Dinner with Scmucks!  AKA 'The Founder Dinner'

We will be offering a few “Dinner w/ the Founder packages” where you can try to influence future product lines as well as guarantee the addition of at least one phrase to be distributed on our Conversation Stopper cards. 


Giving back to the community to causes that have personal meaning to us is an important part of who we are. Our brand's mantra grew out of a response to adversity - that's how we learned to laugh at ourselves. We want to ensure that we give back to help others do the same. Our pledge 1% will go mostly to support childhood cancer causes, and we will also support other causes championed by our team.

Pack your bags, we're going on a guilt trip.  Actually, we're taking the D90 Radwood on a coastal tour of California:

  • San Francisco - April 20th
  • Santa Monica - April 22nd Launch Event
  • Hollywood - April 23rd - Pool Party Launch
  • Coastal Road Trip - April 24 - April 29
The last part of our launch week will be the first of many road trips around California.  We will hit a few classic locations on the way. Expect camping, surfing, cocktailing, and an adventurous journey.  Any takers?  We would love some company.....



California Cowboy is a brand whose mission is to leverage style to bring people together in analog.  We expect to raise a few eyebrows (and hopefully some funds) along the way.  What you wear can be a Trojan Horse into a conversation, and we take it a step further with our signature "Conversation Stoppers." These social secret weapons that come with all orders will help you dip your toe in the social jacuzzi.  Trust us...the water is warm, and now you're the life of the party.


Hi Indiegogo!

I’ve been in the apparel industry for years working for some big brands (Gap Inc and Levi’s) and always dreamed of launching my own concept: California Cowboy. I’ve always been an outgoing person and, when got really sick in high school and missed a good chunk of my senior year, I was denied the ability to be outgoing. A lot of people have trouble socializing in person these days, and I am a firm believer that you can use your style to start conversations.  I started this brand to help bring people together!  

I grew up in California - surfing, skiing, swimming, and always around pools. Recently I’d been looking for a modern version of the cabana suits that were popular in the 50’s and 60’s, but I couldn’t find one.  So I decided to take my experience in the business and make one myself.  A kick ass pool party shirt with modern functionality and fit, super soft fabric, vintage prints, and an element of humor that helps start conversations.  By backing me you will not only be getting the ultimate pool party shirt, you will also be helping me achieve a lifelong dream of using style to help people engage in analog form, something a little lacking these days!  

- Drew Clark

Founder, California Cowboy




We chose to use Indiegogo as we wanted a global platform that aligned with our brand values, and that has an audience who we relate to. A few other friends of ours have started and run successful projects, and have had great experiences, both charitable and for profit. We raised just enough money to get us through development, and we're hoping we will get the backing to take us over the finish line.   

The Indiegogo community values transparency and authenticity. To be honest, we are a bit nervous about trying to drive our brand story in addition to just our flagship product, so you're helping us take a big risk! Everyone here is helping to to fulfill a dream that's been years in the making. We know the Indiegogo community appreciates thoughtful design, responsible sourcing, and comes together to rally around each other. No joke, our brand mantra is "Come Together!" There is no community, online or otherwise, that more accurately reflects our young brand's values and who we are as a team.

Our first buy will break down as follows:

  • Custom developed Cotton Modal Loop Terry - $4,700

  • Cotton Tencel Body Fabric - $2,400

  • Water Resistant zippers are $459

  • Cut, Make, Trims $4,700

  • Screen burning for our 10 color print - $3,500

  • We also need to cover the additional costs of our team who have been working tirelessly on web development, apparel and graphic design, product development, operations and logistics, and helping to build our social platforms!


    We’re taking a leap into a world that we have lived in at big companies, and it’s been scary to try this by ourselves.  We know we can run a strong business in design and manufacturing, as we have done it before on a large scale, so we know what success looks like.  We do anticipate growing pains at the beginning as we’re starting small, focused, and using local suppliers.  We also don’t have as much experience with e-commerce!  Despite the challenge, we’re academics and learners at heart who have overcome challenges in the past.  

    The most important thing is knowing our blind spots, and we have a network of experts who we can bring in to help us address the problems where we lack expertise.  We are 100% committed to making this work - we just need your support to prove we can get there.  Cash flow is the number one reason small businesses fail, and we want to make sure we have a track record of delivering to customers to ensure that we stay afloat.  Take the journey with us and become one of the Vita Few! 

    A wise man once said, “When you’re through learning, you’re through.”  We’re only at the beginning.


    We're always here to answer any questions. Feel free to talk with our team:
    • Email us - hello@californiacowboy.com

    FAQ
    • What sizes are available?



    Warranty & Returns
    We stand by our product, period. If you don't like it for any reason, or some part of it fails, we will take back unworn product. We will always find a reasonable solution. If it looks worn and reeks of B.O., you own it my friend.

    We know we’re asking a lot of people - $98 is a lot to spend on a shirt, even if it does help you dominate the day.  You can also help us by getting the word out, posting, sharing, and kerfuffling your Vitals off to help us get noticed! Indiegogo has some fantastic tools to help make this easier! As we get up and running, we will also be looking for brand ambassadors and influencers with whom we will collaborate, grow, and ultimately contribute to our communities.

Golden State Bottle Opener - Credit card sized with specially designed interior storage pocket. 

Reinforced Bottle Pocket - Keep your hands free and your can sand-free and handy. 

Style & Color Specific Buttons - We labored over our button choice to pick distinct styles appropriate to each color.  Button up some sexy. 
Custom Designed Terry Cloth Lining - Softer than a baby llama listening to Hall and Oates. Inspired by 
vintage "Cabana Suits," you can actually towel off with the High Water 
after your cannon ball.  Our custom developed terry cloth is 25% more 
water absorbent than standard cotton and more breathable. Time to get 
hugged by a unicorn. 
Conversation Stopper Cards - Premium Card Stock, Luxury Irony. 
California Cowboy Beer Koozie - Neoprene Koozie collapses before you do, and fits into our double needle reinforced pocket. Always be Koozie-ing.

A
 similarly retro-inspired women's version of the High Water, Kimonos are
 trending wildly this summer! Currently in development, our Women's swim
 cover up uses the same soft, drapey, cotton-modal fabrics as our men's.
 Included are side pockets, a spot for Conversation Stoppers, and of 
course a hidden dry pocket. We worked with our design team to increase 
the size of our hand painted vintage floral print, making it more 
dramatic.  This statement piece is glamorous and subtly functional.Your contribution to our campaign will help 
launch a brand and line of products that promises to continue to deliver
 great product that will keep you smiling and engaged with people around
 you all year long.  We will keep churning out new ideas to help you 
spark conversations and create a Halo of interest around you.  We
 have spent our careers designing, developing, and manufacturing 
fantastic products at some of the most well known apparel companies 
around - Gap Inc, Levi’s, Trumaker, Ralph Lauren to name just a few.  In
 short, we know what we’re doing, but we’re taking on the risk and 
making the entrepreneurial plunge to do this on our own now.  GULP!!!  
Californian through and through, our vintage inspired graphics are all original designs created by our own 7th generation Californian. Gold waters run deep. All tees are garment dyed and discharge printed, then washed to give them their vintage vibe. Light weight, soft, and authentic, it doesn’t get more comfortable. Our signature detail - a pocket on the wearers right side seam at the hem houses our secret social weapons: Conversation Stoppers. Use your words. 
Fit - Based on a favorite vintage track tee from the early 80’s - slim, slightly shorter sleeves, hem pocket. 
Fabric - 100% cotton. 125g 30’s singles yarn in loose knit construction.Sexy, beachy, and a sprinkle of Sunset Strip Rock n’ Roll. All original designs in a lightweight, super soft loose knit construction. Both the crop and the full length tee sport Conversation Stopper pockets. Don’t call me, I’ll call you.
Fit - A statement piece and perfect bikini cover up.  Left chest pocket packed with the raw materials required to manufacture serendipity.  

Fabric - 100% cotton. 125g 30’s singles yarn in loose knit construction.We have some VERY unique perks that allow our backers to get involved in
 our design process AND participate in our road trips and tailgates! All backers regardless of level will receive our Conversation Stopper Cards, designed to deliver wit on platter and help you break the ice, just like your next round of boat drinks. Premium card stock, Luxury Irony. 
The D90 "Radwood" is perfect for tailgates and beach parties.  

It sports a reclaimed pine and redwood bar designed by our favorite metal and wood worker in Oakland CA.  The wood and steel add-ons create an awesome horseshoe shaped bar that’s perfect for ball games and other events where a rugged and social rig is needed!  We will be taking this to events up and down the coast all summer!We will also be offering an expense paid summer road trip with the California Cowboy team!  This will hit locations on the coast and inland, with adventurous stops at unique California spots.  The itineraries for these trips will be catered to the desires of the guest and a friend, and may include music festivals, camping, classic hotels, surfing, and more. All of these packages come with a cache of California Cowboy product!  
Trips will depart from LA or San Francisco. Design Contribution BackersFor those interested in participating in our creative process, we’re offering exclusive backer packages that get people involved in graphic and print design, like helping choose our next graphic, print and pattern color. Dinner with Scmucks!  AKA 'The Founder Dinner'We will be offering
 a few “Dinner w/ the Founder packages” where you can try to influence 
future product lines as well as guarantee the addition of at least one 
phrase to be distributed on our Conversation Stopper cards. Giving back to the community to causes that have personal meaning to us is an important part of who we are. Our brand's mantra grew out of a response to adversity - that's how we learned to laugh at ourselves. We want to ensure that we give back to help others do the same. Our pledge 1% will go mostly to support childhood cancer causes, and we will also support other causes championed by our team.Pack your bags, we're going on a guilt trip.  Actually, we're taking the D90 Radwood on a coastal tour of California:
San Francisco - April 20th
Santa Monica - April 22nd Launch Event
Hollywood - April 23rd - Pool Party Launch 
Coastal Road Trip - April 24 - April 29
The last part of our launch week will be the first of many road trips around California.  We will hit a few classic locations on the way. Expect camping, surfing, cocktailing, and an adventurous journey.  Any takers?  We would love some company.....California Cowboy is a brand whose mission is to leverage style to bring people together in analog.  We expect to raise a few eyebrows (and hopefully some funds) along the way.  What you wear can be a Trojan Horse into a conversation, and we take it a step further with our signature "Conversation Stoppers." These social secret weapons that come with all orders will help you dip your toe in the social jacuzzi.  Trust us...the water is warm, and now you're the life of the party. Hi Indiegogo!I’ve been in the apparel industry for years 
working for some big brands (Gap Inc and Levi’s) and always dreamed of 
launching my own concept: California Cowboy. I’ve always been an 
outgoing person and, when got really sick in high school and missed a 
good chunk of my senior year, I was denied the ability to be outgoing. A
 lot of people have trouble socializing in person these days, and I am a
 firm believer that you can use your style to start conversations.  I 
started this brand to help bring people together!  I grew up in 
California - surfing, skiing, swimming, and always around pools. 
Recently I’d been looking for a modern version of the cabana suits that
 were popular in the 50’s and 60’s, but I couldn’t find one.  So I 
decided to take my experience in the business and make one myself.  A 
kick ass pool party shirt with modern functionality and fit, super soft 
fabric, vintage prints, and an element of humor that helps start 
conversations.  By backing me you will not only be getting the ultimate 
pool party shirt, you will also be helping me achieve a lifelong dream 
of using style to help people engage in analog form, something a little 
lacking these days!  - Drew ClarkFounder, California CowboyWe chose to use Indiegogo as we wanted a global platform that aligned with our brand values, and that has an audience who we relate to.  A few other friends of ours have started and run successful projects, and have had great experiences, both charitable and for profit.  We raised just enough money to get us through development, and we're hoping we will get the backing to take us over the finish line.   
The Indiegogo community values transparency and authenticity.  To be honest, we are a bit nervous about trying to drive our brand story in addition to just our flagship product, so you're helping us take a big risk!  Everyone here is helping to to fulfill a dream that's been years in the making.  We know the Indiegogo community appreciates thoughtful design, responsible sourcing, and comes together to rally around each other.  No joke, our brand mantra is "Come Together!"  There is no community, online or otherwise, that more accurately reflects our young brand's values and who we are as a team.  



Our first buy will break down as follows:
Custom developed Cotton Modal Loop Terry - $4,700 
Cotton Tencel Body Fabric - $2,400
Water Resistant zippers are $459
Cut, Make, Trims $4,700
Screen burning for our 10 color print - $3,500 
We also need to cover the additional costs of our team who have 
been working tirelessly on web development, apparel and graphic design, 
product development, operations and logistics, and helping to build our 
social platforms! 





We’re taking a leap into a world that we have lived in at big companies, and it’s been scary to try this by ourselves.  We know we can run a strong business in design and manufacturing, as we have done it before on a large scale, so we know what success looks like.  We do anticipate growing pains at the beginning as we’re starting small, focused, and using local suppliers.  We also don’t have as much experience with e-commerce!  Despite the challenge, we’re academics and learners at heart who have overcome challenges in the past.  
The most important thing is knowing our blind spots, and we have a network of experts who we can bring in to help us address the problems where we lack expertise.  We are 100% committed to making this work - we just need your support to prove we can get there.  Cash flow is the number one reason small businesses fail, and we want to make sure we have a track record of delivering to customers to ensure that we stay afloat.  Take the journey with us and become one of the Vita Few!  
A wise man once said, “When you’re through learning, you’re through.”  We’re only at the beginning. 


We're always here to answer any questions. Feel free to talk with our team:
Email us - hello@californiacowboy.com


FAQWhat sizes are available?









Warranty & ReturnsWe stand by our product, period.  If you don't like it for any reason, or some part of it fails, we will take back unworn product.  We will always find a reasonable solution. If it looks worn and reeks of B.O., you own it my friend.  
We know we’re asking a lot of people - $98 is a lot to spend on a shirt, even if it does help you dominate the day.  You can also help us by getting the word out, posting, sharing, and kerfuffling your Vitals off to help us get noticed! Indiegogo has some fantastic tools to help make this easier! As we get up and running, we will also be looking for brand ambassadors and influencers with whom we will collaborate, grow, and ultimately contribute to our communities.

story:
THANK YOU FOR ALL YOUR SUPPORT.

Support Fashion Gone Rogue

I started Fashion Gone Rogue about four years ago out of a personal interest in fashion photography.  What began as a hobby and collection of images I enjoyed quickly became a place for photographers, labels and magazines to share their work. As a result, Fashion Gone Rogue became one of the largest independent fashion blogs with more visitors everyday.

80-90% of the website's content is submission-based and I look at each submission individually.  Between site mainteance, server costs and the increasing rate of submissions, Fashion Gone Rogue has become too difficult to manage and financially support by myself.

What Fashion Gone Rogue Needs & What You Get

The main goal for funding is to cover the costs of a new website server, maintenance and the addition of regular contributors.

Server Costs/Site Maintenance - Having a website that is heavily image-based takes a lot of bandwidth and requests to the server.  Over the years, I have upgraded numerous times, supplementing the costs with site advertising but with the demands of increased traffic, this has not been enough lately. Due to the nature of having a Wordpress site, which already uses a significant amount of memory with its many queries, with a lot of hits, the server has to deal with high PHP spikes.  This is even with having a cache in place.  Because of this, Fashion Gone Rogue requires dedicated server hosting with the most resources available. For server hosting and site optimization, the cost is $1,000 per month for a total of $12,000 per year.

Contributors - With your support, I can get regular contributors to go through submissions and post to the site.  This will also allow me the time to do more site features like interviews, trend reports, etc. The other $13,000 would be used for these contributors for an average budget of $1,100 a month.

As a token of my gratitude, a selection of Fashion Gone Rogue exclusives will be printed as a limited edition for contributions of $25 or more. If I make more than my goal, funds in excess will be used to create features on labels, models, photographers, etc.

The Impact

By supporting Fashion Gone Rogue, you are supporting a showcasing of fashion works and the continued awareness and exposure of various artists, both established and up and coming.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to pledge an amount, your support is not lost.  Help spread the word about Fashion Gone Rogue's campaign.  Tell your friends and family.  Share on Facebook, Twitter, etc.  Tweet and message your favorite labels.

story:
In partnership with Kiva, Etkie is empowering Native American women in New Mexico with business opportunities that preserve their rich and diverse culture. With your support, we will be able to launch our new wrap collection and continue on this amazing journey with more artisans! 

HELP US LAUNCH OUR NEW COLLECTION

YOU get to own the first edition of our stylish new wrap bracelets that make a direct impact in the lives of women in New Mexico. The bracelets along with a signed card from the artisan who crafted your bracelet will arrive  just in time for summer!   


WHY DO WE NEED $20,000? 

In addition to providing 5 new artisans with a steady stream of work, $20,000 will allow us to : 

  1. Increase our resources : a) purchase materials at a wholesale cost b) begin partnership with local women's cooperative c) participate in an incubator program 
  2. Pay for a complete branding & marketing overhaul from a well respected design agency called verynice that has done campaigns for UNICEF, MTV and United Way.    

We only have to sell 200 bracelets to meet our goal!  

YOUR IMPACT

Together, we can provide a sustainable source of income for Native American women in New Mexico, and the opportunity for women to make their own choices and live with financial independence, pride, and dignity. 


THE REWARDS 





We couldn't have done it without support from: 

    

 


QUESTIONS? COMMENTS? CONCERNS? Get in touch! 

 sydney@etkie.com

story:
Please note: For all reward options, shipping is FREE for all U.S addresses. Please add $10 to your total pledge for international orders.

To support us, click "Back this Project"

Also, tweet, or like/share the page (links above). Thanks for taking the time to check us out!

We will collect your color preferences, t-shirt size, iphone case preference and shipping address once the campaign is complete!

 

We're here to provide you with a cool new way to mix and match sunglasses on your own terms. No screws and no hassles!

In the past, sunglasses have been contained to the boundary of being held together with hinges and screws. What we wanted to do was let people have the ability to easily make an entirely new combination  efficiently and ensure that the strength of the hinge was not affected. When other brands charge over $100 for just ONE pair of shades we want to offer the option of 16 combos with TWO pairs of the new fusion series. Hopefully this will level the playing field a bit!

Our goal is to provide a product that you love, makes you look great and doesn't hurt your bank account!

We took our own product design experience and used our leading manufacturer to create prototypes and realize the vision. After a few weeks of refining the design, colors, and materials used in the line, we have found the perfect blend. The final product couples polarized polycarbonate lenses with a durable, lightweight, BPA-free frame. We have received such great reviews from the samples that we want to take it to the public!

The Fusion frames are made from BPA free injection-polycarbonate plastics that are durable and super lightweight. Each model has a hazy finish that gives it a really cool hue.

Instead of screws, the arms of the Fusions are held in place by a ball and hole joint that fit snuggly together. This allows the user to mix and match their shades easily and efficiently on the go. Don't worry about having to buy 5 pairs of sunglasses to have variety. With just 2 pairs of fusions you have the ability to make 16 pairs!

The main concerns for us during the prototype phase were:

1. The strength of the joint

2. The durability of the joint

In the past, we have seen similar models that would easily fall apart if you were wearing them while enjoying active sports. This was not acceptable. We tested many prototypes to get to the point where we are confident that the strength of the hinge will not be a problem. 

AS YOU CAN SEE IN THE VIDEO, WE THREW THEM DOWN FORCEFULLY  WITHOUT ANY DAMAGE OR HAVING THE ARMS COME OFF THE FRAME! THE STRENGTH OF THE HINGE HAS BEEN TESTED MANY TIMES TO ADHERE TO OUR REQUIREMENTS.

The second concern was that the hinge wouldn't break when you interchanged the sides many times over. When we received the first samples they were not solid and after 50 tries they eventually broke. We went back to the manufacturer and told them the problem and we came up with a solution of a stronger polycarbonate plastic for the entire frame. There will be no stress fractures in these frames.

The frame is made from a durable, forgiving material that allows it to fit comfortably on your face while also avoiding stress fractures and other damage you see in cheaper frames. 

We are using a trusted, leading manufacturer of frames and lenses which are hand assembled, polished, and packaged to our exact specifications. But we need your help to go from working prototype to full scale production. Your pledge will go towards production and high-strength steel moulds necessary for the factory to turn out the quality we want on a larger scale. If the goal is met and barring any setbacks we expect to be shipping these out to you by August 2013!

As you can see in the picture below - the male and female pieces snap into place and fit snuggly. We didn't want them coming apart easily but also wanted to make it simple for you to mix and match. The Nectar logo is also raised up from the frame which gives it a nice feel.

The male piece consists of two half ball bearings that snap exactly into place with the female piece. The design is made to maximize effeinncey  and provide for the best possible durability in regards to the way that you bend or what actiivity you are doing.

Lenses on the Fusion model CAN be switched between the two frames - it's as simple as popping them out and snapping them back in!

As a reward for your pledge we are going to send you the first ever Nectar Fusions! and free shipping within the United States (including Hawaii and Alaska). For international shipping please add $10. At the end of the Kickstarter campaign, you will receive a survey so you can specify which colors you would like.

$5: A hand written thank-you note from our team at Nectar and a pack of stickers! Don't hate us if the card is not legible.

$20: Receive a limited edition black Nectar Iphone 4/5 case! Nectar sticker pack. Receive 3 high quality vector stickers for your board or car. Add $10 for international shipping.

$35: One pair of Nectar Fusions of your choice, imprinted microfiber pouch and stickers!

$45: As a thanks to our first 100 supporters, we're knocking $10 off. You'll receive two pairs of Nectar Fusions (any color). Includes imprinted microfiber bags and sticker. Please add $10 for international shipping. (Limited to 100 backers)

$55: Two pairs of the Nectar Fusions (any color) which come with an imprinted microfiber bag and stickers. Please add $10 for international shipping.

$70: 3 pairs of Nectar Fusions. Interchange your pairs to have over 81 different color combinations. Includes imprinted microfiber bag and stickers. Please add $10 for international shipping. (Limited to 100 backers)

$75: 3 pairs of Nectar Fusions. Interchange your pairs to have over 81 different color combinations. Includes imprinted microfiber bag and stickers. Please add $10 for international shipping.

$100: Get four pairs of Nectar Fusions. Choose any colors you want as long as each is a full frame and lens combo! 256 different color combinations! Includes imprinted microfiber bag and stickers. Please include $10 for international shipping. (Limited to 100 backers)

$105: Get four pairs of Nectar Fusions. Choose any colors you want as long as each is a full frame and lens combo! 256 different color combinations! Includes imprinted microfiber bag and stickers. Please include $10 for international shipping.

$155: Receive four pairs of Nectar Fusions for your enjoyment. Don't ever go out without shades again! Mix and match with an INSANE amount of variations, imprinted microfiber pouch and stickers as well as a Nectar sunglasses limited edition t-shirt, and black Iphone 4/5 case! Please include $10 for international shipping. (Limited to 100 backers)

$165: Receive four pairs of Nectar Fusions for your enjoyment. Don't ever go out without shades again! Mix and match with an INSANE amount of variations, imprinted microfiber pouch and stickers as well as a Nectar sunglasses limited edition t-shirt, and black Iphone 4/5 case! Please include $10 for international shipping.

$450: As the superstar that you are we want to shower you in gifts. Receive ALL of the rewards listed above as well as 10 pairs of your choice of our original models from the Nectar site. Then, pick 4 models that will be HAND PAINTED by a local artist! You will have sunnies that are one-of-a-kind! Please include $10 for international shipping. (Limited to 10 backers)

We can't wait to get you a pair of Nectar Fusions - We are super excited to launch this product and we know you will be satisfied and lookin' super fresh!

Mix and match with an INSANE amount of variations, imprinted microfiber pouch and stickers as well as a Nectar sunglasses limited edition t-shirt, and black Iphone 4/5 case! Please include $10 for international shipping.
$450: As the superstar that you are we want to shower you in gifts. Receive ALL of the rewards listed above as well as 10 pairs of your choice of our original models from the Nectar site. Then, pick 4 models that will be HAND PAINTED by a local artist! You will have sunnies that are one-of-a-kind! Please include $10 for international shipping. (Limited to 10 backers)
We can't wait to get you a pair of Nectar Fusions - We are super excited to launch this product and we know you will be satisfied and lookin' super fresh!

story:
Our Story

Like many of you, we know what it feels like to lose a pet. Last year, I lost Rango - my best friend in the world and possibly the coolest cat on the planet. After going through such a painful process, I was determined to find a way to prevent others from going through the same experience. 

I teamed up with Damien to build the smallest and lightest, fully waterproof GPS pet tracker available. We've been working really hard with a great technical team and now have a working prototype and will have a production unit and mobile app ready to launch before Christmas.  We've even secured some of the largest pet retailers in the market to stock the product.

Please check out Pod below and we would really appreciate your support on this campaign to raise awareness and help us on our mission to save more pets.

- Sebastian


    The Product

    Pod is a sleek little tracking device (about the size of a wine cork), which attaches to your pet's collar and lets you instantly locate your animal from your phone as well as track their activity and fitness levels.

    Pod uses GPS technology which has strong coverage all over the world so you can find your pet in another state or even country - not like other tracking devices that rely on Bluetooth, which needs to be nearby to locate your pet. We're working with one of the largest Telcos in the world to provide the SIM cards with everything you need for the first 12 months usage. There is then a $30 renewal per year thereafter.
     
    Our unique barrel design has been created to be as comfortable as possible for your animal. The rounded edges and unique cylindrical design have been extensively tested to have minimal impact on the daily activities of both cats and dogs.



    What people are saying about Pod...

    "It's great to finally have peace of mind and not have to worry about if and when Steve goes missing" - Yasmin, McMahons Point

    "It's fabulous, it's sleek, it's now. It's something that's been missing from the market" - Pet store manager

    "I love the idea of being able to compare my dog's top speed against other dogs in the park" - Pamela, Coogee

    "I can't believe that it has all this tech inside such a small unit" - Tavis, Randwick



    We've utilized the latest technologies and analysed all aspects of the design to make the unit as small and light as possible (about the size of a wine cork and only 29 grams).

    Our unique interchangeable battery design makes it very simple to recharge the batteries with little fuss and no down time. Two batteries are included, so you can swap in a fresh one while you're charging the other.

    Using our unique adjustable fitting system, Pod can be attached to any size and shape collar with ease. Just loop the strap around the collar and pull tight for a snug and comfortable fit. The strapping mechanism is integrated into the body of the unit, which means you never have to remove Pod from your pet's collar. 




    The App

    We've spent a lot of time making sure the app is super easy to use with an enjoyable user experience that parents and kids love to use. Every aspect of the Pod app is centred around the needs of the pet owner.


    Manufacturing 

    Pod was designed in Sydney, Australia. We have been working with our trusted partner in Shenzhen, China for R&D and prototyping and the units will be manufactured in the same factory which makes Samsung mobile phones, Epson projectors and ResMed medical devices. Our partners have experience in developing a number of wireless and GPS-based products and have developed custom circuit boards (PCBs) for Pod as well as sourced quality components from some of the best suppliers in the market. These units have undergone rigorous testing and further testing will be done before final launch. The FREE mobile app will be available for Apple iOS and Android.





    Why do we need funding?

    We've been working really hard completing all the required tasks to get the Pod product ready for launch including R&D, product design, app design, initial testing and product certification and compliance. The last thing we need to do is fund the production run of the units out of the factory. The more we can raise, the more we can grow and the more pets we can save.



      Pod t-shirts


    Frequently Asked Questions


    Q: How does the device get a location and communicate with the app?
    A: Pod uses GPS technology to locate your pet (like a car GPS which uses satellites to triangulate a location) so it has good coverage almost anywhere in the world. It then uses a SIM card with a mobile plan (all included) to send the location via a mobile network to the app and for the app to talk to the device to request locations.

    Q: What is the range of the unit?
    A: Because we use GPS and GSM mobile technology instead of Bluetooth, the device talks to satellites and base stations then back to your mobile (not directly from the device to your mobile), so the question is more about coverage than range. GPS coverage is strong almost anywhere in the world and GSM is good in most regions, so you can track your animal even if it is in a different state or country!

    Q: What countries does Pod work in?
    A: We have a global Telco deal with Vodafone, so the unit can work in most countries which have Vodafone or their partners across the US (AT&T, T-Mobile & Sprint), Europe and Asia.

    Q: How much is the mobile cost?
    A: The first 12 months of mobile data and SMS fees are included with the unit and the renewal will be around $30 per year for most countries.

    Q: How long is the battery life?
    A: We've developed a custom Lithium Polymer battery specifically for Pod which is long life and super small. The battery will last up to a week depending on usage.

    Q: How do I charge the batteries?
    A: The unit comes with 2 x interchangeable batteries so you can charge one while using the other. You also get a charging dock which is a small unit that plugs into any USB port on your computer and the battery clicks in to charge within a couple of hours.

    Q: How often are the location updates?
    A: You can request a current location at any time from the app and you can also put the unit to track mode, so it will continue to track locations on a journey. You can configure track mode to be in low, med or high frequency so it can get locations up to every 10 seconds in cases where your pet is missing. 

    Q: How big is the unit?
    A: Pod is slightly larger than a standard wine cork and weighs only 29 grams / 1.02 ounces. The dimensions are 50.5mm / 1.98 inches long by 23mm / 0.9 inches diameter.

    Q: Which devices will the app run on?
    A: The Pod app will run on Apple iOS version 6 & above and Android version 4.3 & above (4.1 and 4.2 will run the app, but do not support Bluetooth Low Engery). A Windows Phone version will also be available soon.

story:
Simply put, our goal is to design, build, and FLY an aircraft for the 2013-2014 AIAA DBF competition!

The American Institute of Aeronautics and Astronautics is the leading professional society of Aerospace Engineers and is solely dedicated to the advancement of our industry. 

As students of Purdue University this competition run by AIAA directly relates to further enhancing our aerospace engineering knowledge and abilities by giving us an opportunity to APPLY our knowledge. 

Complete contest rules can be found at http://www.aiaadbf.org/ 


What We Need 

  • Our $1000 goal will go towards materials needed to finish building our aircraft such as R/C electric motors, foam, balsa wood, servos, controllers, etc. 
  • Our perks provide you with a personal connection to our Purdue DBF team!
  • If our goal is not met, the funds collected will still go towards whatever materials we can acquire to finish our project on time.

Current Progress


We can't give away ALL of our secrets! But we can assure you as the donor that each and every day we are working diligently to meet our contest goals. 


Why help us?...

Our DBF team runs just like a business.

Hundreds of hours in research, work and dedication.

We are risk takers by taking our own initiative and efforts to independently do this project. 

HOWEVER! We are a purely academic team of engineering undergraduates who have no actual business to be funded by!

Please be an integral part of our organization and foster our initiative. 

We're in the red zone, you can help us score!


"What we make moves the world forward..."

story:
How did Camfreys start?

Initially, there was no grand objective or vision. It began through discussion amongst friends about how branded shoe companies take advantage of people through cheap and dangerous manufacturing and selling at exorbitant prices.    

Have you ever been disappointed by the quality of shoes you’ve purchased for several hundred dollars whose only remaining “redeeming feature” was a luxury brand name?   

Have you ever suffered from red rash, or itchy and swollen toes due to toxic chemical substances and cheap synthetic materials?    

Have you ever felt guilty about labor exploitation and environmental degradation by picking up the cheap shoes ?    

Have you ever wondered why sustainable products are as expensive as premium brands, look  unappealing, and  whose quality suffers in the name of sustainability?    

We have.   

So, with more than 30 years of experience in the footwear industry, we’ve decided to develop our own shoes, which are comfortable, stylish, skin-friendly, and sustainable, offering true good quality shoes for men, women and children at an affordable price while tackling the perpetual problems of the fast fashion and footwear industries.

 

 

Finest and Sustainable Materials

Nature on the feet!

 

We care what material goes on your feet. Each element of Camfreys’ shoes is skin friendly and sustainable through our careful selection of the finest materials around the world. Unlike other brands, we use chromium free biodegradable leather, 70% recycled eco rubber sole, natural latex, natural cotton, natural cork, natural wool fiber, and water based glue for the entire shoemaking process.

 

 

 

Delving into the city of Porto, Portugal,

you will discover the colors of our first collection.

 

 

Inspired by the glittering Douro River, the sweet and soft colors of Miragaia, the color changes of aging  of Vinho do Porto, the stretches of terracotta roofs, the beautiful buildings adorned with white glazed ceramic tiles, and the deep blue Atlantic Ocean are our major inspirational color sources which permeate every corner of Porto.

 

 

 

 

 

Exceptional Quality 

 

At Camfreys, we fabricate exceptional quality leather sneakers with passion and meticulous care through the experienced hands of a small workshop found in an amiable and safe working environment.  

Our supplier is a family owned artisanal factory. It has over 60 years of experience in handcrafting the highest quality leather shoes for men, women and children since its foundation in Sao Joao da Madeira, Portugal, a renowned city for making luxury leather shoes and goods for European luxury brands.

 

 

Fair wages & Safe Working environment

  

Our mission is to make the highest quality footwear while providing fair remuneration and a high standard working environment for our craftsmen.  

 

 

Extra Care

   

We believe that protecting our craftsmen from risks is as important as the material that goes on your feet. We use materials free of harmful substances to protect our workers involved in the manufacturing of Camfreys’ footwear.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

PROJECT TIMELINE

 

ABOUT

 

Camfreys is an ethical and sustainable lifestyle footwear brand for men and women who appreciate not only comfort and alluring style but every step involved in the shoemaking business – from the material selection, the superb crafting of quality shoes, to the maintenance of high standard working conditions, all while minimizing environmental impact.    

The brand was founded in response to the perpetual problems found in the fashion and footwear industries which include the heavy reliance on unsustainable and harmful materials - to reduce the production cost, wasteful mass production, and labor exploitation under sweatshop conditions.    

At Camfreys, we offer a wide range of ethically made footwear that is skin-friendly, eco-friendly and community-friendly at an accessible price combining luxurious sophistication and ethical consciousness.     

Our objective is to make the highest quality lifestyle shoes, as we rise to the challenge of making zero plastic footwear.

 

 

RISK & CHALLENGES

Even though we have extensive experience in the shoemaking business, there are still unforeseeable risks and challenges, and it is our job to minimize those unpredictable risks and challenges.

story:
The Bermuda Series features three fully engraved watches with sapphire crystal. Our cases, crystals and dials are made in-house, ensuring the highest quality materials and production. The finishing and quality of this watch series are unprecedented in its price range.

 

 

 

STP stands for Swiss Technology Production. The movement boasts 26 jewels and a 44-hour power reserve. 

 

Available in a blue or black dial, the Bermuda Masterpiece inspires us to live each day to the fullest.

 

 

The Bermuda skeleton is the most bold of the series. This watch was made for those looking for something completely different and unique that will surely draw attention.

 

The Bermuda V1 offers a high-quality watch without a hefty price tag. It’s the third and most affordable watch in our collection featuring a Swiss-made Ronda 515 Quartz movement, Sapphire crystal top and engraved steel caseback.

 

The Bermuda V1 is available in your choice of a blue or black dial. This watch instills confidence and motivation to help inspire you to be the best version of yourself in all aspects of life.

 

As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.

 

The prototyping phase was extremely involved, as the degree of detail on the engraving is very high. We did multiple iterations to find a streamlined process to be able to give the highest quality engraving at a price that still was attainable. We created a multi-tier approach to the engraving process involving 3D laser engraving, hand work and hand staining to give an unbelievable look to the piece.
 

We do all of our own case work in-house which allows us to narrow down and test multiple variations at a much higher degree, which resulted in something truly special.

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make The Bermuda Series a reality.

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or pre-order a Bermuda Series watch, if you’re a supporter of Egard, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

 STP stands for Swiss Technology Production. The movement boasts 26 jewels and a 44-hour power reserve.  Available in a blue or black dial, the Bermuda Masterpiece inspires us to live each day to the fullest.

story:
Short Summary:

Hi, my name is Winnie and I am a senior at Plattsburgh High School and currently in Nation Honor Society. My mission for my NHS project is to recycle over 200 pairs of worn shoes that people in Plattsburgh no longer need. I believe that everyone deserves a pair of good shoes and I will do everything I can to better the lives of others. The amount of pairs raised will be shipped to Soles4Souls the closest location, being in New Jersey, where they refurbish shoes and distribute the pairs internationally to limit poverty. 

What We Need:

We have already raised about 100 shoes and we definitely want to collect as many as possible. Our only concern is the shipping fee to New Jersey. You can be a part of this wonderful program by donating any amount for the shipping cost. Your donation will be acknowledged and we would be happy to share how you had helped through our Facebook page. We like to mention that the PHS shoe drive is non-for-profit and your donation is tax-deductible. 

In Addition:

Simply by donating, you can be satisfied to know you had helped someone. You can be at ease to know that a child no longer will walk barefoot and will have a sturdy pair of sneakers. If you want to know more, check out my Facebook page and Soles4Souls:

Winnie's Shoe Drive

Soles4Souls

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot donate, that is completely understandable. The only thing I ask for is: spread the word. Any bit of help is greatly appreciated.
