story:
IN STOCK: 5 styles, shipped worldwide today

Derby for men

 

Brogue for men

 

Boots for men

Booties for women

Pumps for women

 

 

WALK FURTHER 
Standing all day at work, walking a lot ?
Maratown offers superior protection, comfort, anti fatigue and foot pain relief, for people on the move.

WALK WITH YOUR SPORT SHOES AT WORK

WALK ON A CLOUD

Dream of walking on clouds, marshmallows, mats? 
While traditional sneakers as well as traditional dress shoes have almost zero cushioning, MARATOWN offers 1.5 in of cushioning in each shoe.

PODIATRISTS FEEDBACK

B.Gaignot, podiatrist in Paris, France : 
"Maratown offers a real, innovating, shock-absorbing sole, with modern style. Maratown also meets standards of comfortable shoes: wide room, lightweight, seamless inside, padded collar and tongue, and removable insoles for you to insert your personalized orthotic insoles. As a podiatrist, I would also say Maratown fits with most orthoses, especially for the diabetic foot".

A.Razak, podiatrist in London :

 

TESTIMONIALS

Lucy, PR & COM Director at Seedrs: 

"You can bounce up and down and feel like you could walk forever. I feel like I’m walking on air. It’s a little bit like having marshmallow in your shoes!"

Mark: 

"I’ve worn many comfortable shoes but these are really super cushioned. I feel a little bit like I’m floating on air!"
 

KEEP ON MOVING

How many times have you used your car or the subway for only 2 stops ? No more excuses, it's time to explore your city on foot. These shoes are made for walking.

33% LESS PRESSURE*

One third less weight on your feet, thanks to our highly-cushioned soles.
Feel your feet can't handle any more pressure in your painful shoes? You are at the right place.
*At the pic impact with the ground, measured with pressure sensors insoles

REBOUND

Rebound is as important as shock absorption. Without rebound after a step, it would feel like walking in the sand - exhausting. Rebound return energy to the step and makes the walk more dynamic. Only cutting-edge foam offers both great absorption and rebound. The secret is to combine high-density, resilience, and elasticity, while remaining very soft.

 

FEEL LIGHT

How often do you feel happy to remove your heavy dress shoes ? Maratown are 20% lighter in average.

DROP

The heel is 0.45 in higher than the forefront, to spread pressure throughout the foot.

 

PADDED COLLAR AND TONGUE

Maratown provide padding and cushioning at all pressure points, not only in the sole.

 

BENDING

Despite the thickness of the sole, the use of soft materials and a thinner front allows the shoe to the bend at the right point: at the base of the big toe where your feet articulate.

Maratown provide padding and cushioning at all pressure points, not only in the sole.

 

SOFT & PREMIUM LEATHER

No more stiff leather that hurts, even after breaking it in.

 

DURABILITY

While you might understandably think that using soft material could cause on a short lifespan, the durability of MARATOWN is at least as long as normal shoe, thanks to :
-a 3 mm rubber outsole
-the high density and resiliency of our soft, non-flattening foam.

 

REMOVABLE INSOLE

Are you using customized orthopedic insoles? In addition to offering the opportunity to remove the insole, you will keep 90% of the cushioning property in the middle sole, as opposed to traditional shoes where very little cushion is in the insole.

 

INSPIRED BY MARATHON

Inspired by cushioned marathon maximalist running shoes, Maratown uses cutting edge super soft & resilient foams (based on EVA and PU).
Maratown offers the comfort of your best sport shoes, with an urban, timeless and classy style.

 

DESIGNED IN NEW-YORK - HANDCRAFTED IN PORTUGAL

MARATOWN, a New York based company, produces shoes in Portugal.

Portugal has a very active shoe industry, and all work is done in compliance with European standards of worker health and safety conditions. MARATOWN uses premium materials, especially a naturally soft leather.

When you received your MARATOWNs, they have just been shipped from our warehouses in the USA and France.

 
YOUR PERFECT SIZE
 
***To choose your size, please send us your size at nancy@maratown.com***

 

All our forms have been studied by specialists to offer the best fit.

Even purchased on the internet, you will get the perfect sized shoe, thanks to our easy size guide and to our innovative fitting kit, including volume adjusters and heel liners. Please refer to our size guide.

1-Measure your length foot - please take the extreme back end of your heel.

2-Convert with the size guide below

 

3-At home:

In case of your shoe fit a little too large, we offer in all shoebox:  

-Heel liners, a piece of stuck leather that you can stick on the inside heel to improve shoe fit. Be sure to test it before sticking it.

-Volume adjustment insole, to insert under the leather insole. 

If you are still not satisfied, we accept exchanges.  For more details about the exchange, please refer to the exchange part of the FAQ.

 

 

ABOUT US

And many experts, freelances and partners : shoe designers and producers, podiatrists and pedorthists, laboratory engineers, logistics and sales professionals, accountants, e-commerce developers, photographers... Thank you all!
 

EVERYDAY MARATHONS

We all love the comfort of our sport shoes. Period. Have you ever tried the cushioning of a maximalist running shoe made for marathons? MARATOWN combines cushioned maximalist marathon running shoe with classy urban styles. They are perfect for your everyday marathons, at work or while standing and walking all day. With your MARATOWNs, you walk on clouds every day.

 

CROWDFUNDED BRAND

Maratown is a crowd funded shoe brand.

We launched in 2015, thanks to a $30,000.00 successful campaign on Kickstarter and Indiegogo to finance and launch the first production.

 

CONTACT US


Nancy, chief evangelist at Maratown : nancy(at)maratown.com

MARATOWN™ US INC. 

244 Fifth Avenue, Suite F272 

New York - N.Y. 10001

USA

 

 

 

 

FAQ

How I choose my size?

Please send us an email with your size at nancy@maratown.com.

 

Do you ship worldwide?
Yes, we offer worldwide shipping.

 

Is shipping free?

Shipping is FREE in the USA and EU.

$20 in Canada.

For the rest of the world, add the following shipping cost to your pledge:

1 pair: Add $40.

2 pairs: Add $50.

3 pairs: Add $55.

 

Will there be customs duties or taxes to be paid?

There are no duties or taxes for USA and EU.

Shipping outside USA and EU may be subject to taxes and customs duties. If there are any such fees, these must be paid by the person receiving the package when it reaches its destination -not on Kickstarter-, e.g. via the carrier.

 

When my shoes will arrive?

We shipp in the 24 hours after your ordered, on opening days. Then, count 2 to 7 days within US and EU, and 3 to 20 for international shipping.

 

Will you supply a tracking number to follow shipment?

Yes. We will send you an email with the tracking information of your package once we have sent out the shoes.

 

 

Do you accept exchanges?

Yes, we'll gladly exchange your shoes for another size.  

Since we are a start-up and are offering Maratown™ shoes at discounted prices, you’ll have to pay for the two way shipping.

Shoes you exchange must be in their original package and be in perfect condition.

 

Shipping fee for 1 way return per pair:

$15 in US, €15 in EU, $40 for the rest of the world.

Please check our size guide to avoid the need for exchanges.

 

How many times I have to exchange?

Returns are accepted up to 20 days after delivery.

 

 

Why is Maratown™ the world's most comfortable shoes?

After testing dozens of dress shoes in a laboratory, we know that our shoe results have been far better than most. We succeeded in creating a sole that utilizes the cutting edge running shoe technology and uses a super soft sole, that is twice softer than the softest existing dress shoes currently available. We have also increased the thickness for more cushioning and are using a high density EVA material for durable absorption and rebound. Below, we have also added to the Maratown™, a well-known Vibram®­ outsole for high durability of the wear. The Maratown™'s sole is also very light-weight.

Then, we assembled it all in Western Europe - Portugal to be exact- with a high-quality leather upper. According to the advice of foot specialists, we have implemented features such a removable insole, padding collar, soft leather upper, and smooth inside.

In the end, the Maratown™ shoes offer a dressy style with the comfort of a sport shoe.

 

Why so much cushion?

Cushion is the most important factor in maintaining the comfort of the shoes. There is no brand that currently offers as much cushion as these shoes, while running shoes technology offers this cushion. So, we succeeded in assembling a leather upper with a running sole camouflaged in a dress shoe.

 

Is the insole removable?

Yes, even though our insole is already cushioned with an EVA part and a leather upper, it is removable to allow for you to insert your personal orthopedic insole or a wearable electronic insole (count your daily step, warm, recharge…), or to clean up them.

 

How light they are?

Maratown™ women wedge: 7.2Oz (205g) (size US 7, EU 39, insole included)

Maratown™ women boootie: 9.9Oz (280g) (size US 7, EU 39, insole included)

Maratown™ men derby: 11.7 Oz = 330g (size US 7, EU 42, laces and insole included)

Usual classic dress shoes: from 14 Oz to 1Lb 5Oz (400g to 600g)

Usual sport shoes: from 9Oz to 14Oz (250g to 400g)

 

How durable are the shoes?

Maratown™ is also made for durability. This was achieved mainly thanks to the Vibram® outsole.

 

For better life expectancy, please follow these essentials shoe care tips:

-Don't wear the shoes every day - alternate with another pair to let the shoe dry off. Let dry naturally.

-Leather upper: polish with high quality product.

-Sole: keep clean with a damp sponge or a brush.

-Use shoe tree.

-Un-tie before putting on or taking off.

 

-CONTACT US-

If you have any questions, please contact Nancy, our chief evangelist at Maratown™: nancy@maratown.com

story:
Vanity Teen 


Vanity Teen was born in Barcelona in 2008, founded by Toni Perez (Luis Alonso deputy editor & Adolf Diaz fashion editor). It is a menswear + boyswear magazine made entirely by new faces of fashion with international brands of high fashion and street brands

This October 2015, we're launching our issue 7 in a print collector's edition through Indiegogo for a limited time 35 days.

Take a look at our last two campaigns in Indiegogo, where we put on sale the issues 5 and 6.

Vanity Teen 5 campaign
Vanity Teen 6 campaign

For more information about Vanity Teen, check the following links.
Vanity Teen wikipedia 

Vanity Teen #7 

In this collector's edition of Vanity Teen F/W 2015, we will be featuring great new modeling faces and different professionals behind the lens, while we work on it and while we receive more contents, we will update with more information about this issue.



Content

Photographers 
Eric Esposito + Lobke Leijser + Krzysztof Wyzynski + Jack Bernal + Sb + Michiyo Yanagihara + Allen Zaki +  Yuji Watanabe + Syed Munawir 
Stylist 

Tom Erebout + Hair : Yusuke Morioka

Models

Lucas Santoni (Mmanagement Paris) + Jordan Ver Hoeve + Jon hermann (LA models) + Olek (Specto Models) + Yan and Ronnie (PRM agency) +  
Henry (MILK agency) + Mayrone Herry + Piero Mendez ....

Cover Vanity Teen #7

Jordan Ver Hoeve + Jonn Hermann (LA models) by Allen Zaki

Editorial exclusive for Vanity Teen #7 by Michiyo Yanagihara

Editorial exclusive by Lobke Leijser

editorial by Michiyo Yanagihara

OUTTAKE Luca Santoni by Jack Bernal wearing Givenchy for Vanity Teen #7

OUTTAKE Luca Santoni by Toni Pérez Sb wearing Givenchy for Vanity Teen #7

preview 


collector´s options 

Vanity Teen #7 

The magazine is in DIN A4 format, with more than 90 pages.

- Limited Edition Vanity Teen (50 copies)
Includes Vanity Teen #7 with a newspaper with 16 pages.

- Vanity Teen Edition 7+7 (20 copies)

Includes Vanity Teen #7, 7 DIN A4 posters and a newspaper with 16 pages. All this in a special strong packaging. 

- Collector's edition Vanity Teen (7 copies) 


Includes Vanity Teen #7 + wooden enclosure* $75

This limited edition includes one copy of Vanity Teen #7 and exclusive photographic sheets in a A4 format + Exclusive wood case engraved + $99

*Only available to older subscribers.

Boys paper with Jordan Ver Hoeve on the cover

Mayrone Herry by Eric Sposito 

- Boyspaper edition 

16 pages in color, newspaper format with exclusive pictures not included in the magazine. $18.

story:
Hey guys!

I am Max, 23 years old, studying and living in Vienna. As a student you are bound to attend some lectures, which do not necessarily grab your attention. Quite frankly, students then need something else to do. This is how I stumbled upon Kickstarter and the truly amazing ideas people have to offer on it. It did not take many lectures until I thought: “Why not start a project myself?”

HOW EVERYTHING STARTED?

One day, not too long ago, I noticed the sheer size and weight of my wallet. I have also talked to friends who told me that they feel the same. Everyone wanted something new. Everyone wanted something simple and practical.

My dad is an engineer. I was working in his metal factory from a young age. One day at work I found an old credit card holder lying around. This simple item immediately created ideas in my head. After jotting some of them down I then applied my skills in working with metals to actually plan a first prototype.

Through the resources at my disposal, it was easy for me to produce the Wallum to the highest standards of quality possible, while keeping the price low.

WHAT IS WALLUM?

The origin of the name is quite simple: WAL stands for wallet and LUM for aluminium, which is the raw material. It replaces the traditionally big wallet with a stylish design. It is as small as a credit card allows it to be for you to still fit your cards in it and it consists of 2 aluminium plates held together tightly by 4 O-Rings.

As a result of this mechanism you can fit up to 15 cards of your choice into Wallum. In the video you can see how easy it is to use.

• Front Pocket Wallet: 

The initial reason was to create a wallet, which does not bulge your pocket due to its size. It also fits easily into the inside pocket of a suit jacket. Having your wallet in the front pocket does make it much harder for a pickpocket to reach it, giving it a safety aspect. Another reason was to reduce the size of a wallet for health reasons, eliminating the problems of back pain if you sit on your bulky wallet.


• NFC/RFID Protection:

NFC is the technology enabling people to pay by touching the card reader with the debit or credit card. It was invented to make people’s life easier, but it leaves people with a potential security problem. Thieves could easily steal your data by touching your wallet with a special device. This NFC signal does not go through Wallum’s aluminium plates, leaving your data securely where it belongs.


HOW IS WALLUM MANUFACTURED?

Wallum is manufactured directly in Austria and Germany. The first step is water jet cutting the form out of aluminium plates. After that CNC machines mill the details into each one of the wallets, e.g. the engraved designs, notches, etc. Thirdly the parts get sand blasted to leave it with a mat look. The last step is then anodising the plates in different colours and assembling the parts.

Here are the different combinations you can choose:

Choose from different engravings as well as different colours.

Contour Design:

Dimple Design:

X-Square Design:

Squares Design:

Star Design:


Colours you can choose:

  • Silver

  • Black

  • Blue

  • Red

  • Orange

  • Purple

  • Gold


The last step: choose between black or white rubber band and o-rings


HERE IS HOW YOU WILL KNOW WHAT COMBINATION OF COLOUR AND DESIGN YOU HAVE CHOSEN:

Once the project has been funded you will receive an email enquiring about your order details. We make a note of your choice of colour and engravings. 


When the project will be funded we can buy with the money more tools for the machines, all the raw materials like the aluminium, rubber bands, o-rings, material for sandblasting and anodization. When we got all these items we can start with the production of all your orders!


Risks and challenges:

Wallum came into existence through prototyping a lot and because of this actions I could get in touch with possible problems like delays in every step of the production process. This was important because now I know where flaws can appear and how I avoid these flaws in advance.
It was quite challenging because I'm currently studyin at University (BSc at Vienna University of Technology) and had to do all the organizational things, prototyping and checking out stuff beside.
Luckily I accomplished all what I had to do in the 3 months of summer holiday which I used to finish the last steps and to prepare the main manufacturing of Wallum.

the Wallum to the highest standards of quality possible, while keeping 
the price low.

WHAT IS WALLUM?

The origin of the name is quite simple: WAL stands for wallet and LUM
 for aluminium, which is the raw material. It replaces the traditionally
 big wallet with a stylish design. It is as small as a credit card 
allows it to be for you to still fit your cards in it and it consists of
 2 aluminium plates held together tightly by 4 O-Rings. 

As a result of this mechanism you can fit up to 15 cards of your 
choice into Wallum.  In the video you can see how easy it is to use. 


• Front Pocket Wallet: 

The initial reason was to create a wallet, which does not bulge your 
pocket due to its size. It also fits easily into the inside pocket of a 
suit jacket. Having your wallet in the front pocket does make it much 
harder for a pickpocket to reach it, giving it a safety aspect. Another 
reason was to reduce the size of a wallet for health reasons, 
eliminating the problems of back pain if you sit on your bulky wallet.

• NFC/RFID Protection: 

NFC is the technology enabling people to pay by touching the card 
reader with the debit or credit card. It was invented to make people’s 
life easier, but it leaves people with a potential security problem. 
Thieves could easily steal your data by touching your wallet with a 
special device. This NFC signal does not go through Wallum’s aluminium 
plates, leaving your data securely where it belongs. 

HOW IS WALLUM MANUFACTURED?

Wallum is manufactured directly in Austria and Germany. The first 
step is water jet cutting the form out of aluminium plates. After that 
CNC machines mill the details into each one of the wallets, e.g. the 
engraved designs, notches, etc. Thirdly the parts get sand blasted to 
leave it with a mat look. The last step is then anodising the plates in 
different colours and assembling the parts.
Here are the different combinations you can choose:

Choose from different engravings as well as different colours.
Contour Design:




Dimple Design:

X-Square Design:

Squares Design:

Star Design:

Colours you can choose:

Silver
Black
Blue
Red
Orange
Purple
Gold


The last step: choose between black or white rubber band and o-rings


HERE IS HOW YOU WILL KNOW WHAT COMBINATION OF COLOUR AND DESIGN YOU HAVE CHOSEN:

Once
 the project has been funded you will receive an email enquiring about 
your order details. We make a note of your choice of colour and 
engravings. 

When the project will be funded we can buy with the money more tools for the machines, all the raw materials like the aluminium, rubber bands, o-rings, material for sandblasting and anodization. When we got all these items we can start with the production of all your orders!















Risks and challenges:


Wallum came into existence through prototyping a lot and 
because of this actions I could get in touch with possible problems like
 delays in every step of the production process. This was important 
because now I know where flaws can appear and how I avoid these flaws in
 advance.
It was quite challenging because I'm currently studyin at University
 (BSc at Vienna University of Technology) and had to do all the 
organizational things, prototyping and checking out stuff beside.  
Luckily I accomplished all what I had to do in the 3 months of 
summer holiday which I used to finish the last steps and to prepare the 
main manufacturing of Wallum.

story: Yes they are $$$ but who cares !
story_txt: Yes they are $$$ but who cares !

story:
Hi,

Just The Tip interchangeable tips were created and developed by Nicholas Darby & Antwion Lewis, we both love fashion and enjoy making things to see people happy to use. What we created is very versatile and it would save the wearer money.

 JUST THE TIP is a high-heeled fashionable shoe that features multi-colored, interchangeable tips, offering the wearer more versatility than ordinary shoes. To match shoes with the occasion, simply change the color of the tips to match what you’re wearing! The unique style of JUST THE TIP creates a multitude of options for every woman’s look. No longer will you need a shoe for each outfit or occasion. Easily transform a shoe from classy to fun in seconds with interchangeable tips. Not only does the look change easily, but you can also wear it as a closed or open shoe. The eye-catching tips will complement the wearers garments, leaving you free to effortlessly change tips to match your outfit. 

Our Goal 

Our goal is to raise $60,000 for our manufacturing and distribution. Our goal is to launch an online mall followed by physical store locations all across the world. We really need to meet this goal in order to be successful. 

The shoes will come with an original print to match the shoe and three additional tips of that collection. The tips will be made of different fabrics and prints. So you get more for less. Imagine the luggage cost and more space you can use when you travel.


The Impact

Our goal in to become successful designers and be able to help the world through our charity Heeling Hearts which branches into three pillars:

Cancer Awareness

Men/Mothers Against Domestic Violence- MADV

Supporting Our Youth- S.O.Y./B.E.A.N -Supporting Our Youth/ Believe. Educate. Appreciate. Nurture.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you wish to donate but can't you can simply visit our website, like our facebook page www.facebook.com/justthetip2012 and share photos and status for your friends and family.

Again we want to thank you all just for listening and viewing.

Help Us Make A Difference!

story:
Short Summary

King Onye Label (KOL) is handmade accessories brand by designer Oneka Ijeoma. KOL brings together contrasting beauty in a fashion that flirts with edgy elements whilst honoring tradition. Each piece is handcrafted with quality materials and reflects an ever-expanding perspective on the art of luxury and urban living. 

After bringing fun, service & refinement to street style vending at Milwaukee & Honroe all summer. King Onye Label is planning to open a miniature edition storefront in one of Wicker Park's leading fashion boutique. 

We need your help for marketing and to make the space best represent the brand!

King Onye Label is a brand that believes in creation over competition.

What We Need & What You Get 

We need supplies to fill the storefront. 

- Quality Inventory to Create With 

- Necklace Stands 

- Window Design 

- Register 

- Desk 


    Sticker - $10 


    The Praying Man Necklace - $20 


    Bullet Shell Bracelet - $30 


    $75 GIFT CARD FOR A $50 DONATION 



    INVICTUS JEWELRY SET +Sticker $75 

    CUSTOM JEWELRY $100 

    For a $100 contribution you will receive the opportunity to request customized jewelry at $200 value.

    SPECIAL EDITION $250

    Special Edition Jewelry Project - Lifetime 20% Off to All King Onye Label Projects - VIP Invites to Upcoming Trunkshow + Fashion Events. King Onye Label Logo T-Shirt.

    Storefront Pictures 



    Perks 

    Our business is currently run out of Ijeoma's home studio and funding this shop will allow us to move into a public space in a semi-permanent location. The shop in Wicker Park will allow us to continue to provide a personalized shopping experience during the Winter Month's.

story:
nevo

 activity tracking - phone notifications - Swiss timekeeping - style



To order nevo, please visit our webshop here:

GET NEVO !




We've gone In Demand!

Our pre-sale campaign is now over but we have gone In Demand on Indiegogo. You can still buy névo and névo solar using the perk system. Contact us for any details or questions


névo is a stylish minimalist watch with activity tracking, smartphone notifications and Swiss movement. Now you can live a healthy, active lifestyle and look good doing it!

Making the decision to embed the latest technology into a watch was easy. We already love watches and wear them every day.

With that in mind, we created névo, a new class of wearable; a minimalist watch with smart notifications and the latest fitness technology built in. A product of clean lines and simple beauty that makes wearables personal.




Track steps, runs, swims

But névo isn't just a pretty face. We packed it with the tools to help you look better and feel better. 

Small changes in daily activity and habits can have a profound positive impact on weight loss and your health.  In fact, studies show that people who use step counting devices increase their physical activity by 26.9 percent over baseline.

Managing your daily activity with névo is easy and fun. You simply set a daily goal with the included app and névo does the rest.




Goal progression at a glance

To manage something, it must be measured and we wanted a simple and quick way to show  your daily progress so we embedded eleven bright white LED indicators around the névo dial. 

Just a touch of the button and you will know instantly how close you are to achieving your daily goal.


This instant feedback raises awareness of your  activity level and motivates you toward healthy daily habits.



Phone Notifications

Everyone likes to stay connected. So we built Bluetooth connectivity into névo. It alerts you when you receive an important call or text. 

Use the névo silent vibrating alarm to set a daily notification for waking up or important reminders anytime.


We added six single color LEDs alongside the white LEDs . The color LEDs are optional to enable and can be used to indicate different types of phone alerts, in addition to the  vibration. 

Now you will be able to customize alert settings of different types or for alerts from Favorites.The colors above are approximate (we are still finalizing) but the positions are correct. 



Swiss Timekeeping

A watch is first and foremost timekeeper. We wanted the best in accuracy and reliability for névo so we built it around a Swiss movement from ETA, one of the most respected suppliers in the watch industry.



No Charging, ever

Our approach to the user experience is different too. We know that no one wants the hassle of remembering to charge a watch every day so we made one that didn't need it.  Unlike other smartwatches and activity trackers, névo is powered by dual watch batteries and never requires charging.

The first battery powers the Swiss timekeeping movement for 5 years or more. The second battery powers the névo smart features of  and lasts up to 6 months. Both batteries are inexpensive and easy to change.

If changing batteries isn't your thing, we have another option for you...



nevo solar

We are proud to announce a new model: névo solar - the world’s first solar powered connected watch.

This groundbreaking innovation utilizes Sunpartner Technologies Wysisps invisible photovoltaic solution embedded in the watch dial and connected to an on-board rechargeable battery. The system is optimized for indoor lighting and eliminates the need for direct sunlight. The highly efficient Wysips® system powers all névo smart features including activity tracking, goal progression, alarms and smart notifications. 

When we developed névo we made battery life a top priority. Our standard dual battery system and low-consumption technology frees users from the inconvenience of nightly charging and now we take that concept to its ultimate conclusion – solar power. With névo solar we capture the unlimited power of light. Choose névo solar and say goodbye to battery issues forever. *

This new feature will be made available as a new model – névo solar, and will ship in August of 2015.



Battery Replacement Tool

You asked and we listened. The battery replacement tool was the most requested stretch goal and we reached it in a hurry. We have already created the prototype tool and it works great. Now battery changes are safe and easy. The tool will be included with all névo watches at no extra charge. See more images in the gallery.
* nevo solar powers the features battery. The battery for the Swiss movement is not rechargeable and has an expected life of 5+ years.

Personal Style

As you can see, style is extremely important to us. To begin with, the following névo models will be available:

*** UPDATE*** We will survey all contributors at the end of the campaign and you can select model and size. 

Granite case with Truffle strap

The Paris is our nod to the timeless classics of history. Like the city of lights itself, this watch is an elegant accessory for any occasion. 



Blacksmith case with Coffee strap

New York was built by combining old-world craftsmanship and new -world ingenuity. This watch is a testament to the heritage of the city.



Champagne case with Blueberry strap

Shanghai is famous for its nightlife celebrating from dusk till dawn. This watch captures the spirit of ambition.




Customize

You are unique, and so is névo. The watch comes with two straps that are easily interchangeable with a modern quick-release design. One strap is Italian leather, a look that is appropriate for any outfit or occasion and the other is a durable and comfortable fabric, perfect for runners and swimmers.

Nato style nylon sport strap...


If you want to mix and match from the strap your névo comes with, buy an Additional Strap perk and go wild! Here are few ideas...



***UPDATE*** Some folks have asked about the size of the straps. See below:

Length of strap 

Large: Long portion = 115mm   Short portion = 75mm

Small: Long portion = 105mm    Short portion = 70mm

Width of strap

Large/ Small: 20mm

Total assembled length

 Large: 240mm

 Small: 225mm

For those who chose the Extra Strap Perk, we will survey all contributors at the end of the campaign and you can select color and size. 


Attention to detail from product to package...





Design for Life

Design sensibility is a cornerstone for our company. To us, form cannot be sacrificed for function. névo’s simple lines and organic shape is designed to be worn every day and for any occasion. 

Taking a minimalist, 'less is more' approach, our designer created a watch that is useful, beautiful and unique. It is a timepiece  that acknowledges the past while looking toward the future.




The Watch



The App

névo uses sophisticated accelerometers and powerful algorithms to track your daily activities but the interface is simple. You set a daily goal using the app and then simply wear névo.



Set goals, follow your progress over time, and see results. Our app is simple and intuitive. You set a daily goal for steps, running, swimming, calories burned or distance. 
Whether you are commuting to the office or going to the gym, you can leave your phone behind. névo can remember your data for up to a week. When in range, névo can sync to your phone and the cloud using Bluetooth 4.0.
View your history and progress on your phone or on the web anytime. 

 

To order nevo, please visit our webshop here:

GET NEVO !




Upgradable Firmware

We know that tech is always evolving. Because of that, we  added upgradable firmware to handle future feature updates ensuring that névo is a product that is future-proof. 


Why we need you

We have designed, built, and tested the névo prototype and software. We have selected a well respected production facility that we have previously worked with successfully. 

However, one of our biggest concerns was making névo affordable to the most people possible, while still insisting on a rich feature set. In order to proceed, we need create the tooling and order quantity necessary to keep the price reasonable for everyone. 

That is why you are our most important asset! By working together, we can all benefit. 


What you receive in return

By investing in our project, your pre-orders will help fund the first production run in a quantitiy that keeps the price low for everyone.In return you get (besides our gratitude and sincere thanks!) a totally new kind of connected watch at a highly discounted price.

More than that, you join the névo family and make a statement about the importance of health, technology, and style. You will journey with us as we change the face of fitness wearables forever.

We have created several different perks to offer névo  at prices up to 60% off of retail, as well as some special perks.



Who are you guys?

Thanks for asking! We are a diverse group. Our founders have been heavily involved in manufacturing fitness sensors and consumer electronics for some of the most well-respected brands in the world, our designers are an experienced international team with years of industrial and watch design, our developers live and breath code, our media team are artists to the core, and our marketing team are die-hard digital veterans. 

Our team hails from six different countries with one single goal...to combine style and technology in  a connected watch that changes the face of wearables forever. 


Inspiration

We are an international team of builders, designers, and dreamers. Our backgrounds are in design, watch making, and fitness technology. 

Our goal is to use technology to encourage and enable healthy lifestyles but we consider great design and uncompromising style essential. That’s why we built a watch like no other.


névo on the web!

What's next?


Production

We have vetted our manufacturer and they are one of the most trusted in the industry. We have a great working relationship with them from previous projects as well as for creating the nevo prototypes. Our production time has already been scheduled.

We have developed a rigorous testing and quality control process to insure your névo will arrive in perfect working order. The packaging is designed and we have a partner to produce it. We have investigated and secured the logistics partners needed for safe delivery worldwide. 


Software integration

We are finalizing our app interface and features now. This isn't our first app and our in-house developers have lots of experience building fitness apps. Beta testing is underway and final integration and testing is scheduled.


Delivery

névo will ship in March 2015 and we will have lots of updates along the way to keep you informed on the release and delivery. The non-watch rewards will ship in January and all shipments will have tracking information provided.


Risks & Challenges

Collectively we have a lot of previous experience with product production and a great relationship with our manufacturing facility, even still, we have taken steps to reduce potential problems.We have prepared our supply chain, scheduled our production dates, and will have a local partner who is on the ground and in daily contact with our facility during production. We can stay in front of any problems that may arise and make adjustments as needed.

We have contingency plans in place in case of production delays that are out of our control. We will make regular updates during production, packaging, and shipping. We will be proactive and transparent about any problems and will maintain open communication with all our backers. 

Anyone with a question can contact one of our team members by email directly at any time!


Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our project but you can't make a monetary contribution please consider sharing it with your friends and family using the share buttons under the video. This will help us greatly to spread the word.


A NOTE TO INTERNATIONAL BACKERS:

International Shipping is $25 USD. Please add to your contribution if you require shipment outside of the United States.

Please note: non-USA backers will be responsible for any and all customs, import duties, and/or local taxes you may incur in your country of residence.  We recommend you ask your local tax authorities what you will incur based on the value of your pledge.  Please understand, we have no control over what your own country will charge you in VAT and import duties.  As a final note, we cannot misrepresent the customs information.  We appreciate your understanding of this matter.


FAQs

Do I have to charge it?

Nope! névo uses easily replaceable and inexpensive watch batteries. The timekeeping battery lasts 5 years or more and the battery for the smart features is good for 6 months or more.

Can I use it for sports?

Yes, névo has a stainless steel case, the best band materials and uses anti-glare sapphire glass crystal that is virtually impossible to scratch.

Is it water resistant?

depth of 5 atmospheres. Run in the rain, swim with it, or hit the shower.

Is it compatible with iOS or Android?

Yes and yes! The névo app is compatible with iOS and Android smartphones using Bluetooth 4.0 and above. It will also connect with Apple Health Kit & Google Fit.

Can I change the band?

Yes, névo comes with a  leather band as well as a sport fabric band to suit any situation. There are several colors available and the bands are easily changed  using the modern quick-release design.

How do I set and achieve my fitness goals?

Use the simple app interface to set your daily goals, analyze your history, and achieve your goals.

What are the Shipping Costs?

All shipping in the US is free of charge. There is additional cost for international shipping. Shipment does not include extra fees from customs, or additional costs associated with your country.


Disclaimer (Posted on December 1st, 2014)

Delivery of rewards/perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed. This is to set reasonable expectations for our contributors/donors. This disclaimer is required for accepting PayPal contributions.

Our founders have been heavily involved in manufacturing fitness sensors and consumer electronics for some of the most well-respected brands in the world, our designers are an experienced international team with years of industrial and watch design, our developers live and breath code, our media team are artists to the core, and our marketing team are die-hard digital veterans. 
Our team hails from six different countries with one single goal...to combine style and technology in  a connected watch that changes the face of wearables forever. 


Inspiration
We are an international team of builders, designers, and dreamers. Our backgrounds are in design, watch making, and fitness technology. 
Our goal is to use technology to encourage and enable healthy lifestyles but we consider great design and uncompromising style essential. That’s why we built a watch like no other.

névo on the web!



What's next?




Production
We have vetted our manufacturer and
			they are one of the most trusted in the industry. We have a great working
			relationship with them from previous projects as well as for creating the nevo prototypes. Our production time has already been scheduled.
We have developed a rigorous
			testing and quality control process to insure your névo will arrive in perfect
			working order. The packaging is designed and we have a partner to produce it. We have investigated and secured the logistics partners needed for safe
			delivery worldwide. 

Software integration
We are finalizing our app interface and features now. This isn't our first app and our in-house developers have lots of experience building fitness apps. Beta testing is underway and final integration and testing is scheduled.

Delivery
névo will ship in March 2015 and we will have lots of updates along the way to keep you informed on the release and delivery. The non-watch rewards will ship in January and all shipments will have tracking information provided.





Risks & Challenges
Collectively we have a lot of previous
			experience with product production and a great relationship with our manufacturing
			facility, even still, we have taken steps to reduce potential problems.We have
			prepared our supply chain, scheduled our production dates, and will have a
			local partner who is on the ground and in daily contact with our facility
			during production. We can stay in front of any problems that may arise and make
			adjustments as needed.
We have contingency plans in place
			in case of production delays that are out of our control. We will make regular
			updates during production, packaging, and shipping. We will be proactive and
			transparent about any problems and will maintain open communication with all
			our backers. 
Anyone with a question can contact one of our team members by email
			directly at any time!



Other Ways You Can Help
If you like our project but you can't make a monetary contribution please consider sharing it with your friends and family using the share buttons under the video. This will help us greatly to spread the word.

A NOTE TO INTERNATIONAL BACKERS:
International Shipping is $25 USD. Please add to your contribution if you require shipment outside of the United States.
Please note: non-USA backers will
			be responsible for any and all customs, import duties, and/or local taxes you
			may incur in your country of residence. 
			We recommend you ask your local tax authorities what you will incur
			based on the value of your pledge. 
			Please understand, we have no control over what your own country will
			charge you in VAT and import duties.  As
			a final note, we cannot misrepresent the customs information.  We appreciate your understanding of this
			matter.

FAQs

Do I have to charge it?

Nope! névo uses easily replaceable and inexpensive watch batteries. The timekeeping battery lasts 5 years or more and the battery for the smart features is good for 6 months or more.
Can I use it for sports?
Yes, névo has a stainless steel
			case, the best band materials and uses anti-glare sapphire glass crystal that
			is virtually impossible to scratch. 
Is it water resistant?
			depth of 5 atmospheres. Run in the rain, swim with it, or hit the shower.
Is it compatible with iOS or Android?
Yes and yes! The névo app is compatible with iOS and Android smartphones using Bluetooth 4.0 and above. It will also connect with Apple Health Kit & Google Fit.
Can I change the band?
Yes, névo comes with a  leather band as well as a sport fabric band to suit any situation. There are
			several colors available and the bands are easily changed  using the modern quick-release design.
How do I set and achieve my fitness goals?
Use the simple app interface to set your daily goals, analyze your history, and achieve your goals.

What are the Shipping
			Costs?
All shipping in the US
			is free of charge. There is additional cost for international shipping.
			Shipment does not include extra fees from customs, or additional costs
			associated with your country.


Disclaimer (Posted on December 1st, 2014)
Delivery of rewards/perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed. This is to set reasonable expectations for our contributors/donors. This disclaimer is required for accepting PayPal contributions.

story:
Short Summary

Please help me get new shoes to fit my brace. My foot and lower leg no longer line up and were causing me great pain, so the Doctor said a custom brace would be best to bring everything back in line. My health insurance would only cover 50% and I paid the other 50%, which tapped me out, This brace cost $944.00, it took me 3 months to save the 50% copay and deal with the pain for that time. But now none of my shoes will fit so I can wear it. New shoes to fit cost $280.00 a pair. It will take me 3 more months to save and get the shoes, and the pain is quite bad. Please can you help me get new shoes to fit my brace.

Cost Breakdown:
 Two pair shoes 14 6E  $280.00 =  $560.00
 The rest IGG fee

A little background:  I have been fighting Cancer since 2010, Melanoma of the Colon, This has taken all the money that I had saved up and I now have to find new ways to help pay for things. So I am how looking at crowdfunding to help me. Please, If you can help that is great, if you can't at this time can you share this campaign with your friends and family, maybe one of them can afford to help. Thank you for looking at my campaign, Have a great day.

And go to my Facebook page link , Marvins Cancer Journey and LIKE it, If you would be so kind. It's right below.    And check out the update page also. And please share this campaign.

story:
Short Summary

My 11th grade school year is about to start and I need new shoes. The problem is I go to a religious school with high dress code standards. I wanted to get something classy and fashionable. I found these beauties at a Nordstrom Rack for $119. Thing is, I, coming from a relatively large family with a relatively small budget, don't have that kind of money to spend on shoes. So I came here to IndieGogo.

What I Need & What You Get

I need $119 to buy these shoes, but the minimum goal on IndieGogo is $500. Therefore I have decided that if I get ovver $119, I'll donate the rest to charity.

Anyone who gives me at least a dollar will be emailed a picture of me, all dressed up, with my new shoes.

If you give $15 or more, you can pick a charity, and a portion of any money I get over $119 will be donated to that charity.

Even if I don't make the $500 goal, I hope to still be able to buy the shoes. If I get less than $119, I'll use the money towards the shoes and pay for the rest out of pocket. Hopefully whatever I get will be enough to offset the cost and make this whole thing more affordable.

    Risks & Challenges

    There are a few risks to supporting this campaign. Firstly, I may forget to keep putting the shoes on hold and someone else could buy them. Another risk is that I may get the money, go to the store to buy the shoes, find something I like even better and buy that, in which case you may have supported the purchase of a pair of shoes you didn't approve of. Nevertheless, I hope you trust me to make good decisions.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      I totally understand if you can't or don't want to donate. Honestly, I wouldn't donate to some other random high-school kid's campaign for new shoes. But I would want to help out, even if I can't afford to do it financially. If you'd like to help me out, please share this wherever you see fit. And if you just want to make fun of me or my sense of style, you are welcome to send a link to this page to any of your friends. The exposure helps.

story:
SAY IT

 

 

INTRODUCTION

Welcome! 

First of all I would like to thank you all for visiting this page and taking the time to know more about this project. 

I´m a graphic and fashion designer living in Berlin where I plan to develop my project. I have worked as a freelance graphic designer for 10 years now and I think it´s time to make a big step in my career, so since last year I´ve been working intensivly analising the idea of creating a clothing brand to provide a very good quiality product, with the plus of original design and artistic sensibility. So came the concept for this brand, SAY IT.

 

PROJECT

The objective is to create a new cool and fresh way to express trough the clothing you wear. A new brand with an original taste, modern, abstract, simple but powerfull. A mix of passions and techniques, combined to create clothing with a feel of individuality and freedom. 

 

COLLECTION

The fisrt Collection is inspired on a research about geometry as a simple abstract form of beauty. Morfology, proportion, texture and volume are combined to create this designs and to express individuality, intesrests and tastes.  

Here you can check some illustrative previews from this collection:


 

RESPONSIBILITY

Our providers are members of the Fair wear Foundation. Our clothing is also Oeko-Tex 100 Standard certified.

 

FUNDING

I will need your support to reach my $3.500 goal, in order to produce the upcoming first collection in the next months.

By supporting this project you will help SAY IT become REAL, by helping me raise funds for the following things:

 

1 - Production:

- Screenprinting and labeling of all the items, including t-shirts, tops, sweatshirts and bags.

2 - Marqueting: 

- Printing of marketing material like visiting cards, flyers, stickers, cataloges posters, hang tags and labels.

3 - Selling:

- Renting spaces and stands in design markets and shops to show and sell the first collection of SAT IT.

4 - Rewards and shipping:

- Materials, screen printing, packaging, and shipping costs to send you all some items from the collection.

5 - Indiegogo and other fees: up to +14%

 

* If raised funds don´t reach my goal:

Any amount will help me as a first kick to make this first collection real :)

 

* If raised funds exceed my goal:

This would help me not only to fund the development of this collection, but also allowing me to contract a programer for the Web Page and Online Store, wich must be professionally programed for usability, functionality and security issues.

I will also need funds for contracting models and a professional photographer for the catalog and the campaign. Also for Buying publicity spaces in local magazinnes.

Extra funds would also help SAY IT to grow, by expanding the collection with more designs, and inlcluding a line of t-shirts for kids too!

Therefore, all extra funds would be really welcome to help SAY IT to grow and expand its market.

 

REWARDS

SAY IT will thank your support witn some great rewards !!! So if you like this collection you can preorder now the products you want from the pledge levels on the right.

As a reward for your donation you can get T´shirts, tops, bags, pins, postcards, posters, stickers and also products for our next collections.

Note: You will have the opportunity to select your shirt(s) size and design from the catalog before we ship your reward. The final catalog will be limitated if this campaign doesn´t reach its goal.

 

Here you can see other items available as a reward:

King Size postcards

Oktopus poster (limited edition)

 

OTHER WAYS TO SUPPORT

SHARE OUR STORY :)

You can truly help us by sharing this link and telling your friends.


- Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/SAYIT_CLOTHING
- Join us on facebook at http://www.facebook.com/SAYIT.clothing                      

We'll be giving away some items among our Facebook fans at the end of our Indiegogo campaign, so make sure to "like" our page!

 

Thank you for supporting this project, for your time and consideration! 

 

 

 

 

 

 

* Currency change for prices in € are aproximated, updated at 05/08/2012.

story:
Introducing a User-Friendly Minimalist Wallet!

Keeping true to our brand, we designed this User-Friendly Minimalist Wallet to keep your cards organized and easy to access, while still having a minimal design that makes it comfortable in any pocket and the look of luxurious leather wallet. 

Features

Bonus

 

Materials

We use the highest quality material that can be found to make our products so they are durable and beautiful.  We source our vegetable tanned leather from La Bretagna, one of the oldest and best tanneries in Italy. This leather is rich and durable, and will gain character with each additional use.

Design

We aspire to make well designed products that are useful, durable, and provide simple solutions to everyday life.  In designing this wallet, we wanted a minimal wallet that simplified the process of extracting cards from that wallet.  It took nineteen iterations to find this simple design made from a single piece of leather.  By using a single piece of leather, we were able to avoid using straps or mechanical pieces to easily extract the cards making a truly minimal wallet that will last for years.  

Product Specifications

 

Production

This is our third Kickstarter. We have used our manufacturers, leather suppliers, and shipping partners to help us manufacturer both of our Kickstarter. We trust them and we learned how to work with them to achieve the best results. These wallets will ship in the end of October around 10/20/17.

 

International Shipping: Import Duty and Taxes

We can collect import duty and taxes for certain countries.  We will collect these additional fees in Backerkit after the campaign closes.  We are able to collect import duty and taxes for all member countries of the E.U., UK, Canada, South Korea, Mexico, Brazil, and Chile.  Import Duties and Taxes will not be charged on the Convenient Minimalist Wallet by Austraila, Hong Kong, New Zealand, and Singapore.  Unfortunately, we are unable to collect import duty and taxes form any other country.  

       

Here is a handy tool that can assist you in calculating duties. Remember to convert the US dollars to your local currency:

http://www.dutycalculator.com/new-import-duty-a... 

About Me

I am a recovering attorney who has worked for enough people to last a lifetime. After realizing how much I disliked attorney life, I worked for a startup as the director of operations for awhile, before I decided to risk it all, and become an entrepreneur full-time.

This company was jump-started by Mark Cuban. Really, no joke! When I was considering whether or not to start working on this bag, I came across the following quote by Mark Cuban:

"[E]very entrepreneur's job is to invent the future. I also call it ‘kicking your own [butt].” Someone is out there who thinks they have a better idea than you have. A better solution than you have. A better or more efficient product than you have...it's part of your job as the owner of the company to stay ahead of them."

After reading this quote, I decided I was not going to be the guy who stood on the sidelines saying, “I came up with that idea first, but I was too busy.” From that day on, I started waking up at 4 am, so that I could work on the project for three hours before I went to work. Now two years later, after funding our first project, we are launching our second bag on Kickstarter.

I have a bunch of kids (4) and a beautiful wife who keeps me on my toes. If I'm not in the office, I'm probably road biking.

Thank you

Thank you to all of my friends, family, and backers who have supported and encouraged me throughout this whole process. I could not have done this without you! I would especially like to thank my wife who has supported and encouraged me along the way. Also, I would like to thank the following people who have helped me throughout my campaign:

Industrial and Graphic Design: Samuel Whitworth

Video: Darcy Josie @darcyjosie

story:
Carry your cash in style

 

In order to offer a new way to carry your bills, we had to change what we used. The money clip has a clear advantage as it doesn't need a pocket, making the wallet a whole lot thinner. 

What we did better: 

  • By rounding the inner edge of the clip, we made sure that you can take out your cash without ever opening your wallet.
  • The money clip sits firmly against a dip in the middle of the wallet so it'll always return to the same secure position.

Comfortable Capacity: 10 bills (max: 20 bills)

 

 

 

 

 

Easy access to your cards

 

Using slots on either side to slide out your cards, the design gives a quick and easy way to access your less used cards.

What we did better:

  • The thumb shaped cutouts make it easy to remove any card, even when your wallet is closed. 
  • The slight stagger in the cards, which allows the top card to slide over the bottom, makes for a quick removal.

Comfortable Capacity: 4 cards (max: 5 cards)

 

 

 

 

 

A non-RFID pull tab for quick access

 

This pocket is not RFID protected to allow you to slide right through RFID scanners at work, on the tube or even at the supermarket.

What we did better:

  • The two embossed lines on the front of the wallet let you put your card in without having to look for the pocket opening. 
  • The pull tab is outside the pocket to allow for smooth, uninterrupted access to your most used cards and identification.

Comfortable Capacity: 2 cards (max: 5 cards)

 

 

 

 

 

Carry your coins securely

 

A coin pocket is needed in any wallet, so we made it as simple as possible without it affecting the size or functionality, even if you don't plan to use it.

What we did better:

  • Using the simple extra flap to ensure nothing falls out, we made sure you can carry your coins securely. 
  • The pocket can store just about anything without it ever falling out. a note, receipt, a SIM card, the list is endless.. All in a slim form.

Comfortable Capacity: 5 coins (max: 10 coins)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The wallet comes in at a super slim 10mm which barely increases when it's loaded to a comfortable capacity of 10 cards, 10 bills and 5 coins.

It can take anywhere up to 15 cards, 20 bills and 10 coins - the maximum capacity - so you can carry everything you want.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

I'm Sam, the founder of Slim. 

I'm a designer at heart and after many years of crafting and testing many prototypes, we've finally perfected the bifold wallet.

Coming in at a mere one-centimetre thin (empty & full), we've created the world's thinnest leather wallet which incorporates world-class leather with a heavily-prototyped design. 

The problem: Too many wallets are either small pouches where you have to fold notes or overly bulky traditional wallets where everything gets lost inside them.

The solution: The Slide lets you get to your items as fast as possible. You can draw bills, pick the exact card and take out coins without ever having to open it.

The two embossed lines on the front of the wallet let you put your card in without having to look for the pocket opening. 
The pull tab is outside the pocket to allow for smooth, uninterrupted access to your most used cards and identification.

Comfortable Capacity: 2 cards (max: 5 cards)
 

 
 

 

 

Carry your coins securely
 
A coin pocket is needed in any wallet, so we made it as simple as possible without it affecting the size or functionality, even if you don't plan to use it.
What we did better:

Using the simple extra flap to ensure nothing falls out, we made sure you can carry your coins securely. 
The pocket can store just about anything without it ever falling out. a note, receipt, a SIM card, the list is endless.. All in a slim form.

Comfortable Capacity: 5 coins (max: 10 coins)
 

 
 
 

 

 

 
The wallet comes in at a super slim 10mm which barely increases when it's loaded to a comfortable capacity of 10 cards, 10 bills and 5 coins.
It can take anywhere up to 15 cards, 20 bills and 10 coins - the maximum capacity - so you can carry everything you want.
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

 

 

 
 

 

 

 
 

 

I'm Sam, the founder of Slim. 
I'm a designer at heart and after many years of crafting and testing many prototypes, we've finally perfected the bifold wallet.
Coming in at a mere one-centimetre thin (empty & full), we've created the world's thinnest leather wallet which incorporates world-class leather with a heavily-prototyped design. 
The problem: Too many wallets are either small pouches where you have to fold notes or overly bulky traditional wallets where everything gets lost inside them.
The solution: The Slide lets you get to your items as fast as possible. You can draw bills, pick the exact card and take out coins without ever having to open it.

story:
Special Pre-order Price: $295 (retail value $740 USD +taxes) 

Sure, winter might be over, but will you be ready when it comes around again? 

Manufacturing has begun on our one-of-a-kind Smart Parka and we're giving you the chance to pre-order at a special price before it goes to retail.

Order today and get yours for only $295.


What is Smart Parka?

We believe that going out in winter should not be intimidating. It should be fun. We found a real problem with winter coats. If the weather turns bad, and you don't have your gloves or anything to cover your face, you are not protected. 

Smart Parka is the first winter coat ever with built in gloves, a built in scarf, a removable lining for extra cold days and an extension to turn your hip-length parka into a mid-length coat. 

How much does it cost?

We think it's just fair that we reward those who help us make it happen. 

What styles do these coats come in?

Smart Parka comes in 4 different styles for women and 3 different styles for men. We have something to fit every personality.



Take a look at Smart Parka styles

Check out each of our styles for men and women and the colors available. 

Super soft yet water resistant leather gloves with the thinnest and warmest insulation. Designed specifically for Smart Parka, the gloves tuck neatly inside the zippered pockets in the coat's sleeves.

 
Built-in scarf to cover you up when the wind suddenly starts to howl.


Tablet pocket designed to comfortably fit an iPad, can hold onto most tablets, clutch, notebook etc.


Glasses pocket to keep your reading glasses, sunglasses, or ski goggles safe and handy.


Coat extension gives you extra length for particularly cold days or a winter night out in a nice dress. 


Removable interior layer makes the coat adaptable to different temperatures, so you can be comfortable every day of the winter season. Duplicate pockets on each layer means that the coat's functionality is never compromised.


Phone Pocket keeps your phone safely close at hand while supporting your headphones to offer a seamless connection.


Hat pocket lets you stash your toque (as we call them in Canada), belaclava, ski hat, cossack, trapper, etc.


Tracker tag pocket inside the coat fits most commercial tracker tags so that you can locate your coat if you've left it somewhere or when you're scrambling to get out the door.


Water resistant exterior protects you from the wetter elements and drivers who can't be bothered to slow down for puddles. 


OTHER FEATURES

Hand warming fleece pockets for extra comfort.

Heavy-duty, YKK® zipper

Fill : White Duck Down (inner lining), Synthetic Insulation (outer and gloves)

Fur : Faux fur

IMPORTANT: All features are available in all the models with the two exceptions

a. There is no extension for the Bomber (Men and Women)
b. There is no removable lining for the Vogue (Women)

The Bomber's design excludes an extension and the Vogue (Women) has an integrated inner layer already.

ULTIMATE QUALITY MATERIALS:

Coats made for serious weather need serious materials. We've chosen the sturdiest hardware and fabrics with the ideal balance between luxurious feel and durability.


If you do not absolutely love your coat, just return it within two weeks and get a full refund of your pledge minus shipping and handling. No questions asked. 

   

EXCHANGE POLICY:

We are happy to exchange your coat for any reason. Just return your Smart Parka plus the shipping fee and we will send you another one right away.

SIZING CHART



WHAT IS MY SIZE?

The Bomber is a "relaxed fit" mode. The rest of the models are slim to average fit. You will be told which popular brands they are most comparable to at the time of the survey.



Video credits Background music: "Rite of Passage" by Kevin MacLeod

story:
------------------------------------------------------------------ Click para Versión en español

------------------------------------------------------------------

PLEASE  CHECK THE LASTEST UPDATE (13th of June)

SEND US AN EMAIL WITH YOUR COMMENTS ABOUT THE PRODUCT AND YOU WILL GET 5$ OFF  (info@cajaplaya.com)

Blocke Beach will keep your, smartphone, money, and other valuables safe while out in the water. Just screw the box in the sand using the anchor sand for the umbrella, put your belongings inside and lock the box. The mechanism that confers Blocke Beach its safety is based on a propietary screwing mechanism that anchors the box strongly inside the sand. Optionally, safety can be enhanced thanks to a heavy duty alarm padlock that produces a loud sound when the box is manipulated

We’ve all been there. Sitting on a beautiful beach, waves lapping at the shore, cool water beckoning relief from the blazing sun. You look at the water, you look at your stuff, you look at the water again. What about the stuff? Option A: You cover it with your towel. Option B: You keep an eye on it while you’re swimming don’t look like great options. Spoiler alert: We all know how this will end..

 Fortunately, there’s Blocke Beach: a simple box that will allow you to dive into the water without worrying about someone running off with your valuables. Keep your important things such as hotel keys, smartphone, money, and other valuables while out in the water. Just screw the box in the sand using the anchor sand for the umbrella. Put your belongings inside and lock the box. It’s really that easy.


The product is finished and has been tested. Our users are loving it so far!

The boxes are ready to be shipped. We'll start processing orders the moment our campaign funds become available, in the order they are received. You can expect your box to arrive in June, just in time for your holidays!

We have started this Indiegogo campaign to run a marketing campaign that will allow us to reach out to many potential users.

We want to make a marketing campaign on the media. The more money we raise, the longer the campaign!

Please find bellow the chart for the rewards that we offer. Please find the one you preffer.

We would like to start the delivery of the rewards in the middle of June 

We are a small family business that had an idea, and began the great challenge of making it real.

We got the patent, and spend our savings in prototyping, and testing, to deliver a great product.

We are commited to make this project a reality.

As a company we are involved in the security business for more than 10 years and we developed and patented two more products. 

People of our team have a background of more than 20 years in locks and security and moves to our company because: Security can be done at a good price

Our main feature is that we put in place of user when developing a product and not launched it until not meet the highest quality and safety requirements

what does happen if we don't reach the goal?

Please note that all the rewards will be served and delivered, since we have units in stock. That means you will not need to wait to see if we reached the goal to get your reward. Funds will cover a marketing campaign we plan to run during the summer. The more we raise, the longer the campaign!

Would you like to customize your Blocke Beach?

• We offer the posibility to customize your blocke beach in the following ways:

- Customize your cover: You will be able to personalize your BB with the image of your family ( max 6 people), or maybe if you are a lot of people in your family yo put in the cover the name of your family. Just another way to make different and funny your security box.

- The other way to customize your Blocke Beach is protecting it with the padlocks that we offer. The keyless padlock and the alarm siren padlock. Two special options for a very special people. you can search the same product on the net and you will realize about the good offer. Please see the picture bellow.

What if I pull the umbrella and take it?

•  This is the first thought of the people, but rest assured, the box is bolted to the floor. If someone pulls the umbrella umbrella but the box would still be bolted to the floor. A picture is worth a thousand words.

Is it really safe?

• Blocke Beach is as safe as you want it to be. Pace it securely fastened to the sand with the anchor of the umbrella, and use a good lock. Check out the installation picture below to see how secure it can be.


What do I do with the key?

• You can put the key into a bracelet in the same way as is done in pools and spas, or also you can put in your pocket bathing suit. We recommend using keyless locks, but never recommend using the typical combination lock used in the bags, since its opening is very easy.

We will offer two solutions we believe are the most appropriate and therefore the safest:

- Lock keyless opening movement: In this padlock combinations of numbers are eliminated and only remember the sequence of moves. Please see this video that we found in youtube for a better understanding (it is not ours)

- Alarm Lock: In this case, despite having key, se3 compensates the product with the alarm. That way if someone approaches your box with the intention of opening Buzzer will sound and let you know. Please see this video that we found in youtube for a better understanding  (it is not ours)

In our rewards can choose which one is the one you like

What are the measurements of the box?

• The box has very comfortable size, is portable and weighs less than 1kg. The measuremets are 270x160x90 mm and the container has a capacity of 1 liter

What material is made from?

• The box is made of plastic polypropylene of last generation that gives it great resistance to deformation


Use the Indiegogo share tools and tell your friends and family about Blocke Beach!

Thank you very much for your support! Any questions you may have, please drop us a line at info@cajaplaya.com. We look forward to having you on board.

VERSION ESPAÑOL:

Somos una pequeña empresa familiar que un día tuvo una idea, y empezó el gran reto de ponerla en marcha. La patentamos, nos gastamos los ahorros en prototipos, pruebas, moldes... en fin, una odisea, que sólo la ilusión nos impedía dejarlo a la mitad. 
 ¿Que hemos inventado?, pues muy sencillo, la respuesta a la pregunta que nos hacemos todos cuando estamos en la playa y queremos bañarnos o dar un paseo:

¿Y donde pongo ahora mi smartphone para que no se estropee o no me lo quiten?

Vamos, quien dice smartphone, dice gafas de sol, llaves del coche, etc
Os dejamos un vídeo donde se explica para que sirve y como funciona. Mas abajo os resolverémos las dudas de si es seguro, si lo pueden abrir, etc... 

El producto esta gustando mucho a la gente,  ya está terminado, y es una realidad, 
¿Qué tenemos que hacer para que todo el mundo lo conozca?. Pues muy sencillo, hacer publicidad. Hoy si no te conocen no eres nadie, y si no que se lo digan a todos esos famosillos...
Queremos hacer una campaña de medios, y de vosotros depende lo larga que pueda ser. Pensamos que con 3500$ para empezar, podemos hacer un poco de ruido este verano, pero si nos ayudáis y conseguimos recaudar un poco mas, quien sabe, lo mismo estamos todo el verano sonando en la radio, como el de la barbacoa :D. 
¡Imaginaros cada vez que suene el anuncio en la radio!, podréis decir a la gente que este a vuestro lado, ¡Este anuncio se oye gracias a mi!, y cada vez que lo veáis en la playa, podréis decir: ¡Yo fui de los primeros en tenerlo!
Para poder llegar a los 3500$ que necesitamos, hemos diseñado unas recompensas que esperamos que os gusten. Hemos hecho distintos niveles, para que elijáis la recompensa que mas se ajusta a vuestras posibilidades. 
La crisis sigue ahí y por eso os lo agradecemos mas todavía.

Qué pasará si no llegamos a los 3500€?

 Si no llegamos a la cifra, todos los apoyos recibidos serán invertidos de cualquier manera, en una campaña de medios, La única diferencia será que en vez de oírse el anuncio cuatro veces al día se oirá una vez nada mas. Tener en cuenta que TODAS las recompensas serán entregadas porque el producto es una realidad y lo tenemos en stock, así que no tendréis que esperar a ver si llegamos para tener vuestra recompensa

De todas formas si alguno quiere que se le devuelva la aportación antes de recibir la recompensa, por supuesto no habrá ningún problema, tan sólo mandar un email con vuestros datos y se os devolverá inmediatamente

Quieres personalizar tu cajaplaya?

• Te ofrecemos la posibilidad de personalizar tu cajaplaya de las siguientes formas:

- Personaliza tu tapa: Podrás personalizar tu cajaplaya con la imagen de tu familia ( max 6 personas), o si tu familia es muy grande, podrás poner el nombre de tu familia en la tapa.

- La otra forma de personalizar tu cajaplaya es protegiéndola con los candados que te proponemos. El candado sin llave y el candado con alarma. Dos opciones especiales para gente muy especial. Te invitamos a buscar en la red estos mismos productos y verás que te estamos ofreciendo una oferta muy especial. Mira la imagen de abajo.


Este es un resumen de las distintas recompensas que os ofrecemos. ¡Elije la tuya!

Estas son las preguntas más frecuentes que nos suelen realizar. Si no encontráis la respuesta que estabais buscando, por favor no dudéis en contactar con nosotros y con gusto os responderemos

¿Qué pasa si tiran de la sombrilla y se la llevan?


Esto es lo primero que piensa la gente, pero tranquilos que la caja está atornillada al suelo. Si tiran de la sombrilla se llevarían la sombrilla pero la caja seguiría atornillada al suelo. Una imagen vale mas que mil palabras.


¿Es realmente segura?

• Cajaplaya es tan segura como tu quieras que sea. Si atornillas bien la caja con el sacacorchos en la arena y cierras la caja con un buen candado el exito está asegurado. Mira las instrucciones de instalación que aparecen abajo y verás lo seguro que es.

¿Qué hacemos con la llave?

• Puedes poner la llave en un brazalete de la misma forma que se hace en las piscinas y en los Spas, o también te lo puedes guardar en el bolsillo del bañador. Se recomienda usar candados sin llave, pero en ningún caso recomendamos usar el típico candado de combinación que se usa en las maletas, ya que su apertura es muy fácil.

Nosotros os ofrecemos dos soluciones que creemos son las mas adecuadas y por tanto las mas seguras:

- Candado sin llave con apertura de movimiento: En este candado se eliminan las combinaciones de números y tan solo hay que recordar la secuencia de movimientos

- Candado con alarma: En este caso, a pesar de tener llave, el producto se compensa con la alarma. De esta forma si alguien se acerca a tu caja con la intención de abrirla la alarma sonará y te avisará.

En nuestras recompensas puedes elegir cual es la que más te gusta 


¿Cuales son las medidas de la caja?

• La caja tiene unas medidas muy manejables. Es portatil y pesa menos de 1Kg. El interior es muy espacioso y tiene una capacidad de 1 Litro, lo que permite guardar el smartphone, las gafas de sol, las llaves del coche, etc

Las medidas son:  270x160x90 mm 

¿De qué material está fabricado?

• La caja está fabricada en polipropileno de ultima generación que le confiere una gran resistencia a la deformación.


 

Otras formas en las que podéis ayudar

Algunas personas no pueden colaborar, pero eso no significa que no puedan ayudar:
  • pídele a la gente que difunda la campaña y que genere eco Tu no puedes pero alguien a quien conozcas seguro que si
  • Por favor usa las herramientas para compartir de Indiegogo.

Muchas gracias por vuestro apoyo. Estamos siempre disponibles en info@cajaplaya.com
