• Te ofrecemos la posibilidad de personalizar tu cajaplaya de las siguientes formas:
- Personaliza tu tapa: Podrás personalizar tu cajaplaya con la imagen de tu familia ( max 6 personas), o si tu familia es muy grande, podrás poner el nombre de tu familia en la tapa.
- La otra forma de personalizar tu cajaplaya es protegiéndola con los candados que te proponemos. El candado sin llave y el candado con alarma. Dos opciones especiales para gente muy especial. Te invitamos a buscar en la red estos mismos productos y verás que te estamos ofreciendo una oferta muy especial. Mira la imagen de abajo.




Este es un resumen de las distintas recompensas que os ofrecemos. ¡Elije la tuya!



Estas son las preguntas más frecuentes que nos suelen realizar. Si no encontráis la respuesta que estabais buscando, por favor no dudéis en contactar con nosotros y con gusto os responderemos




¿Qué pasa si tiran de la sombrilla y se la llevan?


Esto es lo primero que piensa la gente, pero tranquilos que la caja está atornillada al suelo. Si tiran de la sombrilla se llevarían la sombrilla pero la caja seguiría atornillada al suelo. Una imagen vale mas que mil palabras.





¿Es realmente segura?

• Cajaplaya es tan segura como tu quieras que sea. Si atornillas bien la caja con el sacacorchos en la arena y cierras la caja con un buen candado el exito está asegurado. Mira las instrucciones de instalación que aparecen abajo y verás lo seguro que es.



¿Qué hacemos con la llave?

• Puedes poner la llave en un brazalete de la misma forma que se hace en las piscinas y en los Spas, o también te lo puedes guardar en el bolsillo del bañador. Se recomienda usar candados sin llave, pero en ningún caso recomendamos usar el típico candado de combinación que se usa en las maletas, ya que su apertura es muy fácil.
Nosotros os ofrecemos dos soluciones que creemos son las mas adecuadas y por tanto las mas seguras:
- Candado sin llave con apertura de movimiento: En este candado se eliminan las combinaciones de números y tan solo hay que recordar la secuencia de movimientos
- Candado con alarma: En este caso, a pesar de tener llave, el producto se compensa con la alarma. De esta forma si alguien se acerca a tu caja con la intención de abrirla la alarma sonará y te avisará.
En nuestras recompensas puedes elegir cual es la que más te gusta 

¿Cuales son las medidas de la caja?
• La caja tiene unas medidas muy manejables. Es portatil y pesa menos de 1Kg. El interior es muy espacioso y tiene una capacidad de 1 Litro, lo que permite guardar el smartphone, las gafas de sol, las llaves del coche, etc
Las medidas son:  270x160x90 mm 

¿De qué material está fabricado?
• La caja está fabricada en polipropileno de ultima generación que le confiere una gran resistencia a la deformación.

 




Otras formas en las que podéis ayudar



Algunas personas no pueden colaborar, pero eso no significa que no puedan ayudar:   pídele a la gente que difunda la campaña y que genere eco Tu no puedes pero alguien a quien conozcas seguro que si Por favor usa las herramientas para compartir de Indiegogo.   Muchas gracias por vuestro apoyo. Estamos siempre disponibles en info@cajaplaya.com

story:
After a long journey I am ready to bring my brand Nyx Couture to life!

About Nyx Couture

Nyx Couture is a fashion brand that features a modern aesthetic. The brand will focus on  sharp trend-setting styles during each fashion season. Nyx Couture believes in creating stylish clothing while giving back to the world and the people that live in it. Nyx Couture is focused on these main objectives:
  • Following trends throughout the seasons to create fashionable looks
  • A dedication to producing quality-clothing at good prices
  • Selling fashionable clothing while focusing on giving back to our community 
  • Creating a brand of Iconic designs, which express sleek elegance 
  • All of my clothing is extremely comfortable. Tees are made for 100% cotton with a Jersey Knit 

Designs for a Change

Designs for Change is a fund that will help children and causes all around the world. Designs for a Change is solely funded by the profit of Nyx Couture. 

  • A portion of the proceeds from every item sold will go towards Designs for a Change
  • Each month, out customers get to vote for one of the three causes that are selected to receive a donation 
  • At the end of each month the fund is given to the cause that recieves the most votes 


         .  .  

       Nyx Couture is dedicated to producing                      clothing you'll love that is stylish and durable

  • Live - I want to make sure that you are able to LIVE comfortably in the clothing. 
  • Love - I want you  to LOVE the clothing you buy. Your clothing should express a sense of style and presence 
  • Forever - I  will produce clothing from durable fabrics and inks that will last. 

The Vision

What I want to achieve in the years coming

First Year -

  • Have  a running website 
  • Begin selling Tee shirts and Hooded Sweatshirts
  • Contribute to the winter season - Sweatshirt and Long sleeved clothing 
  • Have begun to give to multiple causes

Second Year -

  • Expand the store to sell a larger variety of products
  • Began selling products like pants, outerwear, and basics
  • Widen the brand to a larger market

Third Year -

  • Should already have items being sold in physical locations
  • Be a fully functional online apparel store
  • Have given to 30+ causes

What will your contribution do?

To bring Nyx Couture to life I will need:

Work station - 3000

  • Laptop
  • Design Software 
  • Printer/Scanner 
  • Other accessories like Drawing Pad, Pressurized Pens, etc. 

Start up fees for production - 2500

  • Website creation
  • Trademark and Legal Fees 
  • Payment to began printing

Sealing the deal - 2500

  • Custom Tags
  • Boxes 
  • Packaging Materials 
  • Postage box
  • Costumer Servicing
  • Creation of Designs for a Change

Key products to sell - 1920

  • T-Shirts 
  • Hooded Sweatshirts 
  • Materials 

Rewards

What you will receive for your amazing contribution:

Supporter Tee


Nyx Couture Tote

              

Supporter Hooded Sweatshirt

About me

Hi! My name is Jonathan. I am a 17 year old  high school junior from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.  I have always had the passion for design and creation whether it was with Legos, K’nexs, or even cereal boxes. I have always had the desire to create and I've always had the desire create for others, but now I have the desire to GIVE to others.

Just about two years ago I had the idea that I wanted to start a tee shirt business. From there I went to my mom (who is a single mother, I’m her only son) about my amazing idea. My mom has always supported me in everything I wanted to do no matter the cause. My mom, being my number one supporter, seemed to become instantly dedicated to what I wanted to do, maybe even more than me. My mom had to sit through countless hours of me going on about how amazing my tee shirts were going to be. One thing that was holding me back was my lack of knowledge of design. I had no f drawing skills, so at that point my mom surprised me and decided to put me in Moore College of Art and Design's Youth Program.

Moore College of Art and Design is where I spent two summers, and many fall and spring sessions. My mom worked as hard as she could to enroll me in the classes I wanted to take. Every session my mom would allow me to pick two classes from the ones she thought would help me the most. At Moore I started with basic drawing and worked my way up to Silk screening (Tee shirt Printing), graphic design, and Fashion/sewing. During this time the original concept of my business began to shift into something more interesting and endearing. It went from a tee shirt business to the idea of a fashion brand. I became so familiar with fashion and design that I wanted to broaden my idea. When I told my mom, she supported me with the same enthusiasm and confidence that I remember her having in me. 

After I took every class at Moore that could help me in creating my business; it was time for me to begin learning other skills for creating my tee shirts. That's when I began to attend The Enterprise Center(Current Partner), and I began to learn how to start my own business. I learned everything I needed to create a successful business. In the last year I've learned an exceedingly large amount of information about entrepreneurship. 

Today I am ready to bring  my brand to life. 


Spread the Word - Please share Nyx Couture with everyone you know, and maybe even people you dont know

story:
THE FOLDABLE DRESS FOR THE MINIMAL TRAVELER.

Link Here: www.origamei.com to order today!

After three years of product research and countless hours of work, we at Origamei have created the perfect ensemble of compact dresses for the minimal traveler: The Origamei Dress Collection. 

The Origamei dresses offer us women everything we want in a dress, with the versatility to carry it anywhere, anytime. It fits comfortably in the glove compartment of your car, hangs perfectly on the strap of your beach bag, tucks nicely inside your backpack, or even stows away discreetly in the side of your purse, Origamei gives women the option of carrying a beautiful dress without the hassle and worry of excessive clutter or overpacking for a business trip or a fun getaway. 

Origamei's patented fold technique makes packing light, compact, and efficient. With it's wrinkle-resistant and breathable fabric, deep hand pockets, discreet keyring, and minimal style, it's no wonder women who have worn our dress absolutely love it. 

Three Styles for anything life throws at you. Origamei Foldwear is all you need if you're an On The Go (OTG) woman.

Be free, do what you love.

Order now and have it shipped! Link Here

 

FAQS 

1. How much does each Origamei weigh?

Approximately 15oz, depending on style and size.

2. What is the material composition of the dress? Can it be machine washed and dried?

90% Polyester and 10% Elastane - Allowing each Origamei to be wrinkle resistant, 4-way stretchable, breathable, and lightweight. Each dress is also true to size and pre-shrunk! We've tested it with over 100 washes and dries.

3. What is the material composition of the key-ring? Can it be machine washed and dried?

The zinc alloy key-ring (carabiner) is spring-loaded, durable, and rust-proof allowing you ease of mind when washing and drying. We've tested it with over 100 washes and dries.

4. Can an Origamei be hemmed in length?

Since the foldable pocket feature is stitched at the lower bottom of the dress, the Origamei KIKU (Tent dress) and MOMO (T-shirt dress) cannot be hemmed. Although, with the inner lining nature of the YURI (Layered dress), it can be hemmed at the waistline where the lining and the original fabric meets.

5. Can the YURI (layered dress) be used for nursing (surprisingly common question)?

Unfortunately, the YURI dress was not designed with a nursing feature included. Although, we’re sure it could be self-modified into the lining fabric for those we would like a fun side project!

6. What is your return and exchange policy?

In the Indiegogo community, the items that you receive after making a pledge are referred to as “rewards” because they are not purchases in the sense of a shop/store. They are considered “gifts” that are sent to our supporters as a token of appreciation for their support of our business. At the moment, there is currently no returns or exchanges.

7. Color and Sizing?

Keep in mind that the colors on these dresses reflect different lighting and may vary slightly from actual representation of color. Since we are currently in product development stage, the sizing on size chart may change slightly once development is complete.

8. What about international shipping and tariffs?

Backers from non-US countries may be required to pay additional import fees and other taxes on goods. Please double check with your country's policy for more details on this matter. We do intend on writing them as "gifts" as a thank you for your support - as each country treats "gifts" differently.

9. Want to place a bulk order?

Please e-mail us directly at info@origamei.com for any quantity bulk orders. Please specify how many dresses you'd like to order.

10. What are the model's size and height reference?

  • MOMO T-shirt Dress: Size Medium, Wine Red, 5'7"
  • YURI Layered Dress: Size Small, Jet Black, 5'4"

story:
WHY isn't plastic the best idea for sports gear?

Almost 100% of sports gear available is made of pure plastic. Plastic means the fibres are fully synthetic, made of melted plastic granulate typically from crude oil and a wild mix of other chemicals. The most commonly known plastic fabrics are Polyester, Nylon (aka Polyamide), Polypropylene, or Elastan (aka Spandex).

There are 3 major downsides of plastic textiles. First, MICROPLASTIC. Currently, our most pressing enemy.* It´s produced when you wash your running gear in the washing machine. Millions and millions of pounds are floating in our oceans. Synthetic textiles are one of the main polluters. Second, non-biodegradability. Plastic stays alive for centuries and does not dissolve easily. Third, toxicity. Scientists have highlighted the toxic impact of plastic in the ocean. Doesn't seem to be the smartest thing to wear on your sweaty body while working out right?!

 

Minimal Plastic - Minimal Footprint - Happy Running

It is out of question that we need alternatives. The current trend of using recycled plastic from the oceans cannot be the long term solution. New plastic shirt = new pollution. A great alternative for running gear needs to be functional, regenerative, and biodegradable. We studied fibres and fabrics in terms of performance and sustainability. For our 1st collection we are replacing plastic fibres with great natural and non-harmful chemical fibres: Merino wool and Tencel Lyocell.

Merino wool is the most functional natural fibre for active usage. It's fibres are very fine and super soft, it can perfectly deal with different temperatures and moisture. With its antimicrobial strengths, bad odor doesn't stick to it like cheap polyester fabrics.

Tencel Lyocell fibre is a modern viscose that is wood based (eucalyptus, beech trees). It is produced by the Austrian manufacturer Lenzing. In some ways it performs similar to Merino wool, but 2 specific strengths are its softness and its cooling effect. Together, Merino and Tencel are an unbeatable team.

 

Our 1st Collection

The collection consists of 4 pieces. The lightweight knitted shirt, the woven short, and the knitted tights in long and short. While the shirt and short are made with 100% non-plastic fibres, the tights still need a tiny touch of Elastan to be strong and flexible (less than 10%). 

The cords we use are made of 100% Tencel. The elastic waistbands are made of natural rubber and organic cotton. Label tags are made of woven cotton. We use screen printing with water based colors for the logo prints. 

 

After coming home from your run you can simply put the gear on a hanger and hang it into the window. Let the air do the rest. It's Fast drying and the odor vanishes. You don't have to wash this gear as often as your plastic gear. That's good for the textile, good for the environment, and saves you work. Thanks Merino for the epic antimicrobial goodness!

 

The shorts will be available in 2 colors (color selection available once the campaign is over). Either you chose the beautiful olive green or you go classy with anthracite-black.

 

Shirt and tights are sewn with high quality flat lock seams. This means they lay flat on your skin and will not chaf. 

 

Eco-Conscious without the Sacrifice

In the past, eco-friendly gear usually meant you had to sacrifice some sort of functional or technical aspect of the product, but we have managed to keep that integrity while being friendlier to our planet. Being passionate runners on our own we analyzed which performance features our running gear needs to fulfill and considered this for our fabric selection. 

 

The fabric combination offers many perks, fast drying being one of the best.

 

Wouldn't be a good running shirt if it didn't vaporize that sweat, now would it?

 

The 50/50 blend of Merino Wool and Tencel Lyocell is woven into a super lightweight fabric.

 

The magic of Merino Wool. Keeps you cool when it's warm and warm when it's cool.

 

Lookin' good

Our designer Lena has many years of experience in designing sports gear for globally known brands. She knows how to find the perfect symbiosis between modern design and a timeless look. We developed a look which perfectly works for all genders out there.

 

To bring the pieces in harmony which each other we integrated a white piping as design element in every piece. All together the outfit looks dynamic and elegant without being glossy or attracting attention. Beautiful understatement.

 

Available Sizes

If you are a tall person don´t worry, we are too. We made sure the shirts and tights are long enough also for tall runners.

We are located in Hamburg, Germany. If you are ordering from outside of the EU, customs may apply. This depends on the agreements between your country and ours and the value which is shipped. 

You have to take care of potential import customs on your own. To check whether customs will apply or not, use this calculator (we are not liable for the information provided on the following page):

https://www.simplyduty.com/import-calculator/

 

Want to add an extra shirt, shorts, or sets?

We have add ons available for every perk. Just pick one of our perks on the page, proceed to checkout, and add ons will be available there. If you want to get some extras for yourself, your partner, or family member this process makes its super simple.

 

Our Commitments Beyond Minimal Plastic

Thanks for all the love!

 

Our Story

Hey! We’ve been working on Runamics for months and are stoked to bring it to life and share it with you! We, Robbie + Steffen met for coffee one day through a mutual connection and from there Runamics quickly developed into a real and exciting concept. We are not only excited to grow this company and see where it can go, but we really want to make a real difference in the world. We don't just want to create a product, we want to create awareness and a massive change in status quo. 

 

Here's our Team:

 

 

Running should make you feel free and happy... it shouldn’t be accompanied by any bad conscience.

Our vision is to become the #1 running brand for eco-conscious runners. Every runner out there should run with a smile on their face, not with a fragment of bad conscience, that the gear they are wearing is bad for them or the planet. And in the end we want to show our kids and following generations, that plastic is not the solution for everything ;-)

 

"Microplastic as our currently most pressing enemy" explained: we know, that as everything in live is based on trade offs. Once you make a decision for something you make one against another thing at same time. The same happens to us as a company. There are so many problems to tackle in the (sports) textile industry that we can´t solve all problems at once. But we plan to tackle them subsequently. Be it the dyeing, finishing, or the logistics. In the end we want to make sports gear with the least invasive impact on our environment and a great impact for the people who make them. But for now, we are seeing the hidden microplastic tragedy as the most pressing issue. We need alternatives. Now.

 

Risks & Challenges

The previous months have been very intense, full of great ideas, challenges, and learnings. It took us a while to get to this point where we can share the products with the world.

We are happy to be a team of experienced people from the sports textile industry, creative, and business world to make things happen in a professional way.

However, as in every occasion, there are things that are not under our control. We are working with a great network of selected partners. But this also means we are reliant on those. The seamstress factory needs the fabric from the knitting company, which needs the yarn from the spinning company, which needs the raw material from the farms or other suppliers, and so on. If one has a delay the whole process could delay.

So you see, despite every optimism and detailed planning, things can happen. Whenever any time delay or anything else occurs, we guarantee you that you will be the first to know about this. In any case, you will get a regular update from us about the status of your products.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share our campaign with friends and family! There share buttons on this page to easily share this campaign. Check us out on Instagram as well @runamics_

A great alternative for running gear needs to be functional, regenerative, and biodegradable. We studied fibres and fabrics in terms of performance and sustainability. For our 1st collection we are replacing plastic fibres with great natural and non-harmful chemical fibres: Merino wool and Tencel Lyocell.

Merino wool is the most functional natural fibre for active usage. It's fibres are very fine and super soft, it can perfectly deal with different temperatures and moisture. With its antimicrobial strengths, bad odor doesn't stick to it like cheap polyester fabrics.
Tencel Lyocell fibre is a modern viscose that is wood based (eucalyptus, beech trees). It is produced by the Austrian manufacturer Lenzing. In some ways it performs similar to Merino wool, but 2 specific strengths are its softness and its cooling effect. Together, Merino and Tencel are an unbeatable team. Our 1st Collection
The collection consists of 4 pieces. The lightweight knitted shirt, the woven short, and the knitted tights in long and short. While the shirt and short are made with 100% non-plastic fibres, the tights still need a tiny touch of Elastan to be strong and flexible (less than 10%). 


The cords we use are made of 100% Tencel. The elastic waistbands are made of natural rubber and organic cotton. Label tags are made of woven cotton. We use screen printing with water based colors for the logo prints. 



 
After coming home from your run you can simply put the gear on a hanger and hang it into the window. Let the air do the rest. It's Fast drying and the odor vanishes. You don't have to wash this gear as often as your plastic gear. That's good for the textile, good for the environment, and saves you work. Thanks Merino for the epic antimicrobial goodness!

 
The shorts will be available in 2 colors (color selection available once the campaign is over). Either you chose the beautiful olive green or you go classy with anthracite-black.

 
Shirt and tights are sewn with high quality flat lock seams. This means they lay flat on your skin and will not chaf. 

 
Eco-Conscious without the Sacrifice
In the past, eco-friendly gear usually meant you had to sacrifice some sort of functional or technical aspect of the product, but we have managed to keep that integrity while being friendlier to our planet. Being passionate runners on our own we analyzed which performance features our running gear needs to fulfill and considered this for our fabric selection. 
 

The fabric combination offers many perks, fast drying being one of the best.
 

Wouldn't be a good running shirt if it didn't vaporize that sweat, now would it?
 

The 50/50 blend of Merino Wool and Tencel Lyocell is woven into a super lightweight fabric.
 

The magic of Merino Wool. Keeps you cool when it's warm and warm when it's cool.
 
Lookin' good
Our designer Lena has many years of experience in designing sports gear for globally known brands. She knows how to find the perfect symbiosis between modern design and a timeless look. We developed a look which perfectly works for all genders out there.




 
To bring the pieces in harmony which each other we integrated a white piping as design element in every piece. All together the outfit looks dynamic and elegant without being glossy or attracting attention. Beautiful understatement.


 
Available Sizes

If you are a tall person don´t worry, we are too. We made sure the shirts and tights are long enough also for tall runners.
We are located in Hamburg, Germany. If you are ordering from outside of the EU, customs may apply. This depends on the agreements between your country and ours and the value which is shipped. 
You have to take care of potential import customs on your own. To check whether customs will apply or not, use this calculator (we are not liable for the information provided on the following page):
https://www.simplyduty.com/import-calculator/
 
Want to add an extra shirt, shorts, or sets?
We have add ons available for every perk. Just pick one of our perks on the page, proceed to checkout, and add ons will be available there. If you want to get some extras for yourself, your partner, or family member this process makes its super simple.

 
Our Commitments Beyond Minimal Plastic

Thanks for all the love!

 
Our Story

Hey! We’ve been working on Runamics for months and are stoked to bring it to life and share it with you! We, Robbie + Steffen met for coffee one day through a mutual connection and from there Runamics quickly developed into a real and exciting concept. We are not only excited to grow this company and see where it can go, but we really want to make a real difference in the world. We don't just want to create a product, we want to create awareness and a massive change in status quo. 
 
Here's our Team:

 
 
Running should make you feel free and happy... it shouldn’t be accompanied by any bad conscience.
Our vision is to become the #1 running brand for eco-conscious runners. Every runner out there should run with a smile on their face, not with a fragment of bad conscience, that the gear they are wearing is bad for them or the planet. And in the end we want to show our kids and following generations, that plastic is not the solution for everything ;-)
 

"Microplastic as our currently most pressing enemy" explained: we know, that as everything in live is based on trade offs. Once you make a decision for something you make one against another thing at same time. The same happens to us as a company. There are so many problems to tackle in the (sports) textile industry that we can´t solve all problems at once. But we plan to tackle them subsequently. Be it the dyeing, finishing, or the logistics. In the end we want to make sports gear with the least invasive impact on our environment and a great impact for the people who make them. But for now, we are seeing the hidden microplastic tragedy as the most pressing issue. We need alternatives. Now.
 

Risks & Challenges
The previous months have been very intense, full of great ideas, challenges, and learnings. It took us a while to get to this point where we can share the products with the world.
We are happy to be a team of experienced people from the sports textile industry, creative, and business world to make things happen in a professional way.
However, as in every occasion, there are things that are not under our control. We are working with a great network of selected partners. But this also means we are reliant on those. The seamstress factory needs the fabric from the knitting company, which needs the yarn from the spinning company, which needs the raw material from the farms or other suppliers, and so on. If one has a delay the whole process could delay.
So you see, despite every optimism and detailed planning, things can happen. Whenever any time delay or anything else occurs, we guarantee you that you will be the first to know about this. In any case, you will get a regular update from us about the status of your products.

 
Other Ways You Can Help
Share our campaign with friends and family! There share buttons on this page to easily share this campaign. Check us out on Instagram as well @runamics_

story:
Titanium Housing 

Titanium is the material from which real luxury watches are manufactured. Used in the aircraft industry to withstand even the greatest pressure. 42% lighter and dramatically harder than stainless steel. 

 

Ceramic Bezel 

Manufactured under high pressure, the zirconia-ceramic bezel combines all the features you would want for a high-quality luxury watch: aesthetics, lightness and scratch resistance.

 

 Sapphire Glass Touchscreen 

At the watch glass, the wheat separates from the chaff. Genuine, scratch-resistant and almost indestructible sapphire crystal adorns the high-resolution display against environmental influences and signs of wear.

 

 10 ATM waterproof 

Not 3 ATM, not even 5 ATM. The VIITA TITAN HRV is waterproof up to 10 ATM. So, you can swim, snorkel and take a shower without worrying about your watch.

 

Built-in GPS 

Leave your smartphone at home. In training mode, our built-in GPS records all movements and visualizes them on your VIITA. The combination of GPS and GLONASS satellite systems allows centimeter-accurate route tracking.

 

Machine Learning 

The VIITA Titan HRV tells you exactly in which pulse range or how hard you should train. The smartwatch analyzes your heart rate variability 24/7 and uses our intelligent algorithm to calculate your individual daily constitution-dependent training recommendation. Just look at the watch and you immediately know how to train to get fitter or lose fat. It couldn’t be easier.

 

Up to 2 weeks battery life 

We make that possible where others fail! Despite uninterrupted heart rate variability analysis, the battery in our VIITA Titan HRV lasts up to 2 weeks. With the help of a tailor-made battery and a specially programmed operating system, we are able to eliminate background processes as far as possible, thus making energy management more efficient.

 

 Dehydration Algorithm 

Through a multitude of data, which VIITA has collected millions of times since 2011, we have succeeded in developing an algorithm that makes it possible to determine your water consumption very precisely. Already 2% fluid loss leads to a performance deficit of up to 20%. This loss in performance is reflected in many measurable factors.  

The following measurement data are used to calculate your individual water requirements:  

  • Data of the micro-movement sensor
  • Pulse
  • Heart rate variability
  • Regeneration status
  • Stress progression
  • Movement patterns of the last 7 days
  • Sleeping time and quality

 

Activity Tracking 

Your VIITA Titan HRV helps you measure your activities (speed, distance, time, heart rate and calories) for 19 types of sport.  

Our activity tracking comes with: running, cycling, walking, hiking, mountain climbing, rowing, skiing, cross-country skiing, cross-country skating, inline skating, nordic walking, mountain biking, treadmill running, cross trainer, rowing ergometer, nordic walking on treadmill, cycling ergometer, stepper, and racing.

 

VIITA Scan - Regeneration and Stress Analyses 

VIITA's intelligent, self-learning algorithm calculates your stress level and regeneration status based on your heart rate, heart rate variability, 3D acceleration data, height, weight, sleep quality, training intensity, training volume, age and gender. Due to the high complexity of our algorithm and the uniqueness of each’s body, the VIITA SCAN provides health screenings in real time.

 

My Mission 

Target your problem areas with My Mission and transform your body. Set your fitness and body goals on the VIITA smartphone app and My Mission will adapt its training recommendation automatically! Want to lose weight? Select the weight loss option and your VIITA will recommend training intensities targeting your fat burn zone.

 

 Steps & Cals 

Steps & Cals counts your steps and calories accurately. The calorie formula takes into account your heart activity, weight, height, age, sleep and exercise among other things.

 

 My Challenge 

My Challenge allows you to set your fitness goals (distance, time, speed) and track in real time if you are ahead or behind your target thanks to the built-in GPS sensor in the VIITA TITAN. VIITA TITAN’s built-in GPS tracks and visualizes the distance you have covered on your screen.

 

Find my phone 

If your smartphone hides from you again, this function will help you out!

 

Notifications 

Receive notifications about new calls, Facebook, WhatsApp and other messages right on your VIITA.

 

My Sets 

My Sets lets you determine the perfect timing between your resting periods and sets, to optimize your muscle growth.  

Your VIITA signals through subtle vibrations when to exercise or to take a break. Exercise times and training times can be individually adjusted in the VIITA App.

 

VIITA Wake - Gentle awakening at the right time 

Wake up feeling refreshed, thanks to VIITA waking you within a 30-minute window during your lightest period of sleep.  

VIITA Wake analyzes your personal sleep patterns, based on your heart rate, heart variability, and your movements while asleep.

 

 

 Cutting out the middlemen 

You think: How can a luxury smartwatch be so affordable?

Very easily! In the supply chain of each manufacturer, no matter what good, there are several positions such as manufacturing, distribution to wholesalers and the shop in which you finally buy the product. Each of these positions costs money and rightly so, salaries, rent et.c must, of course, be paid.

In this Indiegogo campaign, we exclusively offer you the opportunity to purchase a luxury smartwatch directly from us, without the need for a middleman. That's why we can offer the VIITA Titan HRV at this unbeatable price.

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

We are aware of the complexity of this project. But with our many years of experience in wearable technologies and three successful smartwatch collections, we are sure that we can deliver a perfect product. And that without any major delays.

Our technologies are tried and tested. We have reliable suppliers with the best quality. We have already manufactured over 50 prototypes where the last ones were 99% suitable for series production. All certificates and legal matters have been obtained. A timely production is thus nothing in the way.

Again and again, unforeseen complications can occur. If this happens, we will keep you updated during and after the campaign.

As part of this Indiegogo project, you will take an active part in the finalization of our user experience by providing your insights - from design adjustments to your emphasis on app features - and we will be listening to your feedback and integrating it into the VIITA App whenever possible.

story:
The refugee crisis has never been more real. Over 65 million people have been forced from their homes by war and violence. These innocent people are stuck in indefinite limbo, without the freedom to work, play and live free. It’s a miserable existence that crushes aspiration and traps talent. 

But what if one small object had the power to give back opportunity to those who have lost it? That is the objective of The Pin Project: to help displaced persons, returnees and refugees achieve long-term self-reliance through meaningful work. 

By buying or gifting a Pin made by a refugee, displaced person or returnee, you will help create employment and income for a displaced generation to craft their own futures.  

 

  

Pin Pricing

We are partners from around the world. Under Pricing we outline the approximate conversation rates for each reward you purchase. 

 

 

The Pin measures 0.95 inches wide x 1.4 inches long (3.5 cm x 2.4 cm). The Pin weighs between 5.5 and 6 grams.

This is how the Pin will be packaged:

 

Wearing the Pin 

Iconic, fashion-forward and universal, the Pin can be worn anywhere, on anything, by anyone. It’s a badge of honor, signifying our shared commitment to meeting one of the greatest challenges of our time.

 

 

Inspired Design

The Pin is designed by the award-winning jewelry designer Jenny Bird. The kite is a symbol of hope and aspiration. It represents the power of humanity’s ability to rise above challenges, no matter how great.

 

Gifting a Pin this Holiday Season

As the season of giving and goodwill approaches, make a difference with your gifts this holiday season. After backing the campaign, we’ll send you a virtual card previewing the Pin and showing how it will make a difference, which you can then forward to the recipient(s) of your choosing. 

 

 

Special Edition

For an extra special gift or keepsake, choose our elegant 18-Karat Solid Gold Pin. You can also choose a collection of all three Pins. 

 

 

Special Edition: Afghan Kites

 

In the countries where refugees and returnees will be producing The Pin, the kite represents hope to children and adults alike. By purchasing these authentic Afghan kites to fly or display on your wall, you'll also be supporting The Pin Project as we equip a Jordanian workshop to employ Syrian refugees. You can also pair The Brass Pin with a set of five kites.

 

Video by Lalage Snow for Turquoise Mountain.

 

 

Pricing

*These are approximate conversions as of November 15th, 2017. 

 

 

Why the Pin Project is Different

The sheer scale of the refugee crisis is daunting. People want to help, but often don’t know where to start. The Pin Project gives anyone a chance to do something positive and simple to help displaced persons, returnees and refugees today.

The Pin Project is also fundamentally different from donating to charity: you give refugees, displaced persons or returnees the chance to take control of their own futures through income-earning opportunities.

By buying a Pin you are not only providing makers with direct wages, you are also funding training and the purchase of tools and equipment required to generate long-term employment opportunities where they are desperately needed.

 

 

The Power of Craft

The UN Refugee Agency believes that 1 in 3 viable jobs for refugees is in craft production. Craft production is a long-term driver of economic growth in developing economies. The skills that crafts training provides are lifelong, suitable for people of all genders, easily transferable from generation to generation, and have been found to have higher levels of job satisfaction than many other jobs available to displaced people. 

 
 
 
 

The Power of Work 

Refugees should not be viewed as passive victims. By providing meaningful work we can unlock their potential, develop new skills, and help them forge a pathway to autonomy. 

A prevailing phenomenon in all refugee camps is utter boredom. It isn’t that most refugees don’t want to work, it is that working is very rarely an option available for them. The Pin Project will reignite a sense of daily purpose and help restore structure and dignity to shattered lives.

 

 

A Scalable Solution 

The Pin has been designed so that it can be made by displaced persons around the world. While elegant, the design is also simple and replicable. The materials to make the Pin can also be sourced locally.

We have developed a straightforward ‘How To’ guide outlining step by step instructions to creating the Pin, making it possible to scale production to almost anywhere in a relatively short amount of time. 

 

Where the Pins Will Be Made

 

 

Our initial focus is on four of largest refugee and returnee populations in the world: Jordan, Turkey, Afghanistan and Burkina Faso. 

If the Kickstarter Campaign reaches well beyond our target, we will be able to expand globally to support other affected refugee populations, including South Sudanese refugees in Uganda, Somali refugees in Kenya, and Rohingya refugees in Bangladesh (see the map above and refer to our stretch goals below for more information).

 

Our Stretch Goals

 

Our impact will grow rapidly as we raise more money because our production partners will be training a greater proportion of new artisans. 

The average artisan will make 3 pins per day, but as we produce more, we will employ more artisans who will only be able to produce 1-2 Pins per day. 

Employment for a single refugee for can benefit up to 10 people. 

If we raise $750,000 or roughly 30,000 pins sold, we will be able to expand production to Myanmar, Lebannon, Uganda, Kenya and Bangladesh. 

 

Where Your Money Goes

 

 

These are our projected financials for the campaign, which may fluctuate based on the number of pins sold. 

 

The production process is simple and will be similar from workshop to workshop, country to country. Turquoise Mountain, our technical partner, will provide technical assistance to new producers, leveraging their extensive experience doing so.

 

 

The Timeline

 

 

The Pin Project is an initiative being launched by a coalition of like-minded social enterprises working with refugees: Far + Wide Collective, ISHKAR, Global Goods Partners and Turquoise Mountain.   

 

Endorsements

 

Campaign Partners  

 

Technical Partner

 

Production Partners 

 

We hope to add other production partners to the campaign as we reach our stretch goals. 

 

Press 

 

 

 Influencers

These are our projected financials for the campaign, which may fluctuate based on the number of pins sold. 

 
The production process is simple and will be similar from workshop to workshop, country to country. Turquoise Mountain, our technical partner, will provide technical assistance to new producers, leveraging their extensive experience doing so.

story:
The watch face is designed to mimic the look of an actual camera lens. Both the watch face and watch back is built with scratch resistant sapphire glass that also creates a fish eye effect giving the Automatic Vintage Lens an authentic camera look that you can't find anywhere else.

Made with a skeleton design, the openworked dial gives you a view into the complex inner workings of the movement inside. This combined with a three layered dial gives you an elegant design that allows you to see the watch in action.

Made with a skeleton design, the openworked dial gives you a view into the complex inner workings of the movement inside. This combined with a three layered dial gives you an elegant design that allows you to see the watch in action.

The focus ring inspired Bezel gives our watch the feel of a real camera lens. This attention to detail gives the Automatic Vintage Lens an uncanny resemblance to a camera lens and is a testament to our dedication to craft.

Instead of the boring standard numbered watch face for the minor indices, you are instead given the focal length and aperture numbers to indicate the time.

Encased in a 47mm case inspired by camera bodies, the Automatic Vintage Lens doesn't use simple stainless steel. Instead, ours is gold plated with engraved serial numbers (limited availability) and model number inserts.

Our movement is an automatic customized gold plated Miyota 82S0, beautifully tailored to fit inside the Automatic Vintage Lens. The power reserve will last a durable 40 hours and will run indefinitely as long as there is movement. With 21 Jewels, the Automatic Vintage Lens will also be one of the most accurate time pieces on the market.

With genuine leather straps manufactured by Horween in Chicago, the same company that makes basketballs for the NBA. TACS has taken every step to ensure that you get a product that will be worth every penny.

At TACS we believe a big part of purchasing a watch is the unboxing experience, it shows how much we care about our products and customers. The Automatic Vintage Lens watch will come in an elegant and out of this world wooden collectors box consisting of 3 tiers containing the watch, watch cover, and for all those photographers out there a SD card holder. A unique watch deserves a unique package.

Everyone who has backed our project will now get a FREE tripod display for the Automatic Vintage Lens watch!

We know that many of you baby your watch (ourselves included) and don't want it to be scratched up while you're working away at your desk. This tripod display lets you "park" your watch and display it in place its glory while you're at your desk. It even doubles as an actual tripod with a 3/8" mount for those times when you need some stability in a hurry.

We understand some of our backers might be tinkers of their timepieces. So, today we are introducing the TACS watch toolkit. The toolkit comes with:

2 x Phillips head screw driver 
2 x flat head screw driver 
1 x spring bar adjustment tool 
1 x canvas / leather carrying case

The price of the toolkit is $HKD 200 (Approx. USD$25), available now just on Kickstarter. Check out our update for more information here.

Each of you as our backer will get a Coin which signifies you are part of our team, ourLifetime Member. You may be wondering, what does this coin get me? This coin warrants all of our backers to receive Lifetime Warranty on the Automatic Vintage Lens. This means that at any given time if your watch stops functioning we will repair the watch Free of Charge. We will even cover your shipping for up to two years. What else? You will able to receive future promotion for other TACS products.

From idea to reality, the Automatic Vintage Lens is a design that beautifully marries photography and time. Support us today and you can combine your love of photography with a unique time piece.

The NATO Lens is another unique timepiece from TAC, similar to its cousin Limited Edition Automatic Vintage Lens the design of NATO Lens was born out of the same love for photography. The timepiece features a sportier look with its leather nylon strap, smaller case size and Quartz movement. We are featuring the NATO Lens on Indiegogo as a perfect compliment to the Limited Edition Automatic Vintage Lens at 50% its retail price.

Fisheye Effect Mineral Glass

44mm Case Size

Rotatable Bezel

Leather Nylon Straps

Quartz Movement

Two Color Options (Military Green or Classic Orange)

Packaging

Lookbook

 

Download and print to try the watches for yourself!

Limited Edition Automatic Vintage Lens: Download
NATO Lens: Download

 

Risks and challenges

Here at TACS our team has been built over the last six years with a combined experience in the watch industry for over 30 years.

Using this experience, we have created a plan that will meet both demand and production needs. Yet no matter how prepared we are, component delays and unforeseen shortages can always occur. If this happens, you have our assurances that we will keep you informed and work to quickly resolve any problems that might arise.

story:
As mentioned that Foliage came to me one day as I was sorting through my notebooks. As a designer, traveler, and foodie, I need to take 3 or more notebooks with me and frankly, I thought it was time to change that.

So I took a chance to create this project together with my coworkers and we made a notebook of our own.

Foliage - Your Modular Notebook

Foliage has a unique binding system which allows it to support up to four interchangeable booklets at a time. These can be removed, rearranged and combined easily and quickly depending on your needs.

Carry up to 4 booklets of up to 64 pages each (256 pages in total)

Whether you need a planner, a diary, to-do lists, manuscript paper or just need to be organized and more productive, the Foliage is ideal.

It can carry heavyweight paper for fountain pens and calligraphy, ultra brilliant paper for pencil drawing and drafting or even just some scrap paper for crafting. Whatever your need or mood the Foliage has it covered.

A perfect Notebook for EVERYONE!

Instead of struggling to find a notebook to suit your needs... just simply make it “yours”.

The Foliage is for anyone who wants to give their journal their own personal touch.

Organize inner pages

Customized inner paper type and size...create the perfect combination for your own needs.

Choose any 3 Internal Booklets for Free.

These inner booklets are interchangeable, refillable and recyclable. Use them, keep them, share them, and replace the inner booklets whenever you like.

Using Dowling paper 100g. Easy writing and preservable, keep your notes and precious memories long-lasting.

The Notebook Eco Booklet is an all paper booklet.

Pick A Color

Customize your own notebook by choosing your favorite color.

Choose Your Size

Choose the perfect size for you. Desk, Travel or Pocket? Choose the one which suits you best.

The desk-size Foliage is the perfect companion for those who need space to create. Sketch, draft, compose at your leisure with the A5 sized desk-top Foliage.

The travel-size Foliage is designed as a middle size between desk size and pocket size, not that big, not that small, extremely comfortable to hold in hand.

The pocket-size Foliage is the perfect companion for traveler, commuters and those who need to take their notebook everywhere with them.

 

Personalize Own Foliage

Personalize your own custom monogram of your name or your favorite words on the cover of your notebook.

First Stretch Goal

Get this for FREE when we have 100 backers!  Please help us to share this campaign with all your families or friends who love writing!

Internal card and gadget sleeves

Full Grain Leather + Vegetable Tanned

Leather Cover: Using the full grain leather from reputable suppliers. And also the leather is vegetable tanned using bark, branches, and leaves, which minimizes the impact on the environment.

The Hard-wearing Cover ensures a long life for your versatile notebook.

Know more about Full-grain leather (Business Insider UK)

Full-grain leather is often used for heavy-duty leather items, like weapon holsters and utility belts. But it can also be used (with great success) for dress belts, briefcases, dress shoes, work boots, and numerous other leather goods. This type of leather is naturally marked with imperfections from the animal, like a brand or a scar. It takes the entire grain of hide, with all the imperfections and inherent toughness of the material. Full-grain is hard-as-nails leather that will develop a rich patina as it ages, looking more and more beautiful as you use it. It's widely recognized as the best and highest-quality leather money can buy.

 

Risks and challenges

Throughout the past year, we have been working around the clock in refining our designs. Numerous prototypes have been developed, and countless hours have been spent making sure that we will be as good as we intend it to be.

There are always challenges and unforeseen obstacles that arise when trying to bring a product to life. Fortunately, after extensive research, we have established a good relationship with a manufacturer that has many years of experience in the field and is able to work to our exact specifications.

During the production process, we expect to make minor changes to optimize the design for mass production.

We will be using a professional fulfillment company to handle the logistics of shipping, in order to ensure that that side of the operation is well covered.

If any issues arise, we'll contact you as timely and openly as possible.

story:
ULTIMATE COMFORT

Our bamboo-based fabric blend makes our socks unbelievably comfortable. The round surfaces of the bamboo fibres sit smoothly against the skin so that the material feels incredibly soft. This next-level fabric combined with the perfect fit and a seamless toe are setting a new standard in sock comfort.

ULTIMATE CONVENIENCE

Our socks are available via a convenient subscription service and delivered straight though your letterbox. This campaign gives you the opportunity to buy either a one-year subscription or a one-off package of five pairs of our Ultimate Everyday Socks.

TECHNICAL FEATURES

Our Ultimate Everyday Socks have got all angles covered.

ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY

It's not just the technical benefits that make bamboo such a great material, it's also great for the environment. Bamboo generates the same yield as cotton from a mere 10% of the land area and is able to grow completely naturally without the use of pesticides or fertilisers. ​ Social issues are high on our agenda at The Sock Lab. The socks are produced in Portugal by our manufacturer who is certified in environmental and social responsibility.

 THE DETAILS

Initially we will be producing three core colours, so you'll be able to chose from:

Black

Navy

Dark Grey

All of our socks will be available for men and women in 2 different sizes:

UK 3.5-6.5 (EU 36-40, US 6-9) 

UK 7.5-11.5 (EU 41-46, US 10-13)

The exact composition of our sock is:

75% Bamboo Viscose

23% Polyamides

2% Elastane

WHAT THE EXPERTS SAY...

"The Sock Lab’s socks are fully optimised to offer comfort, fit and durability."  ​

Dr William Reilly MChem, University of Oxford

FOLLOW US

If you want to stay up to date with all The Sock Lab's news then sign up to our newsletter or follow us on social media.

Email Newsletter: Subscribe through our website thesocklab.co.uk

Instagram: @the_socklab

Facebook: @thesocklab

Twitter: @the_socklal

story:
HELP ME HIT MY $5000 GOAL!!

 

Who and What is Fashion Makes A Difference??

I am Sheila Johnson, also known as Sheila J in the fashion world. I am a model, dancer, actor, writer, model coach, fashion entrpreneuer... a creative.  I have been modeling for 4 years; my life is modeling and the fashion industry. I love increasing my skills and spreading my knowledge. I want to attend school for hair, make up, and wardrobe styling amongst many others. 

 

I have modeled for New York Fashion week, am on a billboard on 34th Street, and have modeled for a lot of print work. I have inspired many with the work that I produce when I am in front of a camera; it's like a transformation. It inspires me doing what I do. I couldn't think of anything else but to give back what I know, to share how hard it can be to inturn help others. 

That is why I want to start a modeling talent agency. A lot of aspiring models look at my portfollio and they tell me that they want to do what I do. Some are amazed at the fact I can transform into so many different people that are all still me. I am utilizing what I have learned in this business and the connections I have gained to help me with this endevour.    

This campaign will help me to hit the ground running with this company and provide me with the financial backing to piece together the building blocks that I need including a website and marketing materials. The sooner I start, the sooner models and other talents around the world can have this helpful guide to assist them in their own quest for acheivement.

A video will be posted soon :)

What We Need and What You Get Out of It!

I need funding for a website, marketing materials, supplies, a computer, business formation, and a potential office space. 

Without funding, this project is going to take much longer to complete, and the longer it takes the longer everyone has to wait to receive the compiled information.

Honestly, the goal SHOULD be $10,000 minimum, but I do not want to be disappointed if we do not achieve that goal.

Some perks that you get?? How about a T-shirt with the Companies logo? Maybe some tickets to a lanuch party, As the Bearing Turns? Maybe a mug or a nice signed Photo from me? Definitely a THANK YOU Note on Our Website, Blog, and Twitter.

Why Should You Care?

The modeling industry has faced a variety of challenges and changes in recent years. Various scandals have rocked the industry, including evidence of highly placed executives in major firms soliciting sexual favors from aspiring models, and victimization of young models by unscrupulous agents. In 2000, the British Government declared plans for a ban on super-thin models in an attempt to reduce the increase of eating disorders among teenagers. The editors of leading women’s and teen magazines supported this by adopting a new voluntary code of conduct, banning skeletal models and celebrities from their pages. There is no perfection in modeling, but there is lots to be learned and gained in the world of fashion that is always changing. 

Recognizing this need for change from both governments and clients will introduce a new brand of contemporary model, representing all ages, ethnic groups and clothing sizes. Our aim is to provide clients with a wide and diverse cross-section of models, talents and creative services.

You should care because a lot of people will find real value in themselves because of the confidence someone saw in them to make a difference. The motivation to improve an industry is something that not everyone has in their every day life. I know I can help and begin to make positive changes.

My editorals and blogs have been widely followed and praised by the masses. I have over 5,600 fans on facebook and counting. I know that my ideas could be just as inspirational and have an even larger following.

Aside from all that, I am so passionate about spreading the knowledge I have learned from over the years, that I want to help anyone that will listen.

Remember... you can specify how much you give! The levels are suggestions, but if you want to contribute an 'in between' amount, please do so!

Other Ways You Can Help

Ok, so you don't have $5 to contribute. That's cool. Please share this IndieGogo campaign on ALL of your social networks. Spread the buzz about it! Without the community's support the campaign won't be successful, much less the agency.

Twitter, Facebook, Wordpress, Pinterest, Reddit, Tumblr... Heck, put it on your Xanga and Myspace. Help Fashion Makes A Difference's dream come true!

story:
CAITLIN POWER is trying to raise money to attend the Fashion Coterie Trade Show in New York City. The funds will be used for transportation to New York City, all booth/registration fees for the three-day trade show, prepping materials for the show and stay in the city.

Fashion Coterie is an exhibition, where buyers from around the globe come to view the best designer brands for the next season. They are introduced to new labels and make their decisions as to what designers they will be placing orders with.

Caitlin Power has been working hard in the Canadian fashion scene and the company is ready to introduce the brand to the international market with your help. 

With each donation made, CAITLIN POWER would like to give back!

$10.00 A personal thank you email from Caitlin Power

$50.00 8" x 10" runway photo with a thank you signed by Caitlin Power

$100.00 Leather CAITLIN POWER keychain

$500.00 Leather CAITLIN POWER card case or change purse

_____________________________________________________________________

Caitlin Power has been recognized nationally for redefining womenswear through classic tailoring, architectural details, and sharp silhouettes. Her inspirations stem from her muse Kate Lanphear, to architecture futurism, and androgynous cuts. Power has gained notable recognition from Elle, Flare, and FASHION for her signature harmony of fine tailoring, edgy details and her trademark, leather.

Born and raised in Calgary, Power discovered her passion for design at a young age, and later went on to study Fashion Design at Lethbridge College. Power established her self-titled contemporary women’s ready-to-wear label in 2008. Debuting at Western Canada Fashion Week, she was awarded the title for the Emerging Designer Competition. Since making the move to Toronto just one year ago, Power continues to impress Canada and build upon her national following by showcasing her coveted collections at Toronto Fashion Week.

As stated by Power, “Tailoring is important within the brand. I focus on sophisticated, classic silhouettes, but make them youthful with edgy details. I use leather in unexpected places, and focus on the female form, making style lines accentuate a woman’s curves. My woman commands attention, and dresses sharp to receive it."

_______________________________________________________________________

CAITLIN POWER is a self titled brand, founded in Fall 2008. The brand’s focus is to compel women to see themselves in a different light; to own their confidence and feel their power. CAITLIN POWER successfully does this through fine tailoring, architectural details, and sharp silhouettes. The brand inspiration stems from futurism, architecture, and men’s tailoring. Fine leather detailing is a CAITLIN POWER trademark.

______________________________________________________________________

If CAITLIN POWER attends Fashion Coterie, the business will undergo substantial growth. The strong, empowering womenswear label will be available on an international scale and CAITLIN POWER will now have a strong platform to build on.

 

Twitter: @CAITLINOWER_hq (https://twitter.com/CAITLINPOWER_HQ )

              @Caitlin_Power (https://twitter.com/Caitlin_Power )

Facebook: CAITLIN POWER (http://www.facebook.com/pages/Caitlin-Power/135935203877)

Instagram: CAITLINPOWER_hq (http://instagram.com/caitlinpower_hq)

                  Caitlin_Power ( http://instagram.com/Caitlin_Power )
story_txt:
CAITLIN POWER is trying to raise money to attend the Fashion Coterie Trade Show in New York City. The funds will be used for transportation to New York City, all booth/registration fees for the three-day trade show, prepping materials for the show and stay in the city.
Fashion Coterie is an exhibition, where buyers from around the globe come to view the best designer brands for the next season. They are introduced to new labels and make their decisions as to what designers they will be placing orders with.
Caitlin Power has been working hard in the Canadian fashion scene and the company is ready to introduce the brand to the international market with your help.  
With each donation made, CAITLIN POWER would like to give back!
$10.00 A personal thank you email from Caitlin Power
$50.00 8" x 10" runway photo with a thank you signed by Caitlin Power
$100.00 Leather CAITLIN POWER keychain 
$500.00 Leather CAITLIN POWER card case or change purse
_____________________________________________________________________
Caitlin Power has been recognized nationally for redefining womenswear through classic tailoring, architectural details, and sharp silhouettes. Her inspirations stem from her muse Kate Lanphear, to architecture futurism, and androgynous cuts. Power has gained notable recognition from Elle, Flare, and FASHION for her signature harmony of fine tailoring, edgy details and her trademark, leather. 
Born and raised in Calgary, Power discovered her passion for design at a young age, and later went on to study Fashion Design at Lethbridge College. Power established her self-titled contemporary women’s ready-to-wear label in 2008. Debuting at Western Canada Fashion Week, she was awarded the title for the Emerging Designer Competition. Since making the move to Toronto just one year ago, Power continues to impress Canada and build upon her national following by showcasing her coveted collections at Toronto Fashion Week. 
As stated by Power, “Tailoring is important within the brand. I focus on sophisticated, classic silhouettes, but make them youthful with edgy details. I use leather in unexpected places, and focus on the female form, making style lines accentuate a woman’s curves. My woman commands attention, and dresses sharp to receive it."
_______________________________________________________________________
CAITLIN POWER is a self titled brand, founded in Fall 2008. The brand’s focus is to compel women to see themselves in a different light; to own their confidence and feel their power. CAITLIN POWER successfully does this through fine tailoring, architectural details, and sharp silhouettes. The brand inspiration stems from futurism, architecture, and men’s tailoring. Fine leather detailing is a CAITLIN POWER trademark. 
______________________________________________________________________
 If CAITLIN POWER attends Fashion Coterie, the business will undergo substantial growth. The strong, empowering womenswear label will be available on an international scale and CAITLIN POWER will now have a strong platform to build on. 
 
Twitter: @CAITLINOWER_hq (https://twitter.com/CAITLINPOWER_HQ )
              @Caitlin_Power (https://twitter.com/Caitlin_Power )
Facebook: CAITLIN POWER (http://www.facebook.com/pages/Caitlin-Power/135935203877)
Instagram: CAITLINPOWER_hq (http://instagram.com/caitlinpower_hq)

story:
Who am I?

My name is Christel Mack and I am the owner of a fused glass and mosaic studio, ScatCat Designs, in Ottawa, Canada.

Why am I doing this project?

There are hundreds if not thousands of docks for the newest iPhone on the market. But what are they? White or black plastic, aluminum, even wood. Really? That's it??? Definitely not going to cut it for a glass artist like myself who works with a myriad of colours every day. So, this is what I did...

I created a stylish, beautiful and fully functional design for an iPhone 4/4S dock, ‘StackDock’, made out of 42 handcut pieces of glass fused and stacked around an iPhone connector (please watch the video/slideshow and check out the gallery for photos). Unfortunately, with the small kiln that I currently have in my studio, it takes me two days (two full firings) to fuse the pieces required. My goal with this indiegogo project is to raise enough funds so that I can purchase a kiln that can fuse enough pieces for 8 docks at a time (one full firing), cutting my elapsed time down by 16-fold!

Breakdown of funds:

$4000 – 42” wide oval glass kiln

$800 – enough fusible glass for 100 docks

$200 – iPhone 4/4S connectors

Key Features:

-          Weight: 1 pound (due to the substantial weight, one hand can be used to attach and detach the iPhone without lifting the dock)

-          Dimensions: W 4 ½” D 3 ¼” H ~2”

-          Components: 42 handcut pieces of glass fused in a glass kiln into 12 different components; plastic connector (inside the unit); rubber feet (to stop the dock from moving on glass tables/desks)

-          What it supports: iPhone 4 and 4S

-          Colour!!!!

If you don't have an iPhone 4 or 4S, please look at the $10 and $25 perks, as they would make lovely Christmas gifts! Nah, I think you should just keep them for yourself :).

story:
What We Do

We create exclusive products made to fund social impact projects.

 


Why We Need Your Help

Collaboration = power. Able Made began when designers I admired came together, collaborating with me to develop products for funding the foundation I started to honor my husband that left us unexpectedly and far too soon. Surrounded and inspired by their incredible talent and compassion, I experienced the power of collaboration firsthand. It not only carried me through the loss of my best friend, but also it made my foundation far more able to do amazing things for inner city youth.

We’re asking you to collaborate with us and help fund Able Made’s first 2014 collection in time for Valentines Day. Each piece in the line will fund a specific social impact project.  


More About Us: Press Links

WWD 

Glamour Magazine

Project Runway 

Refinery29 

Huffington Post

Complex Magazine




Where Your Money Will Go

While Able Made starts with my story, today it extends far beyond. Our beautifully designed, exclusive products are made by amazing designers and brands, and fund charitable projects around the globe. 100% of the proceeds from this fundraiser will be used to produce Able Made’s upcoming 2014 collection and help promote it through spring.



We are currently talking to designers and potential new products and causes they care about, so the products are charities they support are still to be determined. But here are just some of the initiatives our products have been able to support to date:





We've sent children to school with our Able Made x Public School Lobo Tote for Pencils of Promise.




We’ve helped protect the environment with our Able Made x Melissa Joy Manning Earth Love Jewelry Collection benefiting Earthworks and Able Made x Loomstate Swale Zip Hoodie benefiting Surfrider Foundation.




We’ve provided jobs to those at risk for human trafficking with our Able Made x The Brave Collection Kiri Klahan Bracelet for the Somaly Mam Foundation and Able Made x WHIT Peru Dot Clutch for Not For Sale.




We’ve provided jobs for those transitioning out of homelessness with our Able Made x The Giving Keys Able Bracelets.



We’ve brought beautiful music to classrooms with Able Made x Threadless It Grows on Trees Tees for VH1 Save the Music Foundation.




We've empowered Trinidad and Tobago youth through the arts through with our Able Made x Anya Ayoung Chee Warrior Scarf through TallMan Foundation.




We've supported fashion designers in the U.S. with our Able Made x Shashi Natasha CFDA Jewelry Collection through CFDA Foundation.




We’ve made communities stronger and healthier with our Loomstate for Able Made Power in Numbers Tees and Able Made x UnderConsideration / Able Made x Alan Dye Water Bottles through the Ucal McKenzie Breakaway Foundation.

We’re so incredibly proud of what we’ve done together, but we’re just getting started. WE NEED YOUR HELP TO DO MORE! 



Perks


 

Other Ways You Can Help

While every dollar helps us make more amazing products that fund more impact projects, we know some people are more able to give monetarily than others. That’s why we encourage you to make an impact on our campaign any and every way you can:

  • Spread the word! Email family, friends, coworkers – anyone and everyone you think may want to make the world a better place through their purchasing. Don’t forget to add a personal note!

  • Tweet about our campaign, Pin It, or post it on Tumblr Facebook, your blog or vlog (however you like to share). The more people we have spreading the word, the more people we can potentially help.

TOGETHER WE CAN ACHIEVE MORE THAN WE EVER COULD ALONE! For additional inspiration go behind the scenes of the making of last season’s products, watch our Hearts + Minds documentary series 

#ablemade  


Media Contact

Suzanne McKenzie

P: 617-365-6804

E: hello@ablemadeshop.com

story:
Modern and modular, Street Mutt gives owners unprecedented flexibility when it comes to four-legged fashion. With every set, you’ll get: one leash, one collar and three design patches; letting you choose endless looks for your dog. 

Groundbreaking and unlike anything on the market, Street Mutt is high fashion fun at a truly low cost. Today, you can choose from 4 Street Mutt sets: Play Mutt, Chill Mutt, Hip Mutt and City Mutt.

Play Mutt

Chill Mutt

Hip Mutt

 

City Mutt

 

 

Mix and match them as you want, it's made for that. But ahead, we’ll be offering countless combinations to keep you dog fresh—and fashionable— every day, and in every season.

 

#WeAreAllMutts 

Helping mutts is at the centre of what we do. That’s why we’re committed to donating $1 from every collar and leash set sold to our rescue partners. And when you adopt a mutt from them, you’ll get a free set too. 

Also, our products are manufactured in China with process and materials that are eco-friendly and pet safe. Our supplier is certified by one of the highest standards in North America and Europe, Confidence in Textiles, issued by Testex Zurich, offering extensive safety regarding the harmlessness of textiles.

Because it’s not just about looking good, it’s about doing good - and doing it right.

Smart Features

3 in 1 Designs - Interchangeable design patches for fun and unique looks. 

Bright Colours That Don’t Fade - Stand out with pet-safe, UV resistant sublimation ink prints. 

360 Power Hook - Pivot mechanism with powerful resistance. 

Quick Release Buckle - Light and resistant for a perfect fit.

Soft and washable polyester - Top quality and maximum comfort.

story:
Finally a notebook that safely stores sensitive information, notes, documents, basically anything that fits. Meet Lockbook, the first notebook that protects your privacy using fingerprint sensor technology. 

 

Lockbook is more than just a notebook.

It is a planner, sketchbook, document holder, journal and organizer in one.

Lockbook is designed to match your lifestyle. Mix and match with all kinds of high quality refill paper, memos and accessories.

Turn Lockbook into the organizer you’ve always wanted.

…more importantly, it can hold and protect any important documents, and safeguard sensitive information that is only accessible for you and no-one else.

 

Lockbook is available in all kinds of colors and different colors:

Do you always carry your notebook/organizer with you carry around sensitive information?

Lockbook is the first notebook/organizer that protects your privacy using the fingerprint sensor. Use Lockbook to safely store your diary, passport, important contracts, private information – basically everything that fits inside Lockbook – on-the-go.

Finally, a notebook that protects your privacy. Using the latest finger-print technology, Lockbook unlocks within one second and you can only unlock it!

Together with experts, we handpicked select environmentally and social friendly PU Leather materials for Lockbook cover.

left: Lockbook with black lace cover right: Lockbook with red-leather cover

Choosing SVEPA Thermo PU and Ballet Lace PU Leather, makes Lockbook waterproof, high-scratch resistance and easy for cleaning.

We’ve designed Lockbook to match your lifestyle. There are hundreds of possibilities to Mix & Match Lockbook's paper. Whether you want to carry documents, maps, passport or simply using Lockbook as a sketchbook, notebook or journal the possibilities are endless!

Accessories For All Your Needs

Lockbook is more than just a notebook where you can scribble notes and keep odds and ends safe. We've created a multifunctional notebook, including a binder organizer, a ring binder, dividers and perforated pages for tear-out memos. We know that everyone uses planners differently, and with our accessories, you can customize your Lockbook till it meets all of your organizational needs.

story:
Hi I am Barry. I’m the Founder. I am Very Happy to bring ZeyeFashion & ZeyeFashion.com into existence.

David Bennett Cohen and I are the artists and a few advisory friends are involved in the implementation and Spirit of this project.

Finally! Technology has advanced art and clothing!

The ZeyeFashion & ZeyeFashion.com enterprise is intended to bring, as yet Unknown, Original Museum Level Visual Art and transfer that visual art onto Woman’s clothing, thus transforming every street into a stimulating and beautiful Museum Gallery environment. We will thus simultaneously help struggling artists, precipitate thought provoking subject matter and enhance the visual surroundings everywhere one looks. The potential for promoting a change of the state of mind on massive scales is accessible to us, based on the universal experiences of individuals when they are personally exposed to art.

Having fun or is it “a blast” or is it - the place is “rocking” is typically and has historically been involving music and art. We have both components here. That is, Art created by musicians. There are many, many of us all over the place.

When we as a community get this project funded, that will be just the beginning. As a community we can have art / music gatherings and “Be In/s” as they were called way back when and for this point in time as well - the Foundational Contributors – that means You – can be participants by way of invitations – We will have your e mail addresses. Let’s do this, let’s have fun in the sun as well – let’s embellish creativity – let’s do away with boring! Let’s start something new! Let’s give this form of telepathy a chance to flourish!

ZeyeFashion will need, at least, $75,000.00 [Seventy-Five Thousand Dollars] in order to begin to change the visuals of every street, café, classroom, office and more of the city, town and village everywhere. The funding will be used for Google-AdWords advertising and Godaddy - Social Media Management – and the hiring of 2 employees, models, photography, and samples for models to promote and Fashion / Art - show/s.

I am an artist a musician and in my previous life a home builder, as such I have a deep grasp of business as well.

My art has been exhibited, in a Museum as part of a juried exhibition.

I played at the 25th anniversary of Woodstock at Yasgur’s farm, where I assembled a band, composed the music, and wrote the lyrics. Other musicians, friends of mine, were from Sly and the Family Stone and the Three Dog Night bands and were in my Woodstock band, Spontaneous Combustion.

Jethro Tull / Ian Anderson famously wrote: “I may make you feel but I can't make you think” in the lyrics of “Thick As A Brick”.

Modern / contemporary visual art not only makes everyone feel, but, it also makes everyone think! Just go to a museum and look around at the visitors staring and contemplating what the art work means to them. When they are leaving the museum, they seem to be more thoughtful and that is certainly my own personal experience.

How will modern art transferred to women’s clothing worn everywhere affect and effect the general social interactions? It is my firm belief that it is to be positive. If this is achieved, we all win.

ZeyeFashion.com is now a website, linked to Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

At this point, with your help we can, all together, build a world where art truly transcends borders, cultures, and barriers of the mind. Please pass this on to your friends and you can help by articulating your opinion on facebook and twitter etc.

As of now every Contributor / Patron will get a personal Thank You letter which will also include an invitations to ZeyeFashion Be-Ins - With music by David Bennett Cohen’s and friends and other musicians, as well as some visual art & fashion and generally lots of fun. For more perk details please see the perks available.

Art is transcendental, and it communicates not only with ones’ emotions but with their minds as well. It seems to me, it is as if visual art is the tangible, second dimension of telepathy, it is in fact two dimensional or telepathy 2.0. Also, art placed on clothing is, actually, as I see it, the third dimension of telepathy, it is in fact three dimensional or telepathy 3.0. The Subconscious of the artist is communicating if not communing with both the sub- & -consciousness of the person experiencing the visual art.

David Bennett Cohen Bio:

DBC - current uTube performance - Cookin With Cohen: https://youtu.be/EoWMpPh0WJw?list=PLr8ZEsFDiy-6...

Over the years, he has played and/or recorded with: Original keyboard player with Country Joe and the Fish,  The Blues Project, Mick Taylor, The Luther Tucker Blues Band, Elvin Bishop, Hubert Sumlin, Melvin Van Peebles, Happy and Artie Traum, Arlen Roth, Eric Anderson, David Blue, Tim Hardin, Norton Buffalo, Jerry Miller, Jimi Hendrix, Johnny Winter, Buddy Miles, John Cippolina, Huey Lewis, Michael Bloomfield, Bob Weir, John Kahn, Johnnie Johnson, Jimmy Vivino, Jay Owens, Debbie Davies, Byther Smith, Bobby Kyle, Rocky Lawrence, Johnny B. Gayden, Sandra Feva and others.

As a solo performer, he has shared the bill with Country Joe McDonald, Kenny Rankin, Bonnie Raitt, Richard Thompson, Jerry Garcia, Leo Kottke, Rufus Thomas, Meatloaf, Booker T., The Roches, Kingfish, J. Giles and Magic Dick and many others.
